This version was built from the ground up for iPad & iPhone and features many enhancements, including a new story, new ending, new puzzles, new scenes, new inventory items, new music etc.

name: Soundless: A Modern Salem in Remote Area
summary: A short denpa horror visual novel.

name: Sonic Blast Man
summary: Sonic Blast Man is a beat'em up based on the arcade classic. In this version Sonic Blast Man must save the Earth from diverse kinds of evil forces, from street gangs and terrorists, to aliens and robots and finally, an evil clone of himself under the name of "Heavy Blast Man". The fight starts on a construction site in Earth and ends up in outer space.

name: South Park: Cartman's Authoritah
summary: South Park: Cartman's Authoritah is an unlicensed side-scrolling 2D platform game where the player plays as Cartman, a character from South Park. He needs to beat the enemies and finish the game. In the game he will find Cheesy Poofs and after collecting 100 Cheesy Poofs he receives an extra life. There are bonus levels that contain more Cheesy Poofs to collect. There are also different weapons that help the player to kill the enemies easily.

name: Soma Union
summary: Set 100 years after the true ending of Soma Spirits, Soma Union is a galaxy-spanning RPG that returns to the world of Soma! ...or so it would, if Soma had not been destroyed in a great calamity. As you roam through the cosmos to find the missing fragments of your home world, you'll meet a colorful cast of characters and make important choices that may not be as clear as they seem.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 3D
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 3D is a free fan game about a famous SEGA mascot, Sonic, and it is made on Build Engine with additional EDuke 32 port. The game was inspired by two classic Sonic series: Mega Drive/Genesis and Sonic Adventure series.

name: Soup Pot
summary: A cooking game with a focus on creativity. Make food with a wide range of locally sourced or supermarket ingredients in traditional kitchens. Discover and learn about more than 100 recipes while streaming your cooking on Cookbook, the social media.

name: Sonic 2: Community's Cut
summary:
Sonic 2 Community´s Cut is a combined mod of Sonic 2 and the Genesis Plus GX emulator which adds widescreen, S2 2013 enhancements, and more.

Sonic 2 Community's Cut is distributed as an emulator + patch and thus requires you to provide an original Sonic 2 ROM.

By default, it will look for the ROM included with the Steam release.

name: Sonic Double Pack: Sonic Mania Plus & Sonic Forces
summary: Experience Classic and Modern Sonic in two great games -- speed through rolling landscapes in all-new 2D adventures in Sonic Mania Plus, and create your own character to take back the world from the evil Dr. Eggman in the 3D adventure, Sonic Forces!

name: Souls of Amethyst
summary: A short project made by 3 people during 7 days.

name: Soran
summary: Soran is an arena shooter/RPG hybrid being developed and produced by Joseph Keenan. Use classic shooter weapons like the Sniper or Doob Tube, along side new and unique guns like the Defenestrator to finesse your way to victory in 1v1s, 2v2s, and small scale Battle Royales. When you aren't competing, you can explore the world of Four Shores discovering collectables, making friends or padding your stats for the next battle. Also there is a flying dog named Friend.

name: Soshite Bokura ha... And He Said
summary: A group of people goes to an island to shoot a video. While filming, they discover a mystery about the island.

name: Song in the Smoke
summary: Song in the Smoke immerses players in a beautiful and deadly VR world where they must craft, forage, hunt, and fight to survive. Take survival into your own hands, and stay alive by gathering materials to make tools, weapons, clothing, medicine and shelter. Use your club and bow to fend off strange beasts, battle the elements, and embark on a quest to uncover the secrets of the Song in the Smoke.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Awakening
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog: Awakening is an unreleased game that was in development sometime between 2006 and 2009. The game's title was found on Pete Capella's resume, who was the voice actor of Silver the Hedgehog at the time and voiced the character in the game. It being on the resume means that it was seemingly far enough in development for voice work to be done. There's currently no other info about the game.

name: Soul Kingdoms
summary: Soul Kingdoms aims to deliver a unique match-based multiplayer experience that condenses all of the core features of a PvP MMORPG within the scope of a single match. During each match, eight teams battle it out with fantastic abilities for resources and power in a simulated MMO world. Players develop and grow over the course of multiple matches by bringing back resources to their town hub world where they craft aesthetic gear and choose their advanced play-style modifiers.

name: Song of Farca
summary: You are Isabella Song – a hacker PI. Your job is to hack cameras, phones, and computers, as well as question suspects, analyze evidence and draw conclusions. But don't forget that in Farca city, even criminals can end up victims.

name: Somewhere Better
summary:
Lyra, a gun-witch living at the border, a place marked by destruction and supernatural phenomenons, is tasked to take a duo of magical girls across the land to try and save the world.
All the while, she gets to know them, becomes friends with them, and maybe, just maybe see that there's more to life.

name: Solidify
summary:
Click to jump
Right-click to undo
Use your trail to your advantage

name: SouthernCross
summary: SouthernCross is an MMORPG with PvE and PvP content, set in a fantasy / sci-fi world.

name: Solo
summary: Solo is another game created by Opera soft for exclusive use with the optical gun "Gun Stick"

name: Solaris: Off World Combat
summary: Step into the role of an Athlon - an elite VR athlete - and put your skills to the test in this futuristic world of high-stakes, fast-paced VR combat. Start each game with your pistol, then run, sprint, and slide your way across the arena - picking up weapons, equipment, and health packs along the way. Work with your team to take over the Control Point and win the match!

name: Song of Horror: Deluxe Edition
summary:
Song of Horror is a psychological horror adventure. Face the manifestations of the Presence, an unpredictable, eldritch AI that reacts to your way of playing: you won't experience two exact gameplays. Death is permanent: you may die, but the horror continues.

Deluxe Edition of Song Of Horror includes:

- Base Game
- Special Sleeve
- Maps Guide
- Characters Guide

name: Solitaire Dozen Gold
summary: Solitaire Dozen Gold offers 12 of the most popular solitaire variations: Klondike, Spider, Free Cell, Pyramid, Tri Peaks, Golf, Addiction, Scorpion, Canfield, Yukon, Forty Thieves and Monte Carlo.

name: Solitaire: Victorian Picnic 2
summary: 120 aristocratic deals await you! Visit Victorian England!

name: Souls of the Wind
summary: As the Guardian of the Four Winds, use your unique wind powers to complete the trials of the Wind Temples and free the Souls of the Wind from corruption. This is a tale of a world full of wind magic, through a beautiful 3rd person puzzle-adventure game crafted by Wandering Spirit Games.

name: Sokodice
summary: Sokodice is a puzzle game where you must navigate dice through mind boggling levels to match the number of the dice with the number on a designated tile. Features: -100+ levels across 11 unique worlds -Unique dice with different abilities -Various environmental challenges -Relaxing atmosphere -Gorgeous soundtrack

name: So Many Me: Extended Edition
summary: Filo is Filo, one of a kind or so he thought as he is woken from his peaceful sleep and eat life to go on a quest of great importance. Which he doesn’t really care much for the details so he just does. His journey however starts in a magical fountain which splits Filo’s essence into hundreds of clones each shaped by an individual part of his personality which are called Me’s. However they are all a part of him so they are compelled to move when he does. Me’s as well as Filo now also have the ability to turn into magical stone platforms which can be used for puzzle solving. Eating transmitter fruits changes the properties of the transformations. Filo can also work with the other Me’s to do special dances to allow them to transform into creatures like the Jellysaur or the Tankephaunt. He runs into other characters like Flora who seems to be a fan girl. Filo is supposed to be going after The organization called Cloud 9 in the world of Xio, runny Baron Vost. The rest he is just goofing off.

name: Some Old Stuff
summary: I was in my old room in my parents' house. My mom gave me a shoe box filled with some old stuff. I opened the box and found all the stuff related to an old friend of mine.

name: Soul Survivor
summary: Ultimate TPS Zombie Survival Community Based Game Created Only by a 17 year old self taught game developer using free assets!

name: Sokocat - Islands
summary: SokoCat - Islands is a classic sokoban puzzle game with an immersive and relaxing 3D environment. The goal is to move the box to its positions, the player can push one box at a time, but not pull.

name: Sonic Omens
summary:
This fan game tells the story of why chaos emeralds are no longer used in recent Sonic games. What events took place after Sonic Unleashed before Sonic Lost World, which prevents the characters from using chaos emeralds?

What secrets do the temples of Chaos Emeralds hide?

name: Solitaire Spider Minimal
summary: Play classic Spider Solitaire with 1/2/4 suits!

name: Solitaire Klondike Minimal
summary: Beautiful minimalist design, nothing will disturb you from puzzle. The game has 3 difficulty levels and can be played with touch screen, Joy-Con or the Nintendo Switch Pro Controller.

name: Solar Blast
summary: Defend sun from incoming enemies! Rotate shield and fight for your life! Discover and master each level with perfect score! Insane combos, huuuge waves of enemies, great visuals and design for you to enjoy.

name: Solitaire Deluxe Bundle: 3 in 1
summary: All the classic game modes you know and love! Challenge yourself and enjoy countless hours of fun with the most popular solitaire games: Klondike, Freecell and Spider! Change the game's appearance to suit your own taste. Progress through the game to unlock unique card sets and backgrounds. Customize your Solitare to make it unique and exclusive. Stunning animations and gameplay designed for endless entertainment in the palm of your hand.

name: Solitaire Card Games
summary: Enjoy a relaxing solitaire card game in a cartoony art style and play one of the three solitaire card game variation. Enjoy the game as a beginner or an expert as you can choose between three difficulties. As a beginner you can play with only one suite or chose the expert mode and play the classic ruleset. Enjoy a relaxing and entertaining solitaire card game for everyone. Solitaire Card Games is a small collection of three solitaire card games, namely the classic klondike variation, the tripeaks and the spider solitaire game. The game is presented in a cartoony and simple art style to let you enjoy the different card games in a simple way. Features : - Three difficulty modes - Three different card game variation - Highscores and other stats

name: Soraland
summary: Third person strategy game: Collect resources, conquer new areas and grow your civilization.

name: Solitaire Game Halloween 2
summary: Outplay the homeowner and get a coveted sweet prize! 120 unique levels await you in Solitaire game Halloween 2!

name: Souls of Purgatory
summary: Play as the souls of two witches seeking for revenge in this Doom inspired dungeon crawler.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: The Next Level
summary:
Sonic the Hedgehog: The Next Level is a overhaul modification of Sonic the Hedgehog developed by MarkeyJester.

This time around Sonic explores a new otherworldly zone- for that's exactly what it is! It seems Dr.Robotnik has grown tired of the same shtick and is now trying to conquer the Gust Planet!

He has trapped the Animals of the planet in his new models of badnik and has managed to collect a Chaos Emerald! He's used this emerald to power his new machine the Reality Bender!

Sonic soon catches on to Dr. Robotnik's scheme and makes his way over to the Gust Planet Zone himself to put a stop to his evil scheme!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 HD
summary:
Sonic 2 HD is an unofficial overhaul of SEGA’s franchise classic for the modern world. It is made for fans, by fans, with no financial gain whatsoever.

From the very beginning of the project, Sonic 2 HD has focused on maintaining the feel that has made Sonic the Hedgehog 2 a classic while using new tools to reimagine the original as it could have been were it made today. The game’s art direction reflects this, but Sonic 2 HD has also given equal attention to unseen essential elements in the physics and audio. The result of this is an unprecedented re-interpretation in high definition graphics, music and gameplay of Sonic 2, which continues to set quality standards to this day.

2D artwork is the foundation of Sonic’s retro roots. With this in mind, the goal was to produce a similar shading style to the Japanese original concept artwork and set it in motion with hand-drawn animations. Now, 25 years after Sonic 2’s release, Sonic 2 HD can faithfully represent the original’s cast of characters and environments in a world where technology no longer imposes artistic limitations.

name: Sol Cresta
summary:
DOCK, SPLIT, and FORM UP!
Pilot three ships and free the solar system from the clutches of evil in this free-form shooting game!

PlatinumGames’ NEO-CLASSIC ARCADE series carries on the spirit and fun of classic gaming using modern technology, and the first project in this endeavor is Sol Cresta. Sol Cresta takes the docking and formation strategies of classic shooting games Moon Cresta and Terra Cresta and elevates them with the “free-form docking” system. The flagship Yamato, composed of the ships Amaterasu, Tsukuyomi, and Susano can utilize various attacks depending on how the three ships are aligned. Docking, splitting, and reforming the ships as needed is the key to defeating the invading armies of Mandler.

name: Sonic P-06
summary: Sonic P-06 is a platform game developed by Argentinian programmer "ChaosX" for Windows. It is an unofficial remake of the 2006 video game Sonic the Hedgehog, originally developed by Sonic Team and published by Sega for the Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3. The remake features many improvements over the original source material, such as improved controls, faster load times, enhanced visuals, various bug fixes, restored dialog, and brand new mid-level cutscenes. P-06 has a huge cult following and an active speedrunning community. As of August 2023, nine demos have been released, containing all main acts from Sonic's, Shadow's, and Silver's campaigns. The boss fights, hub worlds, town missions, and final story from the original game are not yet playable in P-06.

name: Sophie: Starlight Whispers
summary: A metroidvania genre game that features impressive and sophisticated level design as well as an excellent combat system. Its dramatic narrative revolves around Sophie, a girl with magical powers, and her adventures in the fantasy kingdom of Sharan.

name: Soul Machine
summary: Soul Machine is a pvp, turn-based, square-to-square, multiplayer game comparable to chess. It is a "procedural" oriented game in which you can infinitely customize the skills of your mech over the course of the battles. New mechanics and game mode are regularly added.

name: Solar Echoes: The Star Legation
summary: Solar Echoes: The Star Legation is a choice-driven Sci-Fi Visual Novel game with RPG elements. Journey through space to gather and manage an alien crew, visit new worlds, negotiate with alien leaders, and even risk romance across the stars!

name: Soulchild
summary: Soulchild is a 2D storydriven platformer with metroidvania elements. Follow Silk in his journey to explore the surface world and find the masks, artifacts that enhance his abilities and will aid him to go back home!

name: Soul Challenge
summary: After people died, the soul will go to its destination, or will be punished and reborn. In the game, you will play a lost soul in hell and his girlfriend, and you will face a series of challenges. After completed the series of challenges, you will reach the victory of eternal life.

name: Solitaire Forever II
summary: 3D solitaire includes Klondike, Eight Off, Miss Milligan, Simple Simon, Eliminator, and more

name: Son Savaşçı
summary: For the first time in 2D games, we performed completely in Turkish. We wanted to make you experience the past Atari period again. We are proud to start a brand new era in the gaming world, and this is just the beginning.

name: Soliterix
summary: Tired of the spider? Try a different way to play the solitaire! A mix between the classic and the well-known falling blocks game!

name: Something Strange in the Woods
summary: Something Strange is happening in the Woods, different creatures appear endlessly, which upsets the balance. Can you maintain balance by freeing the forest from these creatures?

name: Soul Shifter
summary: In Soul Shifter, the player breaks through the ruins of what was once the most glorious of the castles and discovers the secrets behind the magical elemental energy that brought prosperity but also disgrace to the kingdom.

name: Software House Simulator
summary: Eat, sleep, release a game, repeat. Release games, console, controller, etc... and try the thrill of becoming a billionaire!

name: Soul Dossier
summary: Soul Dossier is a multiplayer game based on Oriental culture (5vS1). The game is based on a variety of traditional Oriental cultures, including five elements, eight diagrams and folklore.

name: Solitaire: Elemental Wizards
summary: Classic Solitaire in a fantasy setting! Help Archmage Gideon regain his former glory!

name: Solargene
summary: Take Command of a Space Corporation in the Sci-Fi Simulator Solargene! Manage personnel, design and develop colonies and orbital stations across the solar system! Mine resources, establish logistics, research cutting-edge technologies, trade, and complete missions

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate
summary: Join Sonic in the high-speed adventure of a lifetime across a colorful interstellar amusement park. Color the Universe in Sonic Colors: Ultimate!

name: Sonic Origins
summary:
Celebrate the games that started it all. Sonic Origins is a brand new collection including Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic CD, Sonic the Hedgehog 2, and Sonic 3 & Knuckles. Play as Sonic, Tails, & Knuckles and immerse yourself in the fully remastered gameplay, tie the games together with all new animations, explore added features, modes, and more.

The versions of Sonic the Hedgehog, Sonic the Hedgehog 2 and Sonic CD in this compilation are ports of the remasters previously released for mobile, platforms, with the added Drop Dash ability from Sonic Mania.
The Sonic the Hedgehog 3 & Knuckles version is brand new for this compilation, and is also a remaster in the same way that the other titles, also adding the Drop Dash ability. This version had part of its soundtrack changed, swapping the songs for those present in the PC port of the Sonic & Knuckles Collection.

name: Sonic Frontiers
summary:
Worlds will collide in Sonic the Hedgehog’s newest adventure.

An experience like never before, accelerate to new heights and experience the thrill of high velocity open-zone freedom. Battle powerful enemies as you speed through the Starfall Islands - landscapes brimming with dense forests, overflowing waterfalls, sizzling deserts and more!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog (also know as Sonic 4) is an unlicensed game for the SNES by Peruvian scene organization Twin Eagles Group. It is, actually, a hack of Speedy Gonzales: Los Gatos Bandidos. Notable features include Sonic's new ability to kick, and missions to free Mario from cages (upon which the latter exclaims his name).

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate - 30th Anniversary Pack
summary:
The Anniversary Pack contains:

- Base game
- Art book
- OST
- Sonic 30th Anniversary Collector’s Coin

name: Soulvars
summary: Get ready to ignite your Soul! Soulvars is a pixel art, turn-based deckbuilding RPG inspired by classic JRPGs with a modern twist. Unravel a dark conspiracy as your party of Soulbearers faces off against invading Dominators in dynamic, action-packed battles.

name: Sound Journal for Lovers
summary:
Sound Journal for Lovers is a Downloadable Soundlink game for the Satellaview that was broadcast in 2 different volumes between February 8, 1998 and February 14, 1998.

Sound Journal for Lovers comprises a set of text and images meant to smoothly accompany the music that played during the St.GIGA broadcast hour. The majority of the contents are screens displaying an artist listing and lyrics scrolling upwards. Of the minor interactions available to the player, a toggle option changes the lyrics from English to a Japanese translation. Some songs do not have an associated listing for lyrics.

name: Soldier
summary: The Soldier mission is destroy monsters inside the abandoned Village.

name: Sonia and the Hypnotic City
summary: After receiving reports of a group of criminals using some sort of power to rob an entire city, the church dispatches a Holy Knight named Sonia to investigate the incident.

name: Sol Blanka
summary: This is a top down open world turn-based RPG. Eric is a young lone warrior stranded in a strange island in which is inhabited by monsters he's never seen before. Could the Dragon Legends be true, is he dead, or could he still be dreaming? Play and find out as Eric beneath the white sun, Sol Blanka!

name: Soulcaster
summary: Escape an ancient temple by utilizing its arcane artifacts in an intriguing 2D puzzle plat-former.

name: Souls Lore
summary: This is a sample game created in "RPG Maker MZ" by Douraku. Equip souls to unlock new powers and fight the aliens in this traditional RPG.

name: Soldier in the darkness
summary: You have been sent to an island where more than four hundred visitors have turned into zombies.

name: SOL Cycling
summary: Required: Exercise bike with bluetooth Power/Speed sensors. An MMO that will have you riding with friends on real Mars terrain thanks to images from NASA's JPL & UofA. But you are not alone, help secure the supply lines and deliver the cargo - ride to survive!

name: Solar Danmaku
summary: An indie bullet hell game in which players must take on a fleet of enemies after finding their home world destroyed.

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate - Launch Edition
summary: Join Sonic on an intergalactic journey, fully remastered for a new generation -- with a few new features, too! The launch edition comes with a baby Sonic keychain!

name: Soulstice
summary: Explore a dark world brimming with hidden mysteries, master a diverse combat system, and inhabit the dual forces of two sisters in a coming-of-age fantasy story with fast-paced action, vicious enemies and breathtaking boss fights.

name: Somniphobia
summary: Survival horror in a girl's nightmare. Complete puzzles and survive in a nightmarish hand-painted world of Susan's mind. If she wakes up, she'll have the same dream again. You must keep all of her nasty thoughts and memories away from you to stop her from waking up.

name: Soccer Manager 2021
summary:
Be a top football manager in Soccer Manager 2021. Take a football team to the top and test your management skills against the best, or help a struggling team fight for glory!

Be a top football manager in Soccer Manager 2021 - free football management game! Take a football team to the top and test your management skills and build your top eleven! Choose from over 800 clubs from 33 countries around the world.

As the football manager, you control all aspects of your club. Football coach duties include planning training sessions, developing your club’s facilities, transfers, squad selection, assigning squad numbers and deciding team tactics. Soccer Manager 2021’s level of control for your football team makes it one of the most immersive football management games!

name: Soaring Machinariae
summary: A girls' adventure story, told through a traditional action RPG! Control Iris the Machinariae to explore fields and dungeons, and fight against monsters with sword combos, items, and special moves!

name: SokoMatch: Lizard Saga
summary: In this game, you will help Lizzy, a lovable Lizard, to match 3 or more gems of the same collor in order to solve the puzzles and clear the stages! Are you ready? Solve!

name: Society's Paradigms
summary: Society’s Paradigms is an action-packed social commentary based on the innovative combination of Rogue-lite and RPG elements. Explore a randomly generated world to obtain new skills and abilities. Experiment and combine passive and active skills to achieve insane combos and satisfying combat.

name: Soulfire: Weapon Master
summary: Soulfire is a souls-like, side scroller action competitive game, integrating (stitching) multiple game modes, including the classic battle royale mode. Whether it is melee, long-range, or support, there will always be a fighting style that suits you. May you survive to the end in the cruel fighting!

name: Sophie's Safecracking Simulator
summary: Crack simulated safe locks using real techniques!

name: S.O.T.A 2
summary: S.O.T.A - Stalker Online Time Anomaly is a multiplayer MMO TPS game with RPG and open world survival elements. The game takes place in an anomalous zone. The setting of the game is the Soviet local post-apocalypse.

name: Sonic Skateboard
summary:
Sonic Skateboard is an LCD game created for distribution at McDonald's restaurants. They were offered as a part of Happy Meals for a limited time in 2004. This game was also released under the name Sonic the Hedgehog Extreme Boarding.

There are two main buttons on the game which control left and right movement. The game is a recreation of the Sonic 2 special stage as the player moves forward avoiding obstacles. There are three lanes that can be moved to and one is always open, while others may be occupied by bombs. There are also Rings which litter the screen, which can be collected. Once the player has collected 20 rings, they will move to the next level, which will be more fast paced, and thus harder. There are four levels to complete, and when one is completed, you will see a “Thumbs Up”, as it appeared in Sonic The Hedgehog 2.

name: Sophia the Traveler
summary: Have you ever been to Venice of Italy? If not, then please don't miss "Sophia the Traveler"! Follow this lovely heroine as she roams around the City of Water, look for objects and characters scattered all over the stunning landscapes and embrace the local culture amidst the vivid city!

name: South Park: The Fractured But Whole - Danger Deck
summary: Test and push your limits in increasingly difficult encounters comprised of a variety of different enemies from the game.

name: South Park: The Fractured But Whole - Towelie: Your Gaming Bud
summary: Receive an exclusive in-game assistant, Towelie: Your Gaming Bud. The streets of South Park aren't as safe as they used to be and even the most seasoned South Park veteran will need help. "Towelie: Your Gaming Bud" provides unique assistance to players at key locations throughout the game

name: Soer Dolls
summary: Soer Dolls is a horror adventure game in which you need to find enchanted dolls in order to save the small town of Lazyiville from the terrible curse that caused ghosts and monsters to appear in the city!

name: Soldier of Fortune: Platinum Edition
summary: Now updated with a wealth of new multiplayer features, Soldier of Fortune, Platinum Edition combines all the explosive first-person shooter action of the original and Gold Editions, then adds five new multiplayer modes, the BradyGames strategy guide disc, and a preview of the much-anticipated Soldier of Fortune II: Double Helix.

name: Soulmate
summary: Soulmate is a game about what insanity can create, in a world full of coincidences.

name: S.O.L: Search of Light
summary: Search Of Light is a steampunk/dark fantasy setting adventure and the combination of village management and tower defense mechanics that we define as adventure management.

name: Soldier of Fortune II: Double Helix - Gold Edition
summary:
Soldier of Fortune II: Gold Edition is a two-CD set containing the original Soldier of Fortune II: Double Helix with enhanced gameplay and additions. Players take the role of mercenary John Mullins as he hunts down and eliminates bio-terrorists that are threatening the world with a deadly plague, the Gemini Virus. The Gold Edition contains more than 55 levels, eleven new maps, a new infiltration multiplayer game mode, an expanded arsenal including weapons such as the SIG 552 rifle, MP5SD, and Silver Talon pistol, and an anti-cheat "PunkBuster" modification.

A single-player random mission generator promises diversity in gameplay and offers four mission types (escape, assassination, infiltration, and demolition), varied locations (desert, hills, jungle, plains, or snow), night or day settings, four difficulty levels, and time limit options. The original Quake III: Arena engine has been enhanced with GHOUL II technology that provides improved animation and more carnage with 36 damage and 16 dismemberment zones. Other features of the graphical upgrade include per-pixel hit detection, new facial animations and full skeletal soft-skinned models.

name: Solaris
summary: Discover a space strategy game filled with conquest, betrayal and subterfuge. Build alliances, make enemies and fight your way to victory and galactic domination. Will it be you who will conquer the galaxy?

name: Soulpath: The Final Journey
summary: Soulpath: the final journey, is an oniric journey through human emotions. 9 unique and challenging minigames where gameplay, music and visuals, change to offer surprising VR experiences.

name: Songs for a Hero: Definitive Edition
summary:
Songs for a Hero is an old school sung-through video game extravaganza! Join an unlikely hero as he sings his way through a strange world full of floating platforms, bright and colorful enemies, and many other inexplicable phenomena in an adventure, unlike anything you have ever heard! This humorous old-school platformer features a fully dynamic soundtrack that reacts to your every input, meaning that the hero will always sing and crack jokes about whatever is happening to him, whenever it happens.
The Definitive Edition includes the Heavy Metal DLC "Songs for the Dead", the DLC "Skin Pack", the epilogue of the main campaign, and the Samba DLC "Samba for a Hero".

name: Sonata Theory
summary: 2D/3D story-adventure game

name: Soaring Tales of Skylines
summary: After Hong Kong's coup in the 1960s, the economy began to develop, and you have this golden opportunity to develop real estate!

name: Sometimes Always Monsters: Author Outfits
summary: Get fresh new looks for each of the writers, with the Author Outfits DLC Pack. Including redesigned sprites, portraits, and animations, this visual makeover will add new life and new style to your second (or twenty-second) play through of Sometimes Always Monsters.

name: Souldiers
summary: Fight for your freedom in a sprawling fantasy world caught between the living and the fallen. Hone your skills in a retro epic featuring puzzle platforming, metroidvania exploration and crunchy soulslike combat.

name: Soobmarinno
summary: Explore the depths of the ocean filled with dangerous inhabitants. Encounter monstrous creatures, collect the ancient gold, travel through this amazing lost world and find out its secrets.

name: Sorcerous
summary: A sudden disappearance will set Apprentice Mage Andraste on the trail of a mystery that unfolds with arcane powers, monster battles and cunning puzzles in the best tradition of turn based RPGs.

name: Sokoban Gianta
summary: Classic box-pushing Sokoban puzzle game, with a mentally stimulating giant level.

name: Solitaire Halloween Story
summary: Trick or treat? No tricks! 120 unique levels await you in Solitaire Halloween Story

name: Social Distancing
summary: An epic quest for toilet paper! Social Distancing is a short, satirical, casual adventure game about the toilet paper run of 2020. Execute your hysteria-driven mission to acquire more toilet paper as you maintain a six-foot radius from everyone!

name: Soralio: Cooperation mystery solving game
summary: Sora and Rio are brought to a mysterious house. Let's solve the mystery and escape by talking. Communication is the key.

name: Soter
summary: Play the role of a planet trying to keep the few humans who remain alive as you travel through an asteroid field in this simulator inspired by the classic Maxis game Sim Earth.

name: Soulace
summary: Soulace takes you on the journey trough the after death realms. Immerse yourself into beautiful and relaxing meditative environments in this point and click VR Adventure experience.

name: Sophstar
summary: A vertical arcade shoot'em up with an inventive teleport system, lots of fast-blazing action and explosions, tons of boss fights, a risk/reward based score system and a proper challenge for both veteran and new players of the genre.

name: Song of the Tides
summary: Embark on a journey with no return to explore, fight and loot your way through the Shifting Isles- by yourself or with your friends. With the winds as your guide, you might just discover your destiny.

name: Somnium Shore
summary: A challenging, 2D Platform Adventure game where all level mechanics can change if you don't stay balanced. Help Ethan to grow up and leave his roots in order to pursue his dreams, find clues about his past and fight against your nightmares in your journey to the Somnium Shore!

name: Sol Dorado Heist
summary: Choose your path and solve the mystery of the Sol Dorado Heist!

name: South Pass
summary: Learn to use your controller like a musician, playing four unique instruments in this hybrid Rhythm/RPG set in a small mountain town on the day the internet goes out!

name: Sonic Riders Tournament Edition
summary: With balance changes, some tweaked mechanics, helpful features, and additional content, this build aims to create the definitive Sonic Riders competitive experience.

name: Sovereign Tea
summary: Command the Tea Princesses to victory over the Coffee Empire in this adorable Strategy RPG! Brew your minions, position your armies, and tactically press forward to achieve victory.

name: Sound Waves
summary: Thoughtful and atmospheric stealth puzzle, mesmerizing with non-trivial gameplay, interesting mechanics and a good elaboration of the sound component. Echolocation simulates the incredible clear contours of the obstacle and paints a picture of what is happening in the subconscious. On the basis of abstract images, it is necessary to orientate in the image, maneuver between dangers and traps, trying to find a way out. Wave actions are somehow there - they unfold in a dungeon where dark tunnels keep the unknown and terrible monsters who are not averse to hunting you. The only thing that can help you navigate in space is sound. Sound will be your main guides to these cold gloomy labyrinths. An unusual world awaits you, which is interesting to explore and dive into it further and further, feeling like a pioneer.

name: Socialism Simulator
summary: The civil war is over. To the rapturous cheers of the crowd, you and four of your companions take control of the country. The young socialist state proudly raises its flags, its eyes fixed on a distant, bright future.

name: Soulbound Steel
summary: Embody a necromancer and slash your way through knights and castles. Combine skills of undead warriors on the fly. Summon powerful demons and slay colossal deities in a hack n’ slash that offers a brand new combat system to be mastered.

name: Sol 705
summary: A hilarious point and click graphic adventure in the best spirit of the '90s where you play as a young man and his friends in a personal quest that will turn their passion for progressive rock and UFOs into a real intergalactic mess... If they manage to survive school !

name: Something in the Water
summary: Somtheing in the Water is a retro survival horror first person shooter built for the E1M1 Magazine game jam. It can be finished in one sitting and takes roughly 15 minutes to complete. However, save games are available for those that want or need them.

name: Solar System Colonist
summary: The conquest of the Solar System has begun – prove yourself as a space colonist! Pilot the spaceship, choose the planet you wish to inhabit and build your new home. However, remember that there are no rules or laws in outer space. Don't underestimate the danger and stay vigilant – enemies are near!

name: Sogo Vego
summary: A short indie horror game about waking up in a nightmare, and having only stealth and wit on your side to survive. Don’t get caught...

name: Solar Baron
summary: As head of an interplanetary corporation, your goal is to extract resources from across the solar system and bring them home faster and cheaper than your competitors. Construct trade depots and colonies. Build rockets and spaceports. Master realistic orbital mechanics and maximize profits.

name: Southern Cross Battle Force
summary: This is a horizontal retro arcade-style STG shooting game. Players need to control fighters to defeat the ultimate villain FightFox and rescue EAU and the Southern Cross Union headquarters.

name: Soup!
summary: Soup! – This is a simple but addictive puzzle game, you just need to find the same items to cope with the mess and open the drawing.

name: Sonic Jam 6
summary: Sonic Jam 6 is a version of Super Mario Bros. 2 (the bootleg version) featuring Sonic instead of Mario. This version replaces the title screen with ported version of Sonic Jam's and includes a screenshot of the Sega Mega Drive version of Sonic 3D Blast's intro to overlap Mario's face on the level intro/status screen. However, his face wasn't removed in the bonus areas.

name: Somewhere in the Shadow
summary: Woke up in strange dark spot. Who has done it with you? And why? Try to get out from that scary place and stay alive...

name: Songs for a Hero: Songs for the Dead
summary: Songs for the Dead is a spooky new chapter for Songs for a Hero. Fight your way through this new campaign featuring three new levels with haunted mansions and crypts full of dark creatures that might as well have come straight from a horror movie and plenty of rock'n'roll, with vocals by none other than the Son of the Heavy Metal God himself, DETONATOR!

name: Solitude
summary: Solitude is a cooperative multiplayer survival game set in space. Play as the crew of a stranded space ship on its long voyage back to Earth!

name: Sorcs: Siege Chronicles
summary: Sorcs: Siege Chronicles is an indie 3D tower defense with: - Free positioning for towers - FPS mode - Configurable AI for towers - 4 skill trees - 25 levels with 3 difficulty modes - 20-25 hours to complete 100%

name: SourceWorlds
summary: SourceWorlds is a third-person action-adventure that throws you into the strange world of 'the Architect'. Solve quests, loot items and have a great time trying to escape this CCC state-of-the-art indie game from the future.

name: Soulz
summary: Soulz is a strategic duel CCG with board-based deep tactical play through various cards and decks. Summon heroes and troops every turn, strategically occupy the battlefield through attacks and movements, lead battles, and conquer opponents through resource management and various tactics to win.

name: Soviet Simulator
summary: If getting back to Dec 1922, under your leadership, can you make Union of Soviet Socialist Republics an Utopia?

name: Source of Survival
summary: Fight for your survival in an island full of zombies, dinosaurs and prehistoric creatures.

name: South Park : The Stick of Truth + The Fractured but Whole Bundle
summary:
South Park : The Stick of Truth
From the perilous battlefields of the fourth-grade playground, a young hero will rise. Earn your place at the side of Stan, Kyle, Cartman and Kenny.

South Park: The Fractured but Whole
Darkness has spread across the land. As the newest member of Coon and Friends, create your own superhero, build up your notoriety, and use your superpowers to save South Park.

name: Sonic Mania: Encore
summary: Experience an all-new Encore Mode, two new playable characters Mighty and Ray, and four player Competition Mode.

name: Sokobond Express
summary: A beautifully minimalist puzzle game combining chemical bonds and puzzling pathfinding.

name: Songbringer: The Trial of Ren
summary: Discover the whereabouts of the mysterious Ren and undertake his trial with the aim of achieving spiritual ascension.

name: Sokko Seitokai: Sonic Council
summary: Exclusive Fighting Game on Sega Saturn.

name: Soccer Superstars
summary: Soccer Superstars is a 2D side-scrolling football game in which the player can chose from 32 international teams to take part in either friendly games or cup tournaments. These can be played against the computer or both computer and a friend, however there is also a demo mode in which you will be able to see an entire tournament -or a friendly match- as a mere spectator. You are also free to modify team line-ups (all composed of real national player names), select basic formation systems, and alter the game length. The game interface is multi-language.

name: Soul Elegy
summary: This is a very challenging war chess + roguelike game, with random mazes, free combination of teams, and turn-based combat. In the game, players will lead all kinds of undead to counterattack the human world!

name: Social Distancing Simulator
summary: Social distancing is in full effect, but we all need to eat. Make your way through a supermarket with 120+ different product's, avoid the other customers and make it through check out with everything on your shopping list. They are working on a vaccine, but you might want to prepare for the worst.

name: Soi Kano: Gyutto Dakishimete - Limited Edition
summary:
This edition includes the following
Game: Soi Kano Gyutto Dakishimete
B2 tapestry

name: Sotsugyou III: Wedding Bell
summary: Sotsugyou III: Wedding Bell is the third game in the Sotsugyou graduation series. The game is a dating simulation first person adventure game. You're a married teacher (to a former student) and you hand out assignments to students, go on dates with your wife, manage schedules, etc. At the beginning of the game the player can choose between one of the five characters he wants to be married to.

name: Sotsugyou M: Male Graduation - Seitokai Naga no Kareinaru Inbou
summary: A PS1 otome game.

name: Sotsugyou Vacation
summary: Sotsugyou Vacation is an adventure, and "gal get" (love simulation) game in the Sotugyou Graduation series of games. The goal of the game is to find a treasure on a southern island, and also become friends with the girls.

name: Soukou Akki Muramasa: Shokuzai-hen
summary:
Originally a piece of fan writing that won a contest, receiving a visual novel adaptation by Nitroplus.

A short, free story that continues after the true end of the main visual novel.

name: Souten no Shiroki Kami no Kura: Great Peak
summary: Souten no Shiroki Kami no Kura: Great Peak puts the player in the role of the captain of an expedition of alpinists in this mountain simulation game.

name: Somnium
summary: Travel through a retro netscape to deliver an important message in this first person platformer.

name: Sons of Valhalla
summary: Sons of Valhalla is a side scrolling base building strategy game that catapults you into the age of the Vikings. You slip into the role of the Viking Jarl son Thorald Olavson, who is leaving for England to save the love of his life.

name: Sokocat: Dungeon
summary: kitten Jones adventure into a mysterious ancient temple on a volcanic island looking for relics, solving puzzles and avoiding dangers along the way. Does this cat have 9 lives?

name: Solys
summary: Solys is a fast-paced multiplayer FPS, where teams fight to destroy one anothers' base. The last team standing wins the game. Collect resources, fly powerful spaceships to reach other planets, build your base, setup defenses and buy weapons to dominate the solar system.

name: Soviet Hentai
summary: Soviet Hentai is a third-person shooter set in the USSR. Explore the Soviet city, test your aim, use a diverse Arsenal of weapons to win shootouts with dangerous enemies.

name: Soul Delivery
summary: A robot with amnesia ventures through the night of a neon city without humans in search of what happened between humans and AI.

name: Sophistry: Live2D
summary: With 6 playable characters fully voiced and Live2D animated, it's like 6 games in 1! Be ready for an emotional roller-coaster as you shape their dramatic fates and influence their LGBTQ+ inclusive romance stories. How far will you go to get what you want?

name: Sokoban: Bunny Tales
summary: How smart are you? Try this cute indie modernized take on the classic puzzle game Sokoban. The player must place colored boxes and balls on their goals to solve the 200 fun, interesting and increasingly challenging puzzles. Entertaining Bunny Tales stories included throughout the game.

name: Soviet Arcade Machine Basketball
summary: Computer simulation of one of the most recognizable arcade machines of the USSR times.

name: SoulCalibur VI: Tira
summary: Access to the playable character Tira in the full retail version of SOULCALIBUR VI. The pack also includes a unique story for Tira in the Soul Chronicle mode.

name: SoulCalibur VI: 2B
summary: Joining the cast of SOULCALIBUR VI is the combat android 2B (YoRHa No. 2 Type B) from Square Enix's NieR: Automata! Jump and dash around your opponent to pull off swift attacks and deadly air combos!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Amy
summary: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new playable character: Amy!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Cassandra
summary: Celebrate 20 years of Soulcalibur with an all new playable character: Cassandra!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Hilde
summary: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new playable character: Hilde!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Haohmaru
summary: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new playable character: Haohmaru!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Setsuka
summary: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new playable character: Setsuka!

name: SoulCalibur VI: Hwang
summary: Celebrate 20 years of SOULCALIBUR with an all new playable character: Hwang!

name: Sovietpunk: Chapter one
summary: Sovietpunk is a cyberpunk story set in the setting of the Soviet Union after a global nuclear war. You have to guide the main character through the gloomy tunnels, in which the struggle for life is in full swing.

name: Soft Wind
summary: Soft Wind is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Souno's Curse
summary: An action platformer inspired by Hollow Knight and Journey. Featuring metroidvania elements and a surprising story about regret and living in the moment

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate - Digital Deluxe
summary: Join Sonic in the high-speed adventure of a lifetime in Sonic Colors: Ultimate! Digital Deluxe includes the Ultimate Cosmetic Pack and the Ultimate Music Pack. Color the Universe!

name: Sonic Battle R
summary: Gather your friends and see who is truly the fastest in this no hold barred fast track. Featuring many different stages through the Sonic series enhancing the stages with new features for multiplayer. Explore the world and work together to complete missions.

name: Song of the Prairie
summary: Farms, stories, exploration, and DIY are all the content you can experience on this free and magical land. No matter what kind of life you choose, please enjoy the surprises from this land as much as you can!

name: Soul Catcher
summary: A Low res horror game 14 years in the making, Soul Catcher has the player take the role of one of six characters who find themselves in a nightmarish remote mountainside trying to save a loved one from a demon worshiping cult. Navigate the mansion, solve the puzzles and evade the horrors that lurk.

name: Soarocity
summary: An exciting 2d platformer with a painterly art style and unique rotation mechanic.

name: Sovereign
summary: Sovereign is an Open World, Action, Adventure, RPG.

name: Soul at Stake: Funeral of the Flowers
summary: "Funeral of the Flowers" is the new DLC of Soul at Stake, including a new Devil "the Geisha", a new Gambler "Aoki", and a new map "Sakura Shrine". EXTRA BONUS: The Geisha gesture x1, the Geisha's exclusive Trump x5, Aoki's exclusive Trump x5, Aoki's Trump 【Bystander】 x5.

name: Soul at Stake: Terror Cruise
summary: “赌船惊魂”是《灵魂筹码》的新增内容，包含一名新恶灵“卡屠”，一名新赌徒“明美”，以及一张新地图“幸运星号”。

name: Soul at Stake: Frozen Village
summary: The Frozen Village is a new addition to the world of Soul at Stakes, it will include a new Devil, "The Witch", and a new map, "The Frozen Village". This DLC will be free for a limited time, one month from release date until October 14, 2018 , after this timeframe it will be changed to a paid DLC.

name: Soul at Stake: Blood Ritual
summary: “圣血之殇”是《灵魂筹码》的扩展内容，包含一名新恶灵“血仆”，一名新赌徒“淑芬”，以及一张新地图“血色医院”。额外赠送1个血仆嘲讽动作、5张血仆专属底牌、5张淑芬专属底牌、5张淑芬组队底牌【置身事外】，以及200000筹码。

name: Soul at Stake: Lament of the Lovers
summary: “情蛊靡音”是《灵魂筹码》的扩展内容，包含一名新恶灵“惘灵”，一名新赌徒“荣氏”，以及一张新地图“遗情古寨”。额外赠送1个惘灵嘲讽动作、5张惘灵专属底牌、5张荣氏专属底牌、5张荣氏组队底牌【置身事外】。

name: Soukou Akki Muramasa: Janen-hen
summary: The official anthology DVD of Soukou Akki Muramasa, which includes sidestories written by guest scenario writers, wallpapers, Twitter icons and backgrounds, new songs by Ono Masatoshi and and much more.

name: Solar Conqueror
summary: Top down space shooter

name: Solitaire Beach Season: Sounds of Waves
summary: Ready for a relaxing cruise? 200 sunny layouts to help take a load off!

name: Sounds of Her Love: We'll always be together
summary: As a blooming relationship continues to grow skyward, live another day of your youthful live at an 'international' school, now hand in hand with a flustered, timid Ceri. What starts as another seemingly idyllic chapter of life, soon shifts to a world full of questions as two students begin a new experience together.

name: Sondro Gomez: A Sunova Story
summary: "Sondro Gomez: A Sunova Story" is an action-adventure platformer following the story of a failing musician named Sondro, who must seek and recover the wish-granting Mystic Orbs to repay his debt to the mysterious Masked Man. Can he find them before the many rogues of Sunova beat him to the punch?

name: Soaring
summary: Soaring is a challenging platformer where you must climb ever upwards to reach what you have lost, just mind your step !

name: Sokoban (Boxman) Classic
summary: Classic box pushing Sokoban puzzle game, with 306 mentally stimulating levels.

name: Solicitude Wake-up
summary: Immersive virtual reality horror survival game Solicitude Wake-up takes you to seemingly abandoned research facility. You wake-up in a dark operating room, laying down on operating table. You need to survive and find your way out.

name: Sorcerer Knights
summary: Fight terrible enemies through a varied fantasy world.

name: Sokobear: Winter
summary: Sokobear is the spa's maintenance bear, his job is to turn on the heating and massage system of all the natural pools in this winter spa.

name: Solar Sails
summary: Solar Sails is a satirical space pirates adventure game. Take control of a 17th-century pirate ship, upgrade it with powerful alien technologies, and sail onwards to plunder a galaxy full of treasures and mysteries.

name: Soda Crisis
summary: Soda Crisis is a fast-paced side-scrolling shooter game. You play a mysterious character of unknown origin, equipped with advanced high-tech gears and fierce combating skills - definitely the chosen one for this rescue mission!

name: Sonic Riders Regravitified
summary: Sonic Riders Regravitified is a mod of Sonic Riders Zero Gravity that attempts to fix the game by making it faster, adding new mechanics, and rebalance and redesign the gears for competitive play.

name: Soul Recursion
summary: Soul Recursion is a story focused hack and slash challenging you to explore and uncover the mysteries hidden amongst utopian ruins.

name: Solenars Edge II: Champions
summary: Create your character, pick your ally and assemble a powerful team of over 70 champions. Fight your way through the VR Arena and become the greatest champion of the entire universe.

name: Soldier Warfare
summary: Action shooter game with tactical combat and realistic gameplay experence.

name: Soccer
summary: This soccer game for the Astrocade was developed in 1982 but did not see release at the time. In 1985 the unreleased prototype finally went into production and was released in limited quantities by Mike White Software.

name: Sonic Riders DX
summary: Sonic Riders DX is a mod for "Sonic Riders" that enhances the game with new playstyles and balance for competitive play while improving the quality of the game with additional music, giving characters access to more gears, and fixing jank.

name: Soccer
summary:
Soccer is Taito's third ever video game release and the first developed internally. The game was designed by the highly influential Tomohiro Nishikado, who would later go on to create Space Invaders.

Soccer is a ball-and-paddle game like Pong, but with a green background to simulate a playfield, allowing each player to control both a forward and a goalkeeper. The players can adjust the size of the players, who are represented as paddles on screen. It also has a goal on each side.

Soccer is likely to be Japan's first original domestically produced video game, in comparison to Japanese Pong clones released earlier, including Sega's Pong Tron and Taito's Elepong. Since it was exported to Europe in 1973 it may also be the first Japanese video game to be released on the European continent.

name: Somni
summary: Identify and fight back against ghosts and cryptid terrors. Somni is VR and Desktop Compatible. Identify the threat at hand and perform the proper ritual to purify it either alone or with your friends. Fend off your paranormal nightmares by investigating events and performing rituals to banish the entity for good.

name: Somnography
summary: An entry for dream diary jam 5, created by a team of four over the span of about one month.

name: Social Wars
summary: The only thing that sets this apart from other games is the fact that this game does not use 'energy' points that most Facebook games use, which takes time, certain items, and/or money. Another rather nice feature in the game is cash. Players can use cash in buying mechs, expanding your army and more.

name: Social Empires
summary: Social Empire is a game where your main enemy is the trolls. You can build homes for your army or Villages to help you chop trees or mine for gold or stone. Travel around the world in the ship and go Flying to reach the isle quests or attack others and pick your defensive strategy. But Beware, defend your empire against attacks from trolls and other players

name: Solo Royale
summary: Solo Royale is an offline, single-player battle royale game. It is a fast-paced battle royale, getting the player immediately into the action. Solo Royale also has a gulag game mode, where the player faces off in a single-elimination 1v1.

name: Sophia's World
summary: Classic platform gameplay meets brightly colored, timeless graphics and cute characters. Fun for the entire family: from the youngest kids to grandma and grandpa. In no time at all, everyone will be captivated by the concept and won't be able to stop playing until all the coins in the level have been found.

name: Soulstopia: Phi
summary: Restless spirits robbed of their dreams and ambitions arrive in Soulstopia; a realm where a lonesome maiden awaits to deliver them salvation — Set the ill-fated free in style using various attacks and transform into a Demon when backed into a corner!

name: Sola
summary: Sola is a 3rd Person 3D Runner-Platformer with Exploration elements. Can you manage to escape into another world, or will you keep repeating the same dream over and over again?

name: Soul Dream: Undesired Shift
summary: Evan and Aviary have been cast into the Undesired Reality, where unknown forces prevent them from returning to their reality. Confronted by two mysterious figures and assailed by monsters, Evan and Aviary must fight and determine the truth of the Undesired Reality

name: Sono Kubiwa wo Hanasanaide: Ookami wo Tabetai Akazukin to Akazukin wo Tabetai Ryoushi
summary: Don't Remove That Collar! Hungry Red Riding Hood v.s. Hungry Hunter

name: Souwan no Soldat: The Soldat with Twin Arms
summary: The Soldat with Twin Arms is 2.5D side-scrolling action game with focus on a exhilarating and comfortable battle. Let's clear the stages by using various skills such as wire action using two extended arms! Crush problems by going back and forth between the cyberpunk world and virtual spaces!

name: Solenars Edge Rebirth: After Story
summary: Two years after the events of Solenars Edge Rebirth. An old enemy returns from hiding and wreaks havoc among Alcornagia.

name: Songbirds: Creative Gaming
summary:
Create music, compose melodies, and craft soundscapes in Songbirds - a playful musical game for people of all ages and musical abilities. Relax in a calming, creative experience as you explore the sounds of the Songbirds in three unique musical environments:
• The Sky - Draw across the night sky and these birds will create beautiful melodies. Use all four tempos to build up complex polyrhythmic patterns.
• The Lake - These birds create sound as they dive into the water. Take control of their timing to compose intricate, calming melodies.
• The Flock - Guide the flock to craft soaring meditative soundscapes. Use the moons to build up compositional layers and harmonies.
Peace.

name: Sourcelight RPG
summary: Explore a large open world and enjoy an epic quest with loads of characters and mini games. Stand beneath the Sourcelight and be amazed!

name: Soviet Challenge: Javelin 1980
summary: Javelin throwers are competing with each other in the spotlight while the Cold War is raging behind the scenes. Be there when twelve human or phone controlled titans struggle to bring fame and glory to their country! After the competition, compare your statistics with other players' statistics world-wide using game's www-based statistics service. Twelve human or phone controlled players, six-round competitions - eight best athletes will proceed to the three final rounds, twenty countries of the era, six cities (Moscow, New York, London, Paris, Tokyo and Rome), touch screen optimized controls, continue from the exact spot you left off last time - excellent game for even the shortest gaming sessions, statistics with a www-based statistics service and an interactive soundscape.

name: Solitaire Adventure: The Resurrection of Faneruel
summary:
Take on the task assigned by Eloriel, the Wise.
The Ancient Tablets of Blessings are lost in the ruins of Faneruel
Clear the card formations by making the right choices and the longest chains to restore the tablets back to power.
Enjoy a distinctive game of solitaire where there are cursed cards to capture and magic wands to help.

name: Sock and Awe
summary: Sock and Awe is a minimal 2008 Flash game created by British entrepreneur Alex Tew, recreating the Bush shoeing incident and putting the player in the shoes of journalist Muntadar al-Zaidi who flinged a shoe at George W. Bush during a news conference.

name: Song of Life
summary: A small visual novel about the adventures of a guy named Leon, who wants to change his past. During his school years, a lot of interesting things happened, there were a lot of girls, and where is all this now… That's what Leon thought until he found an amulet that could send him back several years.

name: Songs of the Mystics
summary: Travel to the secluded Isla des Misticos, home to the enigmatic Mystics. You are the daughter of the Earth Queen, leader of the Mystics, and find yourself in dire peril from the outset. As you uncover a plot to end your life, you also discover new magical abilities through the power of songs. Can you escape from your predestined fate?

name: Soccer Rally
summary:
Rev up your engines! Get ready to experience soccer like never before!
The original and best Car Soccer game on the App Store! Soccer Rally combines the action of soccer with the adrenaline of Motorsport.
Drive to glory with your chosen Country as you smash, shoot and score your way through the Soccer Rally Euro 2012 Tournament.
Beat the Tournament and challenge your friends in head to head multiplayer on the same screen. Master and perfect your skills to become unstoppable!

name: Solitaire & Share
summary: Solitaire & Share puts a modern spin on the old classic solitaire card game. It’s striking, minimal, relaxing, and… multiplayer? Play by yourself or with friends! Who said solitaire had to be solitary?

name: Solitaire Kingdom Supreme
summary: Solitaire Kingdom is a fresh and fun version of your favorite Solitaire game. Play the Solitaire you know and love, but now you get to win special cards that will give you fantastic new powers. Add these cards to your deck and become the Solitaire master you know you are. Features include: Quick play which lets you play fast with just one click per card, an Award system that rewards you for big plays, and infinite Daily Challenges that keeps the fun going, and going, and going.

name: Solo Noble
summary:
Now play the game played by the European nobles in the court of Louis XIV back in 17th century on your iPhone or iPod Touch. It was a highly fashionable and popular board game among the European nobles back in the 17th century and was popular throughout Europe in the 18th and 19th century. Believe to be invented by a French aristocrat in the 17th century, when incarcerated in the Bastille, explaining the game's ancient name “Solo Noble”.

According to the game brochure (Milton Bradley Co., 1986), whoever succeeds in leaving the last peg in the center is a genius. Anyone who leaves a single peg elsewhere is an outstanding player. So why wait, test your self today to see if you are a genius or an outstanding player.

In the Fortune World, there is a magic energy called, Ether. You can get orbs as you refine the Ether. The Orb can be used for the resource to the magic. There is a class, Sorcerers, who uses orbs to spell the magic.
There are 8 orbs in the fortune world. You can use stronger magic as you place Orbs well-strategically.
40 Sorcerers with each story for new adventures and more than 250 various items. Meteor Dragon is related all of them and is centered in this Fortune World. Start your adventure to defeat the Meteor Dragon.

name: Soviet Unterzoegersdorf: Sector I
summary:
Soviet Unterzögersdorf (pronounced «oon-taa-tsee-gars-doorf») is the last existing appanage republic of the USSR. The enclave maintains no diplomatic relationship with the surrounding so-called «Republic of Austria» or with the Fortress «European Union». The downfall of her motherland -- the Soviet Union -- in the early 1990s had a particularly bad effect on the country’s economic situation.

It is a great challenge to secure survival for the small but proud confederation. External reactionary forces put the country in danger. It’s a lack of respect due to a morally corrupted and perhaps even non-existing unity of the peoples. The goal of a glorious future is almost unreachable.

But there are a handful of people who don’t give up on a vision for a better tomorrow. Let us tell you the stories of the brave citizens in the beautiful little country of Soviet Unterzögersdorf.

SonicN is nearly identical to Sonic Advance in terms of core gameplay. Several features however, are removed from the port or adjusted to it due the technical limitations of the handheld mobile.

name: Sonic Classic
summary:
Sonic the Hedgehog Classic is a fan game by Hez. It began as an offshoot of his earlier fan game Sonic 1 PC, with a variety of new levels. The game will allow users to play as three characters—Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles—and possibly a custom character of their own. The game features elements from the classic Mega Drive games, as well as new gimmicks.

The game currently uses the MMF engine for Windows and has had three releases, with the latest revision (see Downloads) fixing some issues reported by players of the previous version. Moreover, it is Sonic Retro
currently being converted to a hack for the Mega Drive by StephenUK. Finally, a few months after releasing the game, Hez Sonic Retro
announced that he had started working on its sequel Sonic Classic 2, whose features include various new power-ups and level elements and a complete original soundtrack by Karl Brueggemann.

Brand New Levels
4 playable characters (Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, and Fang)
New unique gimmicks
Customizable shields
SC1 revamped levels
Online Play
Extras & More!

name: Sod
summary: Sod is an extreme modification or "hack" of id Software’s action game Wolfenstein 3D, in which the goal was to escape from a Nazi dungeon. In Sod, Wolfenstein 3D’s representational renderings (considered state-of-the art at the time of the game’s release in 1992) have been replaced by pure geometrical forms in a limited palette of black, white and gray. The result is a game space that is loosely architectural and extremely disorienting; it is easy to get lost, and it can be difficult to distinguish the walls from the targets one is supposed to shoot. Paesmans and Heemskerk complement the game-play difficulties with a cryptic interface (setting game preferences is no easy task!) and tongue-in-cheek game instructions along the lines of "If you are tough, press N. If not, press Y daintily." With its stark elegance, Sod offers a compelling alternative to the computer game industry’s mindless pursuit of representational realism.

To complete various difficulty levels in this wonderful game, you will have to prove your mettle in intelligence and perceptiveness. You will control a single hero or multiple heroes and progress through subsequent levels by being smart and moving objects encountered on your way. Hold the left shift key to look around, and touch a wall to exit any room. Describing the game any further is equivalent to providing possible spoilers.

These two games are enhanced ports of the PC version of the original "Sonic Adventure DX: Director's Cut".

This bundle/enhanced port adds full widescreen support for the game.

summary: In this science fiction action shooter you are St. Karen a Soldier Of Light in the year 3000 tasked with a mission of destroying remnant robot AI forces and strongholds.

name: Solo ReflectioN!
summary: In this truly unique brick breaker game, you'll need to guard both sides of the screen to keep your balls in play. To earn points, you'll need to collect coins from broken bricks and then blow bank bubbles to have a way to exchange your coins for scoreboard points!

name: Soundsxworld
summary: Soundsxworld is a new and exciting way to experience new exclusive music, art and entertainment events in a changing and expanding metaverse.

name: Sonucido: The Mage - A Dungeon Crawler by Daniel da Silva
summary: Sonucido: The Mage is a grid-based, turn-based Dungeon Crawler RPG. Find the mage in the depths of Sonucido!

name: Soulstrive
summary: An epic journey for salvation of self begins here... Guide your disgraced prince on a journey of redemption across mysterious realms in this macro themed SHMUP.

name: Solo Knight
summary: Solo Knight is a hardcore Diablo-like game that has been designed and polished for 5 years. Come and create your Build from more than 200 pieces of equipment and 600 perks. Massive contents await you to explore.

name: Soul Land: Advent of the Gods
Sonic the Hedgehog Extreme
summary: Sonic Extreme was a prototype video game created by Vision Scape Interactive in May 2003. Proposed as a spin-off to Sega's Sonic the Hedgehog series, Sonic Extreme featured Sonic and Shadow riding hoverboards in a Green Hill Zone-themed open world, with gameplay likened to Tony Hawk's Pro Skater. It featured three gameplay modes, which included searching for keys and Chaos Emeralds and fighting or racing another player.

name: SongPop Party
summary: SongPop Party is the latest addition in the biggest music trivia franchise in the world with a huge catalog from cult classics to today's top hits, and hundreds of thousands of unlockable songs curated by genre, artists, decade, topics and more.

name: Soul Tide
summary: Soul Tide is an original title that combines anime girl collection, home simulation, and dungeon exploration. It is set in a fantasy world where witches kindled doom upon the land, and players are destined to turn the tide.

name: Sonic Dimensions
summary: Sonic Dimensions is a 2D fangame created by Phantom-Radea that takes inspiration from the gameplay style of Sonic Rush.

name: Solarpunk
summary:
Solarpunk is a survival game in a technically advanced world of floating islands. Alone or together with your friends, you can construct buildings, grow food, craft gadgets and explore distant islands with your own airship.

Use sunlight, wind and water to create an energy system and automate your processes like gathering ressoureces, watering your plants or catching fish.

name: Sok Max Pro
summary: SOK MAX PRO - A massive upgrade of the game to professional functionality. Online statistics, undo of a move, dark theme, windowed mode and much more!

name: Song of Souls
summary: Fight as an unknown warrior with various weapons, and dive into The Forest of Souls to find the souls of Lost Ancient Kings. Challenge them and get their power, then finally face your terminative destiny.

name: Solasta: Crown of the Magister - Lost Valley
summary: Escape from Lost Valley in this brand new level 1 to 12 campaign that will take your new party into the long forgotten lands of the Dominion. Ruled with an iron fist by the tyrant Orenetis, your arrival will light a fuse under this political powder keg!

name: Soulless
summary: The run 'n' gun platformer Soulless is back with this deluxe revival #MadeInStencyl

name: Sono Higurashi vs. Touhou Universe
summary: 90's-style 2D fighting action in which real-life men fight in cosplay. The first work in the series. * This work is a secondary creation game work based on the Touhou Project.

name: Solitaire TED and PET
summary: 120 unique layouts from an ancient world await! Experience new thrills!

name: Sok Min: Pro
summary: SOK MIN PRO - A massive upgrade of the game to professional functionality. Online statistics, undo of a move, dark theme, windowed mode and much more!

name: Sock It
summary: Sock It is a wacky, completely unhinged comedy boxing game with platforming and cutscenes. Box more than 12 crazy bosses! Platforming stages to break up the action! Cutscenes that guarantee 1 giggle (Usually around 5 hearty laughs)!

name: Soccer Hit
summary:
International Cup now included! Choose your favourite team and win the trophy!
Play soccer in a brand new way - have fun with fast arcade gameplay, simple controls and unique art style. Tap and swipe to aim, pass the ball between players - be precise! Tap as fast as you can to defend.
Take part in Euro, Asia, America, Africa and Oceania Cup - win all the trophies!

name: Something Wicked This Way Comes
summary:
A huge three-map single-player campaign of epic proportions: A vast arcane demon fortress built into a mountain, complete with a canyon start map and a bloody boss arena. The levels are based on the Drake mod (included) which features a plethora of new monsters and items. Many secrets (up to 30 secrets on the main map) and hard gameplay.

This map should last an experienced player up to one hour.

One of Tronyn's best map packs.

name: Sofia's Debt
summary: Sofia's Debt is a point-and-click adventure game released in 2004.

name: Soul Symphony
summary: A Trippy Physics Based RPG. Make your way around a maze and try to figure out what is happening between different NPCs as they tell you things based on an Eastern Philisophy known as Ling.

name: Sopa: Tale of the Stolen Potato
summary: Emotional narrative adventure about the things we pass along. Inspired by Miyazaki, Coco, and The Little Prince.

name: SoulShards Arena
summary: SoulShards Arena is an upcoming multiplayer game inspired by MMORPGs PvP modes. In teams of 3 players, defeat your opponents through powerful spells. But beware, as the Winds of Magic can be capricious ...

name: Soaring
summary: Climb upwards and uncover the mystery of your lost egg in this unique platformer. Along the way you will find hidden treasures, brave devious traps and hopefully keep solid footing, its a long way from the top !

name: SonderDo
summary: You have to survive the night until 08:00/8 AM. The only thing you have by your side is your flashlight. This game is a mix of Co-op, multiplayer, and strategy. It is especially hard to maneuver around the school since the teachers can hear you inside of an area.

name: Solos
summary:
Solos is a puzzle bullet hell with "paper style" graphics.
Practically you'll have to create your own bullet hell, by avoiding bouncing bullets you'll shoot trying to hit all screen elements.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Golf
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog Golf is a 2D golf game featuring Sonic, Tails and Knuckles trying to get golf balls to end-of-level signposts in various zones from Sonic the Hedgehog. Points are awarded for staying under par, as well as collecting rings and monitors.

name: Soccer League
summary:
Soccer League is a mobile game wich cames with Nokia devices, making it first appereance on the Nokia 1200 on 2007.
The game features a Cup with 3 levels of difficulty.

name: SongTrivia 2: Guess the song
summary: Create multiplayer games & play with your friends on The music trivia game !

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Level Creator
summary: The Sonic the Hedgehog Level Creator was an official flash Sonic game on the PlaySEGA Website.

name: Sonic XS
summary: Sonic XS is a Flash game that was available on the official 4Kids website. You play as "Sonic Xs", and have to get to the end of the level while collecting rings and defeating enemies.

name: Sonic the Sketchhog
summary: Sonic the Sketchhog is a 2D sidescroller platform game for mobile phones. The game features Sonic in a hand-drawn doodle style, reminiscent of Sonic 3 concept art, defeating badniks like Crabmeat as he advances his way though a drawn level.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode Metal
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode Metal is a free downloadable "Lock-On" part of the episodic game Sonic the Hedgehog 4, released along side of Episode II. It enables any player who owns both Episode I and Episode II on the same console to play Episode Metal, thereby acting very similar to the Lock-On Technology pioneered by Sonic and Knuckles. Episode Metal explains the backstory to Metal Sonic's return in Episode II and also serves to connect Sonic 4 to Sonic the Hedgehog CD, befitting the latter game's recent re-release on digital download services.

name: Sonic Advance
summary: Mobile device port of the Game Boy Advance game under the same name.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: The port of Sonic the Hedgehog for mobile phones (running J2ME).

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Forever
summary: Based on the recent decompilation of the mobile version, Sonic the Hedgehog Forever adds a number of abilities, options, and game modes to enhance the experience and celebrate the replayability of the game.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: Sonic Runner is a playable ad by Jack in the Box made to promote Tiny Tacos and the 2020 Sonic the Hedgehog movie.

name: Sonic Heardle
summary:
This is a clone of Joywave Heardle (which in turn was modeled on Heardle and K-Pop Heardle) that is focused on Sonic the Hedgehog.

Each Sonic Heardle is randomly chosen from one of several songs from the franchise - mostly the games with a few from adaptations (like the OVA or SatAM) thrown in as well.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Absolute
summary: A mod for the Sonic the Hedgehog 1/2 2013 Decompilation which has included bug fixes, extra options and abilities that are new to even the mobile ports. Arcade Mode has been added to the game modes menu. Ring Chain has been implemented and Knuckles and Tails are now available to play as a pair.

name: Someone Stole My Lunch!
summary: A short comedy visual novel about your lunch and a thief... both of which are hot.

name: Sonic in Super Mario Bros.
summary: A character hack of Super Mario Bros. that replaces the famous plumber with Sonic the Hedgehog. Features drastic changes made to emulate the Genesis Sonic games.

name: South Park
summary: South Park was a cancelled puzzle-platformer in which you must rescue Kenny in each level using Stan, Kyle, and Cartman using their unique attributes.

name: Soot
summary: Soot is a Simulation and Strategy game where you control the terraforming crew of the Ziggurat, a roaming space station that orbits small planets and exploits their resources. Follow Captain Christopher Mason and Lieutenant Ferdinand McCann as they (and you) master the craft of terraforming.

name: Somari the Adventurer
summary: Based off the unlicensed port of Sonic the Hedgehog for the NES/Famicom by Hummer Team, Somari the Adventurer replaces Sonic with 3 unique new moves. Mushroom Kingdom Zone is a newly added 1-Act level as the first zone.

name: Sonic 1 Spike Bug Fix & Spindash
summary: This ROM hack adds the Spindash from later Sonic games (and ports) and fix the notorious "Spike Bug", which causes the player to die after falling in a spiked pit.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Vol.2
summary: An improvement hack for Somari (NES) to fix some of its many bugs and level layout issues.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Character Pak
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog: Character Pak adds the option to play as four new characters in the first Sonic game:Classic Sonic, Modern Sonic, Luigi and Link.

name: Sonic CD++
summary: Sonic CD++ is a hack of Sonic the Hedgehog CD by qiuu and snkenjoi, adding the Sonic the Hedgehog 2 (16-bit) style Spin Dash and the newer Homing Attack into the game. This enables the gameplay to be significantly speedier, while Sonic CD is known to be one of the more slow-paced games in the classic Sonic series.

name: Sonic 3D: No Flickies
summary:
Sonic 3D: No Flickies is a hack of Sonic 3D: Flickies' Island made by Sik. The game remains mostly unchanged; however, the Flicky collection system (part of the core gameplay of the original game) has been removed, allowing the player to complete the levels without needing to collect all the flickies in the level to advance. This makes it much more similar to traditional Sonic games, where the goal is to simply make it to the end of the level without dying.

This hack was later built upon further in the hack, Super Sonic in Sonic 3D, which was also created by Sik.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Extreme Boarding
summary:
Sonic the Hedgehog Extreme Boarding is an LCD game created for distribution at McDonald's restaurants.. They were offered as a part of Happy Meals for a limited time in 2004. This particular game was also released under the name Sonic Skateboard.
