Can you help mend the relationship between the yokai and humans all while helping these boys overcome their own personal traumas? Can you find love among demons? Find out in Soul of Yokai!

name: Soulcreek
summary: Soulcreek is a sci-fi/romance FVN intended to be released in instalments. It features a human male protagonist with a changeable name and a single m/m love interest. Choices may alter dialogue or relationship dynamics, but are mostly used for roleplaying purposes and have no major consequential effects on the story. There will be a single ending.

name: Soto Nemuri
summary: Soto Nemuri is a Yume Nikki/Touhou fangame, made for Touhou Fan Game Jam 8. You play as Sumireko from the Touhou series and explore her dreams.

name: Solarian II
summary: Winner of countless awards and accolades, Solarian II is a Galaga-inspired space shooter, and one of the first colour/color games for the Macintosh.

name: Sonic Smash Brothers
summary: A flash-based Sonic fighting fangame based on Super Smash Bros. franchise. It has some characters from Sonic franchise and a campaign mode.

name: Soreike! Anpanman: Karada no Naka no Daibouken
summary: An interactive movie/game for the Terebikko in the Anpanman.

name: Soreike! Anpanman: Yukai nao Tanjoue
summary: An interactive movie/game for the Terebikko in the Anpanman franchise.

name: Soulmate Factory
summary: A good soulmate is hard to find...

name: Sorcerian Online
summary: An MMO RPG based on Nihon Falcom's Sorcerian franchise. Sorcerian Online expands the classic action-RPG into an extensive online RPG.

name: Soul Chomper
summary: In this small action roguelike you play as a little ghost, fighting your way through hordes of enemies to conquer their world. You have a big arsenal of different weapons at your disposal to achieve your goal, if you can find them. At the end you'll face one of two mini bosses before entering another world to be conquered.

name: Soul of War
summary:
The Soul of War is an adventure role playing module inspired by the fantasy role-playing game Dungeons & Dragons.

A classic RPG inspired by the famous Greyhawk adventure and using the D&D 3.5 ruleset.

name: Soot
summary: Help Sooty rescue his girlfriend Molly from the evil vacuum! 50 levels of puzzles and perils.

name: Sol Cresta: Wing Galiber II
summary:
Enrich your Sol Cresta experience as you pilot new fighters in this DLC.
Legendary fighters from the Cresta series are back and yours to maneuver as you try and stop Mega Zofer’s conquest of the solar system.

name: Sol Cresta: Wing Galiber
summary: Installing this DLC will add the new Wing Galiber fighter to the base game.

name: Sol Cresta: CR47
summary:
Legendary fighters from the CRESTA series are back and yours to maneuver as you try and stop Mega Zofer’s conquest of the solar system.

Installing this DLC will add the new CR47 fighter to the base game.

name: Sol Cresta: Legendary Fighters DLC Set
summary:
Legendary fighters from the Cresta series are back and yours to maneuver as you try and stop Mega Zofer’s conquest of the solar system.

Installing this Legendary Fighters DLC Set will add 3 new fighters to the base game.

name: Soul Warrior Battle
summary:
After another day of dodging bullies and surviving class, your evening is interrupted by a strange fortune-teller offering you a bracelet he claims will change your life.

Unable to refuse, you buy the trinket and hurry home. But when you’re confronted by a group of attackers, the unthinkable happens—your bracelet comes to life.

Forced into a game of life or death with a supernatural fighter by your side, it’s time to prove what you’re really made of!

name: Something Nefarious Below
summary: This is a FNAF styled game where you need to clean a ritual that took place, all while you feel someone is there with you. Do your job, pick everything up, and leave.

name: SongPop
summary:
From the creators of SongPop comes a brand new way for you to compete with Music Lovers from All Around the World.

Challenge your friends with more than 100,000 real music clips from your favourite artists and much, much more.

Listen to real music clips from artists such as the award-winning Billie Eilish, the renowned Ariana Grande, Justin Bieber, Cardi B, classic tunes from Queen, and more in the world’s most popular music quiz game.

Guess the correct artist and song title faster than everyone else to win!

name: Sora Tobu Henry
summary:
Sora Tobu Henry is a cancelled 1995 action Virtual Boy game that was in development by Human Entertainment and planned to be released in December of 1995 at 5,800 yen.
The plot centers Henry, a strange creature with big ears, plays the active role. The pride of Henry would that he would fly in the sky. He would slowly flutter through the air by flapping and fluttering his huge Dumbo-like ears as though a balloon floating in the air is moving in accordance with the player’s will.

name: Soccer Cup: World League
summary:
Equip with the latest soccer AI moves, this is the ultimate soccer game. The Arena is designed with HD graphics and an enthusiastic crowd. Enjoy the ultimate 11 player soccer simulation.
Soccer fever is high! Do you love soccer? Then this is the game for you! Download this game and polish your inner champion.

name: Soccer: Goal Keeper cup
summary: Goal keeper challenge: Hit left or right, there is no time to think. Be the hero tonight and save the team!!!

name: Sonic Sports
summary: Sonic Sports is an unreleased that was in development for the Sega 32X in 1995. The March 1995 issue of Game Players described the game as being similar to Acme All-Stars but using Sega characters instead. These characters included Sonic, Tails, and Ristar. Games hinted at being available included basketball, volleyball, and soccer.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 Limited Edition
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 Limited Edition was going to be a compilation of Sonic the Hedgehog 3 and Sonic & Knuckles for the Sega Mega Drive. This would be similar to what happens when locking the two games together with Sonic & Knuckles' Lock-On Technology. It would essentially be Sonic the Hedgehog 3 & Knuckles, but it would have been contained in a single cartridge and thus probably would have had a cheaper price. It is unknown whether it would have had a port allowing for Lock-On Technology so compatibility with other cartridges is also unknown.

name: Sonic Dash S
summary: Sonic Dash S is a Japanese exclusive mobile game released in 2014 for the Line app. It is an updated version of Sonic Dash and features a handful of changes from its original counterpart.

name: Sonic 20th Anniversary
summary: Sonic 20th Anniversary was an app that was available in the App Store for iOS devices. It was only available for a limited time during Sonic's twentieth anniversary, and it consisted of two games and wallpapers.

name: Sonic Cricket
summary: Sonic Cricket is a mobile game developed by the Indian developer, Studio Lakshyaby, and published by UTV Indiagames in cooperation with Sega. Released exclusively in India, the game was a part of the Sonic 20th anniversary celebration.

name: Sonic J
summary: Sonic J is a mobile action 2D platformer game developed and released by Sega in 2001.

name: SO-108
summary: Work, eat and survive. In a dystopian future where corporations make the rules of society, SO-108 needs to earn money to survive, until a strange phenomenon happens and completely turns his life around.

name: SokoChess White
summary: SokoChess White is a puzzle game about pushing Chess pieces into their destination and overcoming various obstacles. Enjoy 70 different handcrafted levels with a unique twist on the Chess formula.

name: Soul's Spectrum
summary: Immerse yourself in this dark fantasy adventure where death is not the end but an incentive to keep going: several puzzles await you while a unique story will slowly unfold as you explore this mysterious supernatural place.

name: Sonic Putter
summary: Sonic Putter is a mobile phone game released for i-mode 90x devices by DoCoMo.

name: Sonic Slider
summary: Sonic Slider is an online Flash game published on the 4Kids TV website by 4Kids Entertainment in January 2005 to promote the then-airing anime series, Sonic X. It is a Sonic-themed sliding puzzle.

name: Sonic X Snake
summary: Sonic X Snake is an online Flash game published on the 4Kids TV website by 4Kids Entertainment in January 2005 to promote the then-airing anime series, Sonic X. It is a simple Sonic X-themed game of Snake.

name: Sonic x Vapor
summary:
Sonic x Vapor was a promotional advergame released in 2012. It was a collaboration between Sega and Nike to promote Nike's Vapor shoes. The graphics and gameplay are based on those of the original 16-bit Sonic the Hedgehog, though Sonic's sprites have been altered so that he wears the eponymous shoes.

In the game, Sonic runs endlessly through a level. The player must destroy Badniks and collect Rings for points. The player will encounter soccer balls, which can be kicked to destroy Badniks. Speed increases as the game goes on. Losing a life ends the game. After the game ends, the player may post their score on their Facebook or Twitter account.

name: Soccer Swipe & Match 3
summary: Test your reaction and agility in this exciting soccer themed swiping and matching game, featuring four different and addictive modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

name: Soccer Match
summary: Test your reaction and agility in this exciting soccer themed swap and matching game, featuring three different and addictive modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous soccer packed levels as you try your hardest to be top of the league.

name: Sonic Dash Extreme
summary: Sonic Dash Extreme is an arcade version of the mobile phone game, Sonic Dash, developed by Sega Amusements and released by Sega. The arcade version features daily and all-time leaderboards and different control methods for large-sized d-pad controllers.

name: Soccer Slam!
summary:
Tap the players to keep the ball in the air.
Try to get all three medals!

name: Soccer Showdown 3
summary: Soccer Showdown's genre-revolutionizing PhysKick engine gives you perfect control over every kick. This isn't your average "flick-the-ball" soccer game. Soccer Showdown is entirely physics based; your finger IS your foot.

name: Soccer Wind Shot
summary: You must kick the ball in the goal in this simple and addictive windy soccer game!

name: Souls of Chronos
summary: Classic JRPG + Action Combat System

name: SoundStorm
summary: A Shoot 'em Up with music driven gameplay. Bullets flash to the rhythm of the music. Hit the bullets exactly on the beat to destroy them and make chain reactions. Feel the music and enjoy the unique game experience combining patterns and rhythms.

name: Solitaire
summary: Solitaire is a pre-installed game in Red Star OS 2.0.

name: Somnamulizer: A Tale From Olympus U
summary: Help Hypnos the god of sleep become a hit at an Olympian party, win the girl of his dreams and finally escape living in a cave in the underworld with his ex-girlfriend.

name: Sound Novel Tsukuuru Taiou: Okiraku Kouza
Sound Novel Tsukuuru Taiou: Zapping Gekijou
SomethingWithSpace
summary: A desolate and derelict station has been uncovered. You've been tasked with investigating, only to find the station's automated defenses are still active! How is it still... "alive"? Pilot your ship and find out! Can you make it out... "alive"? This helps me get through school! Hope you enjoy!

name: Soccer Super Star
summary:
Live the life of a Soccer Star! Enjoy pure gameplay without annoying ads :)
You are the star of the show as you launch your soccer career as a fragile 16 year old in this sports RPG from Game Chefs. Build your skills, lifestyle and ride the roller-coaster of life as you experience every emotion this great sport has to offer!
Manage your relationships, keeping team-mates, the coach, your partner and your sponsors happy as you face dilemmas and exciting twists along the way.
Become a star, explore sinister bribes and eventually retire!
Equally enjoyable as a snack game for a few minutes or an intensive few hours, this game will leave you entertained, amused and hungry for more, and it’s entirely free to play without any restriction!
Instinctive controls, laced with detail, entertainment, mini-games, shocks, surprises and sheer unadulterated joy, a must have. The perfect marriage of quick play phone game, football management, sim and RPG.

name: SokoMage
summary: SokoMage is a new top-down puzzle that will push your brain to the limit. Slap rocks, avoid bushes, and hit the crystal to reach the end! Can you smash your way to the final level?

name: Sonic & Johnny
summary: Sonic & Johnny is a complete heavy modification of Sonic the Hedgehog by Lone Devil for the Sega Genesis. Featuring Johnny from Sonic Rush Adventure as a playable character that can be raced with Estimated Time Limits, New Zones with familiarity, Original Bosses, Sonic 1 Mode with slightly different layouts...

name: Sorceress
summary: Explore the inside of a sprawling castle where human lives are being sacrificed in the name of science. Sorceress is a first person physics-based action adventure game where you will become a versatile wielder of arcane gadgetry in a highly dynamic environment that rewards wits above raw skill.

name: Something Amazing Room
summary: This game is not normal. It has no traditional objectives or traditional gameplay. In the game, you explore the world and community of the things that own the space you explore, named Meeple's. You learn about who they are, and what the world is.

name: Sodaman
summary: Sodaman, he's a space agent. He must stop the hostile aliens trying to destroy the universe and save the carbonated drinks they destroyed. Maybe you should help him out?

name: Sokoball Dreams
summary: Sokoball Dreams is a minimalist puzzle game. The goal is to beat all the puzzles using the least possible moves.

name: Solid River
summary: Immerse yourself in a game where survival MMORPG meets RTS. Building your kingdom, craft, trade, keep your people happy, socialize, fight, protect them and survive this ambitious and dangerous world in this realistic adventure.

name: Soul Taker
summary: Win your way out of Hell by Playing the CardGame SoulTaker. A Fun Card Game With a Strong Relaxing Atmosphere and Anime Like Visuals, combined with a Cute Card Dealer From Hell.

name: Somewhere in between
summary: A beautiful, 3rd-person narrative driven adventure game. Centered around a boy Milo who lost his dog Buddy . Boy was given an responsibility to take care of Buddy, but Buddy got lost. Embark on an adventure and help Milo overcome anxiety and solve the puzzles to reunite with Buddy.

name: Soul Stalker
summary: The survivor roguelike where you slay your psyche. Take down waves of enemies in the natural evolution of the genre established by Vampire Survivors, with visuals inspired by Paper Mario.

name: Something's Out There
summary: Something's Out There is a micro-horror creature hunting game, featuring multiple unique creatures across multiple maps. Hunters work together using the tools provided at base or found around the map to track down, hunt, and ultimately kill the creature of which only stories claim exist.

name: Soul Bound Saga
summary: A single player sci-fi/fantasy based role playing game with optional multiplayer aspects. Traverse the world, unlock the true power within your Soul.

name: Soccer Clubs
summary: Soccer Clubs Football Manager is a football e-sports game authorized by FIFPro. The game has IP authorization for more than 60000 professional players from more than 54 countries around the world, including Cristiano Ronaldo, Messi, Mbape and so on, creating a luxury football feast for players.

name: Southern Legends: The Temple Defenders
summary: Master the arcane arts of magic and mow down hundreds of dark spawns. Defend the ancient temple and its treasures till dawn! Temple Defenders is a casual game with rogue-lite elements, where your choices can mean either you will survive or perish the night. Gather gold and upgrade your skills/stats.

name: Soul Passage
summary: The fate of the unbound souls is in your hands. Take control of Obligor with lots of different skill and weapon combinations, and fight, and explore different planets in Soul Universe. A fantastic 2D hand-drawn Metroidvania with a unique quest and story system.

name: Soar
summary: Soar through the mountains at breakneck speeds. Experience the thrill of adrenaline as you maneuver through canyons and fly over majestic peaks.

name: Songs of Death
summary: Roguelite, rhythm，survival game. You need to play the role of Ma Chao, upgrade weapons in the battle, combine fetters, break through the tight encirclement, fight your way out, even if cursed by the world, you have to kill your father's enemy Cao Cao!

name: SokoMelody
summary: Solve puzzles in this old school style Sokoban, and help the composers with their songs.

name: Sokoban
summary: This is a leisure puzzle game.

name: Soccer Board
summary: Soccer Board - is a turn-based board game. Football based game for one player. Move around the board, pass the ball, score goals and don't let your opponent take the ball. Play soccer on a board in this tactical movement game.

name: Solaro
summary: Solaro is a handcrafted open-world game set in the remote outskirts of an ancient galaxy. Follow a lone traveller on an interstellar journey, solving puzzles, probing planets, and recovering lost fragments of the past.

name: Sonic In VaporWave Island
summary: Sonic just wondering around one day until he finds a portal to vaporwave island.

name: Soul Knight: The Forest of Spirits
summary: A lone knight is lost in an enigmatic cave, now he must rely on his unshakable soul to face unknown challenges and uncover secrets in this journey of cunning and bravery. Your mission is to find the way out facing the darkness, avoiding obstacles and finding solutions to the challenges.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Spinball
summary: 8-bit port of Sonic the Hedgehog: Spinball.

name: Sonic Head On
summary: Sonic Head On is a mobile action game developed and released by Sega in 2001.

name: Sonic Logic
summary: Sonic Logic is a mobile puzzle game developed and released by Sega in 2001. As with most early mobile games of the time, this title features extremely simple graphics and controls.

name: Sonic's Bomb Squad
summary: Sonic's Bomb Squad is a mobile action game developed and released by Sega in 2001. As with most early mobile games of the time, this title features extremely simple graphics and controls.

name: Sonic Colors: Ultimate Online Puzzle
summary: Sonic Colors: Ultimate Online Puzzle is an interactive puzzle game by Nintendo made to promote Sonic Colors: Ultimate.

name: Sorcerer's Choice: Angel or Demon?
summary:
Sorcerer’s Choice: Angel or Demon? is a dark fantasy visual novel that tells the story of a boy called Lucil, the grandson of a great magician. After his house is attacked by a mob, his grandfather teleports him to safety. Burned and battered, Lucil is aware of two beings standing over him: one of Light, and one of Darkness.

Which hand will he take? What fate awaits him when he chooses?

name: Sovranti
summary: Sovranti is an entire board game library that you can play from your PC, tablet or phone. Our rules-enforced gameplay helps folks learn games, keeps track of scoring and gives you the feeling of sitting around a table with friends! Discover our growing catalog of competitive, coop and solo games.

name: Sora no Tsukurikata: Under the Same Sky, Over the Rainbow
summary:
Naoka is a city shrouded in a pervasive thick fog. It is known not only for its vampires, but also as the place for people who have lost sight of their goals in life. Ryou is one such individual who lost his purpose and confidence after a past failure. While he works for a detective company, but he’s rather a jack-of-all-trades dealing with minor troubles, like searching for lost belongings or fixing roofs.

One day as he was listlessly passing time, he happened upon a self-proclaimed magician Hal who had come to the city to attend the magic school there. After helping her with some problems, she ended up helping him at the agency. Hal was tough, friendly and positive – all traits which he had lost. Will they fill the voids in each others’ hearts by being together?

name: Songs of Silence
summary: Songs of Silence is an Art Nouveau-inspired fantasy strategy game with a unique mix of turn-based kingdom management, hero development and real-time combat.

name: Sollarion
summary:
Sollarion is a turn-based strategy that combines a collectible card game and a 3D strategy genre. Players summon units and cast spells using their pre-built deck. Summoned units can be moved around the board and attack enemy units and structures. The player who destroys an opponent's portal wins.

It is necessary to occupy resource tiles and build mines there to play more powerful cards. There are also other special effect tiles on the board that expand the range of possible play styles. Each player will find their own winning strategy.

Map terrain and tile layout are different in every match, making Sollarion less repetitive, more complex and more entertaining than its competitors.

name: Soul Guardians
summary: Soul Guardians is a 2D cross-scroll action RPG game. Hired as a mercenary of the Empire, the protagonist goes on a journey to stop the conspiracy of the Dark Forces Undertaker. Raising unique characters, collecting and combining chain arts to enjoy your own hot action!

name: Somber
summary:
It's been 30 years since the mysterious abandonment of the R.R.C Titan, a giant factory ship orbiting around a dying star. What was once a technological powerhouse, creating the most intelligent and sturdy robots, made to replace humans in tasks that demand lot's of back breaking labor and complex calculations, is now a rotting wreck floating aimlessly around its star.

While the company and its founder were always a source of controversy, nobody has claimed any sort of attack on the facility. Making the sudden abandonment all the more mysterious.

You awaken on board this ship, not knowing who you are or how you got there.

You get an incoming message from a humanoid robot named Rick, who tells you that the robots on the ship have become self sustained and will kill any intruders.
He can help you escape, if you help him in return.

Will you trust Rick?

name: Solar Survivors
summary: Build the ultimate space fighter as you uncover clever strategies and hidden synergies. Overcome weakness and slay hoards of rebels in order to defend your gods. Solar Survivors distills the deep strategy and progression of an RPG into quick, arcade-like sessions.

name: Solium Infernum: Rectification
summary:
Solium Infernum: Rectification is a free mini expansion pack that brings new rules, mechanics and play elements to the game that pits you as an Archfiend with the ambition of ruling Hell.

The expansion content could be enabled before game creation and it added new rules, diplomatic options, manuscripts, rituals, relics, artifacts, praetors and legions.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: The expanded version of Sonic the Hedgehog present in Sonic Jam. The main change is that Sonic is now able to use the Spin Dash, not present in the original game, changing the gameplay flow.

name: Sonic World
summary: Sonic World is the first 3D experience of Sonic the Hedgehog, released in Sonic Jam. It is a playable and interactive map.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 port included in the Game.com port of Sonic Jam.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 port included in the Game.com port of Sonic Jam.

name: Sonic & Knuckles
summary: Sonic & Knuckles port included in the Game.com port of Sonic Jam.

name: SoulCalibur VI: Deluxe Edition 2019
summary: The SoulCalibur VI: Deluxe Edition includes SoulCalibur VI and all DLC characters.

name: Soorimo River
summary:
Up in the highest mountains lies the mystical land of Soorimo. The hidden valley is named upon Soorimo River, the sacred waters that span the border between the two ancient settlements. It's habitants constantly fight with each other for Soorimo's domination.
This fascinating card game challenges your strategic skills while it offers endless hours of fun with your friends! Your goal is to eliminate your opponents soldiers' cards in order to win the match and conquer Soorimo! A number of different soldiers, each one of them with different power, are at your disposal while battling. Based on your strategy you can focus on removing cards directly from the enemy's pile stock by approaching the enemy's base or destroy cards in the battle field by attacking. If you're strong enough to place two of your soldiers' cards in the opponent's base the victory is definitely yours.

name: Soko
summary:
A teeny Sokoban for Playdate, packed with over 400 puzzles and the ability to load your own levels.

There are 7 unlockable characters to play with (plus one Catalog-exclusive bonus hero). Players can collect these characters by solving puzzles.

name: Southern Cross
summary: The tale of a wandering swordsman seeking the Strongest, at the end of his journey.

name: Soccer Stars: Football Kick
summary:
Compete in different tiers, from different countries! Play online against people from all over the world or against your friends! Login with your Facebook account and challenge your friends to show them what it means to be a Soccer Legend and take the cup home! Oh, and you can also play offline against a friend in the same device!
You can also customize your Soccer Stars experience by collecting the different teams! Show off your style and defend your nation’s colors!

name: Solfege
summary: Kagura is a high school student who returns to her old school after three years abroad. There, she wants to meet again her sempai Sukune, who she admired since she was little. But she has also more friends: the active Chiho and the serene Kotomi. But it seems Sukune has forgotten her! What's happening...?

name: Sokfest
summary: Point-and-click your way through an online festival terrain, celebrating the 100th Sokpop game! Befriend the characters from all 100 Sokpop games, and explore a bustling festival with colourful characters!

name: Solo
summary: (Not) a lonely night.

name: Soccer Academy Simulator
summary:
Soccer Academy: make a business on education and training of soccer players!
If you do not like how your favourite soccer team participates in tournaments, if you constantly criticises the actions and physical form of players so Soccer Academy Simulator is created especially for you. In your hands is a real soccer academy, where you can train and teach the players.

name: SoulCast
summary: SoulCast is an online action RPG set in a dark and gritty fantasy world where players compete or cooperate with each other to defeat bosses, enemy factions and other players in intense multiplayer clashes.

name: Someday You'll Return: Director's Cut
summary: How far would you go if your daughter didn’t come home? Someday You’ll Return: Director’s Cut is a first-person psychological horror. This story-driven game offers enhanced features, an improved story, and additional content. Enter the woods if you dare and begin a search you’ll never forget.

name: Soccer Moves
summary: Outsmart defenders with your clever moves and become the ultimate soccer legend!

name: SolveWithMe
summary:
Are you ready for a new Word Search experience?
An incredible puzzle developed in the heart of undiscovered Siberia. Easy-to-use, extremely polished but still simple, this game offers tons of various puzzles. Colors, cars, space ships, pirates, songs, celebrities... I bet you'll lose count of all the themes! Drag lines, use hints, share your scores with 2 most popular social networks ever made.

name: Soccer Lines
summary: Soccer Lines is a super addictive, simple, yet challenging puzzle game. Remove soccer themed pieces from the board by lining up five pieces of the same colour in a vertical, horizontal or diagonal direction. Testing wits and reflexes, more pieces are added after every move, forcing you to think ahead to stop the board from filling up. Use special power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Adventure Sonic
summary:
Features:
- Easy to digest physics and moveset taking the best from Sonic Adventure 1 and 2!
- Outstanding support for controllers and simple mode. Give it a try on SA-Sonic and be surprised! (NOTE: Bind "Center Camera" to a comfortable button, you might prefer it over manual camera turning!)
- A fleshed out super form, custom NiGHTS moveset, many easter eggs, and deep-rooted mechanics hardcore fans will instantly recognize!
- A custom Adventure menu for cosmetical and accessibility options!
After around a year of work, Adventure Sonic (AKA SA-Sonic!) is complete! SA-Sonic heavily alters the game's physics to resemble Adventure 1 and 2's, whilst scaling everything to still feel good within an SRB2 context.

Sonic has more turning control and air resistance like in Adventure, and much stronger interactions with slopes! SRB2 normally encourages you to stay airborne to keep your speed and zoom over obstacles, but SA Sonic is instead at his fastest on the ground!

Adventure Sonic supports all control styles! (strafe, standard, & simple) Normally SRB2 prioritizes keyboard+mouse, with controllers being a massive self-induced handicap. But SA-Sonic was designed with a controller-play in mind, as that's what comes to mind for us when we think "3D Sonic platformer". The primary goal was to make Adventure Sonic control naturally for both casual players and SRB2 physics loyalists both. Here's hoping we achieved that goal!

name: Sonic Origins Plus
summary:
Sonic Origins Plus is an updated version of Sonic Origins that includes the Plus Expansion Pack. Unlike Sonic Mania Plus, Sonic Origins Plus can be bought digitally on PC as a single purchase like the console versions, while the base game continues to be available on it's own. Digital versions of Sonic Origins on all platforms can be upgraded to Plus by purchasing the Plus Expansion Pack separately.

Experience the collected adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog in the newly remastered Sonic Origins Plus! With 16 legendary Sonic titles including 12 game gear games, new playable characters, modes, challenges, behind the scenes content, and more, this is the definitive way to play these classic games!

Sonic Origins Plus will be available as an all-in-one bundle in both digital and premium physical editions that include the Sonic Origins base game and the Plus Expansion Pack, featuring 12 Sonic Game Gear titles, playable Knuckles in Sonic CD, and for the first time ever, Amy Rose as a playable character in Sonic the Hedgehog 1, 2, Sonic 3 & Knuckles, and Sonic CD! This pack also includes previously released add-on content: Extreme Missions, Mirror Mode, new character animations, and additional backgrounds and music.

The premium physical release marks the first time any version of Sonic Origins was available on physical media. Released for Xbox One, PlayStation 4 and Switch, in addition to including the complete version of Sonic Origins Plus on a disc/cartridge it also comes packaged with a reversible cover with alternate box art, an art book and an outer sleeve.

name: Soccer World Cap
summary:
Take your team to glory !!! Think fast, aim, shoot, and the ball is at the bottom !!!!
Test your skill and aim by taking your favorite country or team and make it a legend.
Every time you win you will accumulate rewards to improve the skills of your team; In addition, you have the opportunity to have fun playing against a friend on the same device.
Choose between National Teams and clubs from all over the world, or fantasy teams, play on different courts and prove that you can be the champion.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Very Hard Mode
summary: The Very Hard Mode difficulty DLC consists of more enemies, being forced to take the hard paths and even going through levels backwards; amigos also get a bigger role in this than in normal gameplay.

name: Sonic Mania Atmosphere
summary: Welcome to Sonic Mania Atmosphere! A complete modpack of new, reimagined and returning zones along with a completely new soundtrack to create a fresh Mania experience unlike any before. The mods and music included are compliled from the best of the gamebanana modding community and Sonic Youtube community musicians to create a fluid and polished 2D Sonic experience from start to finish rivaling that of a sequel game.

name: ​Sonic Robo Blast 2: Official Level Design Collab 2022 - Round 2
summary:
The Official Level Design Collab (formally Official Level Design Contest) is a collection of levels from the SRB2 community.

Contributions:
- Auburn Heights Zone, Act 1 - Cool Cat
- Seaside Coast Zone - M/C Industries
- Speed Highway Zone - LucasLixoso
- Lost Fortress Zone, Act 1 - EAJS
- Egg TV Network - Rogerregorroger
- Poison Temple Z Zone - Zaxel Katsugyo
- Greens Hill Zone - RoyKirbs
- Creepy Crypt - Vixuzen
- Crash Coarse Zone, Act 1 - Voidy2246
- Shiverside Chasm - M/C Industries

Capture-the-Flag:
- Firmir Nexus Zone - Chuckles troll
- Desolate CTF Zone - CG64

Match/Tag:​
- Cloistered Woods Zone - Blast98

Circuit​:
- Gambit Valley Zone - JABSphere94

Battle Capture-the-Flag:
- Sunset Park Zone, Act 1 - PeneBoi

name: Sonic Adventure Genisys
summary: Rumors of a Sonic Adventure remake are floating around in the Sega offices and Tails created a Knuckles Terminator robot to be send back in time and investigate what's going on. And things are going to go a lot more Meta and insane from there on.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Cacee "Kiwi" Cactus
summary:
A character addon for Sonic Robo Blast 2.

Cacee "Kiwi" Cactus is here from Mirage Saloon Zone! She used to be a bandito, but she's given up her days of crime... mostly.

name: Sonic R Characters: Metal Knuckles & Tails Doll
summary:
A character pack for Sonic Robo Blast 2.

After being disowned by their creator after their failure to acquire the Chaos Emeralds in Sonic R, Metal Knuckles and Tails Doll join Sonic and Co. to take down Dr. Eggman! This duo of doppelgangers have returned from their previous outing with some new tricks that players can utilize to explore stages in brand new ways, similar to that of their original organic counterparts.

name: Sokoboxes Duo
summary: A new game based on Sokoban.

name: Souseishi, Arui wa Doukoku no Mokushiroku: Incarnation Erased from History
summary: Touhou-style independent shooting game featuring original characters and world.

name: Solasta: Crown of the Magister - Palace of Ice
summary: Although the heroes of Caer Cyflen managed to prevent the Soraks' attempt at reopening the Rift to unleash their foul god upon Solasta, the threat is far from over. Kingdom of Gallivan has suddenly declared war on their neighbours, and the Snow Alliance is calling for your help!

name: Some Spring Days
summary: This game is a visual novel game about some spring days when a sensitive girl meets a upperclassman and loses herself in thought. Play time is very short, about 10 minutes. About 20 stills.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Seaside Hill Zone
summary:
Seaside Hill from Sonic Heroes comes to SRB2 as a single player map!
This map features multiple pathways, emblems, and custom enemies.

name: Song of the Sea VR
summary:
Cartoon Saloon invites you to step inside the Great Storyteller’s Cavern inspired by their Oscar-nominated hand-drawn animated feature film ‘Song of the Sea’.

Experience immersion in one of the film’s beautiful, expressive environments and meet the unpredictable, zany Storyteller himself! Unravel the story of the Selkie and how the fate of all the faeries is connected to her own in this interactive narrative.

name: Sonic Storm
summary: Sonic Storm is a Sonic fan game that takes place after Sonic CD. This game takes inspiration from Y2K and street culture, from its stylised shading and user interface to its heavy focus on grinding and maintaining combos.

name: Sonic Origins Plus: Day One Edition
summary:
Experience the collected adventures of Sonic the Hedgehog in the newly remastered Sonic Origins Plus! With 16 legendary Sonic titles including 12 Game Gear games, new playable characters, modes, challenges, behind the scenes content, and more, this is the definitive way to play these classic games!

Those who purchase the Physical Edition will also receive a retro-inspired reversible coversheet, and a 20-page artbook.

name: Soothsayer: The Oraclepus Knows All
summary: Your destiny has already been decided.

name: Solitaire 21 Card Sort
summary:
Welcome to Solitaire 21 Card Sort, an offline game that requires no ads and collects no data.
The objective of the game is to sort cards and sum up the score to 21 in each round to clear the board. But watch out for the timer and lives - a wrong move costs a life! Make strategic moves to clear levels and unlock new cards, floors, and tables.
Features of Solitaire 21 Card Sort include a simple tap mechanism, a tutorial page to learn the rules of the game, earning game coins each round, hourly game coin rewards, an endless game mode, and a game score board.
To play Solitaire 21 Card Sort, simply sort the cards and add them up to 21. The game comes with a tutorial page - tap the ? to learn the rules of the game.
Get started with Solitaire 21 Card Sort today, a classic card game with a twist!

name: SoulJah Kingdom Rise
summary: SoulJah Kingdom Rise is the first look at an upcoming 3rd Person shooter Action-Adventure franchise. Set in Jamaica in the year 2093, play as Akan and experience the first look at the world of SKR. Complete objectives, find secrets and clean the streets.

name: Sorcerers Summit
summary: An army of contraptions swarm the skies, and it is up to you, a lone sorcerer to defend the castle wall. Let None Pass! Move quickly, dash quicker, and bam, boom, blast them out of the skies with your magic. See how long you can last in this simple and stylish score attack game.

name: Somnus
summary: Somnus is an action-packed dungeon crawler game where players embark on a perilous journey to defeat an ancient evil that poisons life underground. With cool pixel art and challenging gameplay, Somnus is an exciting adventure for gamers.

name: Solitaire
summary:
Solitaire is a new experience of Solitaire Game. Play Solitaire to wake up your brain in the morning or to clear your mind before going to bed.
Solitaire has so many beautiful card's styles you can change and discover. You can touch or drag the cards to complete the game the way you feel most comfortable. Solitaire is concerned about the comfort of your experience. Solitaire has many card's styles and background's styles you can explore will make you feel excited and surprised.

name: Sound Garden
summary: A puzzlescript game in which you create a garden of sounds.

name: Solitaire
summary: Solitaire is a game by Nokia that came pre-installed in some Nokia mobile phones, like Nokia 6101 and Nokia 6060, running J2ME.

name: Song in the Smoke: Rekindled
summary: Battle strange beasts and brave the elements to stay alive in Song in the Smoke: Rekindled, a spectacular PlayStation VR2 remaster of the award-winning VR survival game set in a world outside of time.

name: Software Tycoon: Der Spielemanager
summary:
Software Tycoon puts you in the role of a game studio CEO. You start out in the 1980s, where you hire your first employees and develop your first games and research new technologies and genres to create even better games.
Besides a free-style mode without any goal, the game does feature various scenarios.

A spiritual successor to the game was released under the name of Mad Games Tycoon by two of the main developers of the original game: Stefan and Christian Pohl.

name: Sorrowful Night
summary: Sorrowful Night is a 4 versus 1 multiplayer game developed using Unreal Engine 5. You can play as evil sorcerers and witches hunting terrified villagers to satisfy your hunter needs, or try to resist by embodying one of the 4 villagers capable of banishing the sorcerer or witch.

name: SokoLab
summary: SokoLab is a Sokoban game where you play as a cute robot! Push blocks to the objective to reach the end of the level, new mechanics are introduced throughout the game adding layers of complexity to the puzzles! Can you reach the last level?

name: Son of a Gun
summary: Action packed top down shooter full of bullets, blood and explosions. Collect and manage your guns to fight jungle zombies, swarming bugs, heavy robots, slimy monsters and even space ghosts.

name: SokoSolitaire
summary: SokoSolitaire is a card-pushing puzzle game inspired by Sokoban and Solitaire. You'll find yourself pushing, stacking or flipping cards and more across 60 different handcrafted levels.

name: Sombreros
summary: A game featured in Action 52.

name: Soccer Dribble Cup: High Score
summary: Only 3 rules: Dribble through all defenders, Reach opponent goal, Shoot to score!!!

name: Soulvester vs. Lil' Beezey
summary: Show Lil' Beezey who the boss of Winkletown is in this addictive and fast paced 2D action roguelite! Created from scratch in only 14 days and nominated for GDWC Game Jam GOTY, Soulvester comes to Steam for the first time, now with controller support and achievements!

name: So Much Stuff 2
summary: So much more stuff to find in this game!

name: Socket Fighters
summary: Domestic appliances battle it out in this 2D fighting game. Fight in familiar household settings using everyday items as weapons. Enjoy unique character animations and special attacks for an action-packed experience!

name: Soliloquy
summary: In a vast desert, a lost young man's voice interrupts its silence. While he tries to survive, reality and fiction blur, questioning the perception of existence, freedom and control.

name: Sonic: Project Survival
summary: Sonic: Project Survival is a Sonic fan game that is Mega Drive-style Sonic platformer, with original zones based of classic games in the series.

name: Soccer Heroes RPG
summary:
Welcome to the best RPG fantasy soccer cards game! Become one of the greatest football heroes playing with your dreamteam over the world! Play as a soccer captain and manage your players to win every match! Soccer Heroes is the best fantasy soccer game ever!
Pass, dribble, shoot and goal! Experience real soccer as you create your own football dreamteam signing new players as a captain. Choose your soccer cards, level up and evolve your soccer heroes and score amazing goals in this manga soccer game!
Download Soccer Heroes, the ultimate football manager, and start scoring goals and managing your dreamteam to victory!

name: Soul Cliff
summary: A souls-like game about saving a trapped beloved beneath a collapsed sink-hole. The gameplay mechanics is a souls-like experience with the added ability of an ultimate ranged attack minus a riposte mechanic. It is a short-story with a potentially confusing moment.

name: Solitaire
summary: An unlicensed NES port of Solitaire that is included in the Windows 2000 NES demake.

name: Sorcerer's Choice: Angel or Demon? Steam Version
summary:
Sorcerer’s Choice: Angel or Demon? is a dark fantasy visual novel that tells the story of a boy called Lucil, the grandson of a great magician. After his house is attacked by a mob, his grandfather teleports him to safety. Burned and battered, Lucil is aware of two beings standing over him: one of Light, and one of Darkness.

Which hand will he take? What fate awaits him when he chooses?

name: Sonic Boom
summary:
Sonic Boom was the first Klik & Play Sonic fan game to hit the internet. It was created by Martin Braid in 1995. The initial release had a virus, so it was taken down temporarily. It was re-released in 1996 by Magnus Andersson.

Due to the open-sourced nature of Klik and Play, Sonic Boom later re-appeared in saxman's Sonic Klik & Play Collection along with demos of Sonic PC and Tails and the Quest of 100 Rings. It was also re-released as Rotor Boom by Ian Klukan, the Archie character Rotor Walrus replacing Sonic.

name: Sorority Rites
summary:
In the year 2014, Myles finds her world crashing down as she finds herself the target of a mysterious college organization known as The Sorority. Horror reaches new heights for Myles as she is coerced into staying at an abandoned mansion, but the unexpected company from a new friend may just give her the courage she needs.

Uncover the roots of evil in Sorority Rites, a kinetic visual novel horror game that reveals the dark pasts of characters from the AppSir Games Universe.

name: Sonic 3 Fighter Sonic
summary: Sonic 3 Fighter Sonic, known simply as Fighter Sonic on the title screen, is an unlicensed platform game for the Game Boy Advance by Sintax.

name: Soul of Heroes: Empire Wars
summary:
An all-new mobile EPIC RPG experience with immersive tactical strategies alongside fast paced hero growth to keep you going!
Play as memorable hero characters from different cultures from around the world and history!

name: Soul Launcher!: Tower Defense
summary: In Soul World, monsters are tormenting citizens in every corner! The citizens cannot resist the powerful force of the monsters! However, where there is darkness, there is also light.

name: Sol: Last Light
summary: Sol: Last Light is a third-person, action-adventure RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world. Learn to control your newly discovered power to harness energy from the sun and battle against robots on your journey up the mountain to find your captured sister.

name: Sorcerer's Mid-month Exam
summary: Step into an exhilarating fantasy world adventure where you'll confront a series of spine-chilling monsters. In this astonishing VR game, you'll need to maintain unwavering focus, utilizing your unique and powerful skills to defeat these formidable adversaries one by one!

name: Songs of Life
summary: Card drama adventure game. With the epidemic, no one can be left alone. You will play as Hua Tuo, Zhang Zhongjing and Dong Feng, with the help of surgery, potions, and even the power of the gods, to end this tragic chaos, uncover the truth of the world and destroy the culprits of it all.

name: Solo Hunt: Ten Floor
summary: Solo Hunt: Ten Floor is a rogue-like action rpg dungeon crawler with ten treacherous levels filled with fearsome monsters, deadly traps, and puzzles to be solved.

name: Soulbound
summary: A Retro-modern roguelie adventure for 1-2 players. Enjoy responsive and skillful combat. Upgrade, unlock and progress. Fight curious enemies and meet charming friends. Embark on a strange adventure!

name: Soak 'Em Out
summary: Soak ‘Em Out is an endless score attack game that takes heavy influence from the Game & Watch Gallery series. You play as Tina, a cat trying to catch a bus that unfortunately is taking an unusually long time to arrive. To make matters worse, a big storm is brewing! With no true shelter nearby and only an umbrella to take cover with, how long are you able to delay the inevitable before getting soaked out?

name: SOR2 Fight'n Rage
summary:
Welcome to the Fight’n Rage universe! The city was attacked by an army of evil mutants, led by the mysterious leader “The Boss” Three brave heroes gathered to challenge him and clear the city of mutants. But will it be that easy?

Features:

Replaced all characters, all enemies and all bosses.
Added shadow for all characters, all enemies and all bosses.
Some enemies have new attacks, that will surprise experienced players.
Characters replaced by Ricardo, F. Norris and Gal.
All of the characters’ attacks are similar to those from Fight’n Rage.
The game has Juggling.
Players can recover from a hit by pressing the jump button upon landing (as in SOR4)
F. Norris and Gal can change direction and turn around while running.
Ricardo Have Dash instead of Run.
The command to run (f, f) becomes more sensitive.
All playable characters can jump further while running.
You can use the Offensive Special while running
Added 6-Button gamepad Support. Uppercut now is Y-button.
Added sound when pressing B + C (Y) for all characters.
Friendly fire is disabled.
Added new sounds for players and enemies.

name: Sonic Tennis
summary:
A simple tennis game featuring Sonic characters. The player plays as Sonic and faces off against other Sonic characters, including Tails, Knuckles, and Amy.
It was part of the mobile game service "Sonic Cafe".

name: Soulash 2
summary: In a realm where gods have perished, a new era of strife has dawned. Seize power, forge legendary artifacts, conquer the world, and ascend to the divine throne in Soulash 2!

name: Sonic Fishing
summary: Sonic Fishing is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega. The only element from the Sonic the Hedgehog series present in the game are in the lures.

name: Soulworker Urban Strategy
summary:
Co-op simulation played strategically.
Fight with soul workers against endless lootings and destructions for survival in ruined cities.

name: Solar Showdown
summary: Welcome to Solar Showdown - the ultimate 2-player couch competitive game where you harvest solar power, build defenses, and produce minions to attack your opponent's towers. Generate enough power to activate your base's ultimate weapon and blow up your rival! Grow, build, defend, and dominate!

name: Songs of the Hmong
summary: The culture of Chinese Hmong nationality boasts pluralistic artistry, and it has its own uniqueness in construction, literature, painting, patterns, craft, etc. However their ways of inherit the knowledge is limited due to the absence of written language. In present days, the younger generation is showing a huge passion about video games, thus demonstrating a possibility for young people to grow interest on these fading traditional cultures by binding them with the Ninth Art.

name: Soulchemist Renafine
summary: In the game, players will follow the journey of ‘Soulchemist’ Renafine, who has to strengthen the soul of the monsters in order to defeat the army of the Great Demon King.

name: Soukaishin
summary:
Is running away the only thing you can do? A horror ADV game in which you are helplessly tossed about by the malice that relentlessly looms over you.

When you wake up, you find yourself in an abandoned hospital. You can't even remember why you're here. Can you solve the mysteries of the hospital and escape alive while avoiding the looming dangers?

name: Sommerland
summary: Experience the lively Land of Honey and Wine, a relaxing game where you will build villages in vibrant, atmospheric landscapes. Complete quests, explore a collection of carefully crafted maps and unlock more than 30 unique buildings in this fresh take on the city-building genre.

name: Something Wicked Lies Beneath
summary: Explore the randomly segmented structures of your nightmares in this roguelike psychological horror game. Be strategic and efficient while completing randomized objectives with very limited oxygen, all while being hunted by whatever is down there with you. Many mysteries await your presence.

name: Soak & Splash
summary: The game is an ultimate sauna experience where players can enjoy socializing with friends and strangers that easily can become friends. It's all about having fun, relaxing, and experiencing the unique benefits of sauna culture.

name: Solasta: Lightbringers Edition
summary:
The Solasta Lightbringers Edition contains:
- Crown of the Magister: The original level 1-12 campaign. From fledgling adventurers to saviours of Masgarth, this 40h+ campaign will take you through the Badlands in search of ancient artifacts to stand against a mysterious threat.
- Palace of Ice: A level 10-16 campaign, it is the continuation of Crown of the Magister and Solasta's last DLC. Venture north into the lands of the Snow Alliance to help your allies and end the Sorak menace once and for all! Also unlocks the Gnome and Tiefling ancestries.
- Lost Valley: A stand-alone level 1-12 campaign. Trapped by accident in an isolated valley where Manacalon's ancient traditions still rule, the party must find a way to escape by allying various factions jumping at each other's throat. Also unlocks an additional subclass for each class.

name: Solar Descent
summary:
An action-adventure game for the Playdate handheld console in the vein of classic The Legend of Zelda games combined with modern ideas found in e.g. Dark Souls and Hollow Knight.

Solar Descent features real-time combat, two attack buttons, on the fly switching of abilities, clever combat integration of the crank, elaborate menus and map systems.

name: So Much Stuff: Collector's Edition
summary: The ultimate sorting and matching game!

name: Sonic Surfer
summary:
This game reacts to your ambient noise! Play ‚Sonic Surfer‘ when you ride the bus, at the park, in a waiting line or at other places where noise in different soundlevels occurs.
Surf the waves and don't fall off your board! Can you collect enough suns to stop the moonrise?

name: Sono Hanabira: YuriCycle
summary: Risa, her weight in extremely (beep) condition due to all those delicious snacks and tea, has resolved to go on a diet! However… cutting sweets out of your diet is extremely hard, so seeing how much Risa is suffering, Mai recommends a cycling diet. Hearing how Mai already successfully lost five kilograms, Risa is extremely interested!

name: Solitaire Family World
summary: The card game Solitaire Family World takes you into a world of fairy tales. Experience fantastic quests. Achieve exclusive rewards in exciting solitaire games. Expand your park with every single chapter.

name: Sonic Superstars
summary: Adventure through the mystical Northstar Islands in this all-new take on classic 2D Sonic high-speed action platforming. Play as Sonic, Tails, Knuckles, and Amy Rose and harness all-new Emerald powers to move and attack in dynamic new ways. Navigate gorgeous, never-before-seen environments solo or with up to 3 other players and stop Dr. Eggman, Fang, and a mysterious new adversary from converting the islands' giant animals into Badniks before it's too late!

name: Soft Serve
summary: When a young woman and her new friend visit an odd ice cream parlor deep in the city her world becomes strange.

name: South of Midnight
summary: South of Midnight is a new action-adventure from Compulsion Games. Explore the mythos and confront mysterious creatures of the Deep South in this modern folktale while learning to weave an ancient power to surmount obstacles and face the pain haunting your hometown.

name: Soccer Runner
summary:
Soccer Runner is a fast and easy runner games inspired by famous 80-90 soccer games.
Pixel art graphic and a strong link with the gold age of soccer games.
Run to save famous soccer teams from the past.
Collect items, jump and relax! It's easy!

name: Sold Out
summary: You play as a grocery store owner with limited starting capital and the only thing you can rely on is your business acumen. You will use operations such as purchasing, hoarding, and selling to satisfy your customers, so as to earn enough profits, um, and the rent that keeps rising.

name: Soulknight Survivor
summary: Soulknight Survivor is a topdown action-roguelite game. Survive the waves of enemys to unlock new areas. Level up your character and loot equipment to gain power. Craft new powerful equipment and upgrade the buildings of your hometown. Follow your way to become the Soulknight.

name: Solo Joe
summary: A rock climbing rpg.

name: Southernmost Combine
summary: Southernmost Combine is an alternate epilogue to Half Life 2 Episode 2, in which Gordon Freeman is sent back in time to the 1980´s to stop a Combine recon deployment happening in the southernmost land of the world. There are a few deviations in gameplay mechanics (more tactical and slow paced, no gravity gun, inventory) but it´s still Gordon fighting the combine and rebels helping him to achieve it. This is a small episode consisting of a variated set of scenaries with unique art made ex-profeso to bring Source to the look of the southamerican region in the 1980´s.

name: Solemn Knights: Entirely Ours
summary: A 2D, turned-based, story driven action RPG.

name: Sonic Frontiers: Sonic’s Birthday Bash
summary: Celebrate Sonic’s birthday on the festively decorated Starfall Islands! Spin dash your way to the party with new challenges, moves, collectible Koco, and New Game +!

name: Sonic Dash+
summary:
Sonic Dash+ is the advanced edition of Sonic the Hedgehog’s first endless runner, Sonic Dash, that was originally released in 2013.

Sonic Dash+ released for Apple Arcade in 2022 . This updated version do not have microtransactions or ads present in the original game.

name: Sonic Prime Dash
summary: Zip through 3D race courses, jump over obstacles and battle iconic villains in this high-octane running game featuring the world's fastest blue hedgehog.

name: Sonic Origins: Premium Fun Pack
summary: The Sonic Origins Premium Fun Pack features Hard Missions, Letterbox Background, Bonus Character Animations in-menu & music player, and additional re-mastered music tracks.

name: Sonic Origins Plus: Expansion Pack
summary:
For current owners of Sonic Origins, complete your experience with the Plus Expansion Pack, which features 12 Sonic Game Gear titles, playable Knuckles in Sonic CD, and for the first time ever, Amy Rose as a playable character in Sonic the Hedgehog 1, 2, Sonic 3 & Knuckles, and Sonic CD!

This pack also includes the Classic Music Pack and Premium Fun Pack which contain Extreme Missions, Mirror Mode, additional screen borders, new character animations in menus, added music from other Sonic titles, and more!

name: Solemn
summary: A boy ventures off into the woods to find his missing friend.

name: Soul Detective
summary: Worthy Souls are being held back from moving on the land of the dead, the Soul Detective Agency is on the case! Our Detective and his trusty partner Magnus, enraptured in the magnifying glass creating a ghoulish weapon of destruction, are here to defeat the demons who are causing this catastrophe.

name: Soccer Kids
summary: A game about soccer, made by people who suck at playing soccer. Guide your team of nerds to victory in this tight, tactical soccer game!

name: Something's in the Air Redux
summary:
Something’s In The Air Redux is a sequel to Date Ariane Remastered, but it is designed to be a stand-alone game.

In part, a remastering of the original Something’s In The Air (2013), but with a streamlined story and playable as either a straight male or gay female character each with slightly different content.

name: Solitaire Dash
summary:
Feel the rush of Solitaire on steroids! Presenting - Solitaire Dash!
Help King Sol match the falling cards with Solitaire rules! If you know how to play Solitaire and want a quick game, Solitaire Dash is for you! Keep your eyes out on the falling cards and match the appropriately!

name: Sonic Frontiers x Monster Hunter Pack
summary: Get some stylish in-game Monster Hunter equipment and play a fun mini-game!

name: Soulsland 3: Spider Invasion
summary: After old enemies defeated, new enemy raised, Evil Giant Spider and his army has captured souls to bottle. World needs again Lord Barbarus and his skills

name: Sokoban 3D
summary: Move the cubes to their correct locations and solve the levels.

name: So Fart Away: Jam Edition
summary: Linguini is an aspiring food critic with a terrible tummy problem, everytime he eats something spicy he has to fart big time! Help him out solving puzzles, eating all spicy food without farting on others!

name: Sonho TrapStar
summary: Sonho TrapStar is an action game set in São Paulo dominated by the infected of a new Covid pandemic and a fierce militia that imposes a curfew and has a license to kill anyone on the streets.

name: Sonic Forces: Super Sonic
summary:
Speed through the levels faster than Sonic... as Super Sonic! Transform into Super Sonic across 20+ Modern and Classic Sonic stages. Collect the right amount of rings and Super Sonic will spring into action, giving you the ability to sprint across stages at break-neck speeds.

Please Note: You cannot participate in the rankings with Super Sonic.

name: Soldier of the Empire
summary: 2004, the year Soldier of the Empire was released on Windows. Made by Fragmaker and published by Russobit-M.

name: Sonic: Into the Void
summary: Sonic: Into The Void is a hack of Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Mega Drive which features a complete overhaul of the game, including new artwork, new HUD, new abilities and many other things.

name: Sonic Winter Adventures
summary: This hack features a winter-themed reskin of the game's zones, modern Sonic abilities, and all-new boss battles.

name: Sons of Saturn
summary: Sons of Saturn is an adventure game focused on atmosphere and narrative, brought to life using photos of real life abandoned locations as assets. Experience both wonder and horror as you explore the underground city of Minerva, where the dead dream and memories cling to life.

name: Sorry, We Have A Policy
summary: A short and unhappy game about trying to get trans healthcare. The goal is to try to get to the front of the line without dying.

name: Solar Systems For Kids
summary: A family friendly casual game that teaches children about celestial bodies. Learn about the Sun, Earth, Jupiter, and the other celestial bodies that make up our Solar System. You or your child will also be able to create your own Solar System in a sleek and in-depth fashion!

name: Soulbind: Tales of the Underworld
summary: It's up to you to become the Endless, a mysterious skeleton, and embark on a perilous journey. Collect monster body parts to enhance your character and use a variety of abilities. Explore sinister locations, fight mythical creatures and uncover the secrets of the Underworld.

name: Soccer Clicker
summary: Tap your way to glory! Collect cash, recruit players, and manage your team as you battle against real opponents from all over the world.

name: So Much Stuff 3: Odds & Ends
summary: Discover So Much Stuff!

name: Son of Sparta
summary: Son of Sparta: Is the first action game to feature a GAY love story-line. Play as Actarius, the ultimate Spartan warrior as he battles he's way through Hades underworld to be with he's beloved once more...

name: Solar Struggle
summary:
Solar Struggle is an Ultimate Doom, limit-removing (Complevel 3) community project. Each map was given a name first and then participants were invited to make a level based of it.

The first 3 episodes are comparatively easy and short, and the 4th is ramping difficulty up quite a bit. The maps are balanced for pistol-start primarily.

name: SokoChess Black
summary: SokoChess Black is a puzzle game about pushing and capturing Chess pieces while overcoming various obstacles. Enjoy 70 different handcrafted levels with a unique twist on the Chess formula.

name: Sol
summary: The sun has been gone for months, but the alarm clock continues to ring every day at 8:00. A visual novel in Catalan.

name: Soulker Defense
summary: Hyperscaling, fusions, strategies, synergies and more. A gothic style casual game with a tactic gameplay progressing to an ultimate battle of thousands of monsters.

name: Solar System Experience
summary: An educational, family-friendly game about our very own Solar System. Fly through space, land on planets and learn all the essential information about planets. You can take quizzes about each planet to check your knowledge.

name: SOS OPS!
summary: Attention, heroes! Are you ready to answer the call of duty and become an integral part of an elite rescue team? Step into the boots of an emergency firefighter in this thrilling multiplayer game and experience the adrenaline-pumping world of high-stakes firefighting.

name: Soulslinger: Envoy of Death
summary: You are a gunslinger in limbo, involved in a gritty war against "The Cartel", a ruthless organization harvesting souls to break free of the shackles of the afterlife. Grow stronger with each new run, gather the essence of lost souls to take on the biggest threats in this rogue-lite FPS!

name: Soleil
summary:
The direct sequel of: The Water is Wide.

Many people have tried to find the key to eternal life before, but... This isn't what this game is about. Play the part of Coco, a mysterious ex-orphan trapped inside a world where death exists no more, and where every single human has been blessed with the gift of immortality... if you consider that to be a gift, of course.

Join the main protagonist and their friends in a quest to find the truth behind the strange condition that has been bestowed upon humanity. To make everything the way it was before, or to do nothing about it... That depends on you.

name: Solipsism Reigns BxG
summary: Visual novel by Melancholy Marionette.

name: Solve & Roll
summary:
Download and try the free demo! Try the first 20 levels for free!
Make clever use of shapes by building bridges, towers, ramps, loops, slides, catapults, and more, all to guide a little green ball to a shiny gold star.
Place the shapes correctly to reveal the satisfying solutions to over 200 clever physics puzzles, ranging from the pleasingly simple to the deeply challenging. Can you solve them all?

name: Soluble Dream
summary: Soluble Dream is a visual novel for adults only. Venture into a world of passion, temptation and mystery. Starring Jackson Taylor, a brilliant programming student who must make tough decisions while guarding his reputation and struggling with himself.

name: Sorrow Asylum
summary: Sorrow Asylum is a looping horror game, a mix of an abandoned asylum and your mind's prison.

name: Soul Devourer
summary: Soul Devourer is a metroidvania action-platformer with a classic 2D horror style. You'll explore the vast, cursed Sakuradoki High School, master unique abilities, fight twisted monsters and uncover the long-buried secrets concealed under the school.

name: Sojo
summary: An online RPG with a persistent world, gear/level based progression, fast active turn based combat, platforming puzzles, and challenging objectives. Kill creatures, get loot, sell and buy loot, group with allies, and progress to overcome the games greatest challenges.

name: Soul Keeper
summary: Soul Keeper! Story based platform game. Sometimes it will drive you crazy with its difficulty, but it will drag you along with its story. Overcome obstacles, pass levels and collect the story!

name: Solitaire Quest: Garden Story
summary: Join the captivating journey of Solitaire Quest: Garden Story and watch the garden bloom under your care. Solve solitaire puzzles, restore the garden's beauty, and uncover the secrets that await. Play now and immerse yourself in the world of solitaire delight!

name: SoulQuest
summary: Carve your path through hordes of enemies, defying the gods to seize the power of Morrigan, Goddess of Death, and retrieve the soul of your beloved! SoulQuest combines the evergreen Metroidvania gameplay with the unique Celtic mythology into one, action-packed mixture!

name: Song of Hero: Music RPG
summary: The game that will break all your stereo types of previous game experiences. Song of Hero will guide you to the Epic Musical Fantasy You've Never Experienced!

name: Songs of the Damned
summary: Songs of the Damned is a single-level PWAD for Doom II released in 2006. It was designed by Trevor Primmett (iori) for Boom-compatible source ports.

name: South Park: Snow Day!
summary: Join Cartman, Stan, Kyle and Kenny, in three-dimensional glory, to celebrate the most magical day in any young child’s life - a snow day! Grab up to three friends and battle your way through the snow-piled streets of South Park on a quest to save the world and enjoy a day without school.

name: Sonic Golf
summary: Sonic Golf is a mobile phone game released on the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog is a re-release of the 16-bit version of Sonic the Hedgehog (1991), released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega. The game was created as part of the Sonic the Hedgehog series' 10th anniversary celebration, and was downloadable for free between 18 June and 31 July 2001.

name: Sonic Billiards
summary: Sonic Billiards is a mobile phone game released as a part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Bowling
summary: Sonic Bowling is a bowling game for mobile phones that was released as a part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic no Jirai Sagashi Game
summary: Sonic no Jirai Sagashi Game is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Putter
summary: Sonic Putter is a mobile phone game released in 2003 as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Darts
summary: Sonic Darts is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Souls
summary: The story of Souls begins; an ancient continent broken apart. A world now completely consumed by darkness.

name: Something in the Woods
summary:
Something In the Woods is a short horror game that places you in the shoes of a Police Officer on a fateful night. While driving down a desolate road, exhaustion compels you to stop at an isolated gas station for a cup of coffee. However, as you step inside, you look at a board with dozens missing person posters and wonder who or what could have done this. An eerie silence pervades the gas station, devoid of any staff or customers. You need to find out where everyone has gone.

It's getting dark, better hurry.

name: Sonic Hopping
summary: Sonic Hopping is a mobile phone game released in 2004 on the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Hopping 2
summary: Sonic Hopping 2 is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega and is the sequel to the original Sonic Hopping.

name: Sonic Hearts
summary: Sonic Hearts is a mobile phone game that was available in Japan through the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Panel Puzzle
summary: Sonic Panel Puzzle is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Gammon
summary: Sonic Gammon is a mobile phone game released in Japan as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic no Daifuugou
summary: Sonic no Daifuugou is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Kart 3DX
summary: Sonic Kart 3DX is a mobile phone game released on the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega. It is a 3D sequel to Sonic Racing Kart.

name: Sonic Golf 3D
summary: Sonic Golf 3D is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega. It is the sequel to the 2002 Sonic Golf.

name: Sonic Speed DX
summary: Sonic Speed DX is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic no 7 Narabe
summary: Sonic no 7 Narabe is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic's Napoleon
summary: Sonic's Napoleon is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic no Jigen Ressha
summary: Sonic no Jigen Ressha is a mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic's Casino Poker
summary: Sonic's Casino Poker was the last mobile phone game released as part of the Sonic Cafe service offered by Sega.

name: Sonic Dash Quiz
summary: Sonic Dash Quiz is a mobile quiz game released as a part of the Puyo Puyo! Sega service offered by Sega. It is a fast-paced quiz game where Sonic competes against Tails, Knuckles and Shadow in answering multiple choice questions.

name: Sonic Bowling
summary: Sonic Bowling is a mobile phone game that was available as a part of the Puyo Puyo! Sega service offered by Sega. It is a remake of the 2002 game of the same name released through Sonic Cafe.

name: Sonic Golf DX
summary: Sonic Golf DX is a mobile phone game released as part of the Puyo Puyo! Sega service offered by Sega. It is the sequel to Sonic Golf 3D, which it serves as a graphically enhanced remake of.

name: Sonic Tennis DX
summary: Sonic Tennis DX is a mobile phone game released as a part of the Puyo Puyo! Sega service offered by Sega. It is an updated version of the Sonic Cafe game, Sonic Tennis.

name: Sombras
summary: Sombras is a horror role-playing game that tells the story of a teenager who ends up getting involved with demon worshippers.

name: Sold Soul
summary:
Sold Soul is a full-on Heretic episode with 9 levels and challenging gameplay.
The story is that you play as a merchant with some unnatural powers and skills who have been betrayed and seeking revenge.

name: Sound Lock
summary: "Sound Lock" is a multi-ending puzzle RPG game based on the perspective of a girl without a mouth. The story takes place in a world with hundreds of similar rooms, where the decorations are nostalgic. Explore rooms full of death traps and try to clear the fog to find the buried truth.

name: Soccer
summary: Soccer game that was in some old motorola cellphones

name: Soundless Mound
summary: Soundless Mound is a single-level PK7 for Doom II using the GZDoom source port. It was designed by Marisa Lago in 2018 and is inspired by the Silent Hill series of survival horror games. In the Doom Mapping Contest II: Hellectric Boogaloo, it was awarded first place, and it received further updates via the author's GitHub repository.

name: Solar Rally
summary:
Touch the screen to cast shadows over leading rally cars and stop them from colliding.
Clouds slowing down your progress? Swipe them away.
Get as many cars to the exits as you can to show off your high score with friends!
Solar Rally is best played on iPad devices.
Take Solar Rally to the next level by downloading the Leap Motion compatible PC version from our website and cast shadows with your hands!

name: Sonic Frontiers: The Final Horizon
summary: Rewrite your destiny in The Final Horizon Update! Experience a new story, new playable characters, new challenges, and more in Sonic Frontier’s 3rd climactic final Content Update… for Free!

name: Soulstice: Ashen Blade Item Pack
summary: The balance of the Holy Kingdom of Keidas is compromised when powerful, feral creatures known as “Wraiths” invade from the other side of the Veil, threatening to consume the living. The “Chimeras”, hybrid warriors born of the union of two souls, are the only ones who can protect humankind.

name: Solivagant
summary: You are a lone traveler, adrift in a realm beyond time and space. Navigate, decipher, and endure the enigmas of a world that defies understanding. Embark on a journey through the inexplicable in Solivagant. Heavily inspired by the Backrooms.

name: Soul War
summary:
Soul war is a real-time strategy card game set in a dark fantasy universe.
Each card played materializes on the arena and fights for you.

name: Soul War
summary: Immerse yourself in a dark, epic war between the Legion of Agony and the Infernal Guardians, where the quest for the mysterious Soul Stone tears apart the realms. Choose your side and get ready for an unforgiving battle to establish your dominance over a world in turmoil.

name: Sonic Superstars: Digital Deluxe Edition featuring LEGO
summary:
The SONIC SUPERSTARS Digital Deluxe Edition featuring LEGO contains SONIC SUPERSTARS and the Digital Deluxe Upgrade featuring LEGO, which includes:
-LEGO Fun Pack
-Sonic Rabbit Skin
-Mecha Sonic Skin for Battle Mode
-Bonus Main Menu Wallpapers​
-Digital Artbook & Mini Original Soundtrack

name: Sotsugyou Ryokou
summary: A dating sim visual novel.

name: Soul of War: Legions
summary: "SoulofWar" is a strategy deck-building game with twists. It features 8-player PvP battles where you strategically outplay your opponents. It introduces a fresh auto chess gameplay.

name: Sociable Soccer 24
summary: Sociable Soccer 24 is the exhilarating, cross-platform, arcade football franchise. Designed by Sensible Soccer creator Jon Hare, this former title on Apple Arcade has fast-paced, arcade-style intuitive gameplay, with multiplayer head-to-head matches and collectible player cards.

name: Sonic McOrigins
summary: Sonic McOrigins is a fanmade remake collection of the Sonic Heroes McDonalds LCD games.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Dash!
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Dash! is a J2ME port of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 released in 2008. The port features the first half of the game.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Crash!
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Crash! is a J2ME port of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 released in 2008. The game is a continuation of Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Dash! and features the last few zones of the game.

name: Son of Perun Kharkiv
summary: Son of Perun: Kharkiv is a first-person shooter in the setting of Kharkiv of the future and retrowawe.

name: Sorrow Asylum 2
summary: Sorrow Asylum 2 is a looping horror game, a mix of an abandoned asylum and your mind's prison, as well as a sequel to Sorrow Asylum.

name: Sonic and the Gunslinger
summary: Sonic and the Gunslinger is a mod for Sonic Robo Blast 2 inspired by the Sonic storybook games and with a Wild West theme.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Frontiers Adaptation Project
summary: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Frontiers Adaptation Project is a mod project that aims to adapt the Sonic Frontiers open-zone formula into Sonic Robo Blast 2.

name: Solitaire FunPak
summary:
Solitaire FunPak is a handheld solitaire game. There are 12 different forms of solitaire to play (Klondike, Tripeaks, Pyramid, Cruel, Freecell, Golf, Canfield, Aces Up, Scorpion, Poker, Stonewall and Florentine).

It also has a tournament mode where players can go for standard games, a full championship, a custom game or a custom game with a time limit. The best scores are stored in the hall of fame.

name: Sonic Encore
summary: Sonic Encore is a fan game that re-imagines some of the classic levels from the Sonic 2D era into a more modern 3D environmental setting.

name: Sonic Test Labs
summary:
Here at Hedgehog Testing Inc., we take the matter of rogue and spikey rodents very seriously. They're a threat and a menace to society!

So what have we decided to do? Take matters into our own hands by capturing these creatures and studying them to their fullest extent. All sponsored by G.U.N. of course!

name: Sonic Colors Demastered
summary:
Sonic Colors Demastered is a 2D reimagining of Sonic Colors for the Nintendo Wii and Nintendo DS. The game features gameplay inspired by the Sonic Rush series and a fully original level design and soundtrack.

Join Sonic, Tails, and a colorful cast of aliens to put a stop to Eggman’s plans for interstellar domination! Use Sonic’s signature suite of abilities, including the boost, grind, and homing attack, to make your way through exhilarating, high-speed 2D platforming challenges!

name: Sonic Colors VN
summary: Sonic Colors VN is a remake of Sonic Colors DS in a Visual Novel format using the Ren'Py game engine. This project bridges the gap between all versions of the tale, stringing their plot threads together.

name: Sonic 04
summary: A loving tribute to the good old days when Sonic fangames were worse than the official onres.

name: Sonic 3000
summary: A fast-paced Sonic fan game with an improved moveset and no speedcap.

name: Sonic McOrigins Plus
summary: An update to Sonic McOrigins that adds Shadow Hockey, Amy/Rouge Volleyball, and Shadow Basketball.

name: Soul Drifter
