summary: Soar into a gravity-defying parkour adventure. Run, jump, and glide through surreal landscapes and deadly factories on a mission to liberate captive souls.

name: Son of the Mask
summary: A video game based on the movie Son of the Mask made for mobile devices.

name: Sonic Arena
summary: Sonic Arena is a Fighting game that was finished after 17 years.

name: Sonic LaserDisc
summary: Sonic LaserDisc is a fangame that tributes to Sonic CD, focused on exploration and puzzles based on time travel.

name: Sonic Horizons
summary: Sonic Horizons is an open-zone fangame inspired by Sonic Frontiers that aims to take the foundation of the open-zone formula that Frontiers established and expand on it in a different direction, focusing more on physics-based platforming/exploration, thinking outside the box, and generally forging your own path along the journey.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: Gearhead
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: Gearhead is the fourth episode of the Sonic the Hedgehog RPG series,

name: Sonic Treading Power
summary: Sonic Treading Power is a fan game made for SAGE 2023.

name: Soupsoup
summary:
Interactive illustration magazine of Hotcornsoup, Soupsoup Magazine!

Each games in the magazine are simple and casual, through collaboration, they provide experiences to fall into the world created by the imagination of various illustrators.
Also, attractive new illustrators participate in each update to continue to create unique experiences.

name: Soulstone of Hope
summary: Embark on a heroic journey in this captivating fantasy turn-based JRPG. Choose your path as a fearless Warrior, cunning Rogue, or powerful Mage, each with unique abilities. Form unbreakable bonds with your companions and uncover the secrets of the forgotten catacombs.

name: Soulgasm
summary: Come in, come in! Immerse yourself in a dating sim adventure filled with romance and intrigue. Wander through the Palace's hidden chambers, unravel its mysteries, build lasting bonds, and woo the ladies! Let your choices guide your path as you enhance your Eromancy skills. Your love story awaits!

name: Son of the Dragon King
summary: Son of the Dragon King, a beat 'em up action saga, with captivating storytelling at its core, RPG-like character growth, and intricate crafting. Your path—a blend of honor and redemption—will decide feudal Japan's fate. Can you emerge as the champion, facing down the elemental warlords?

name: Sonic Skywind
summary: A Sonic game introducing fast paced combat with limited open world areas involving story progress scenarios and side missions.

name: Sonic Spectre
summary: A 2D Sonic the Hedgehog fangame made with Clickteam Fusion

name: Sonic USB Online
summary:
Dive into a frantic race with Sonic, the legendary blue hedgehog! Defy the laws of physics through twisted worlds to save your animal friends captured by Doctor Robotnik. Get ready to jump, turn and cross all obstacles in this epic adventure to save the world and free the innocent creatures!
Are you ready to roar, push the limits and become the ultimate hero? It's time to show your super speed and kick Robotnik's butt.

name: Sole Seeker
summary: Land on unique planets to survive the horrors that await in this adventure survival RPG. Use the spoils to upgrade defensive buildings and explore the galaxy further. Can you survive the hunt all alone?

name: Sonic & Blaze
summary: Sonic & Blaze is a 2D fangame inspired by the Sonic Rush series and the 3D Boost games.

name: Sonic Battle Rush
summary:
Based on the original on the Gameboy Advance, Sonic and the gang are back to duke it out with each other once more! Only this time as a 2D traditional fighter!

Fight as Sonic the Hedgehog and Shadow the Hedgehog in the Sage demo and learn the ins and outs of their expanded moveset!

Old mechanics from the original are making a return here as well!

name: Sonic: Before the Sequel - Redux
summary: Sonic: Before the Sequel - Redux is a fan-made remake of Sonic: Before the Sequel.

name: Sonic Requeset
summary: Sonic Requeset is just your generic Sonic fan game.

name: Sonic QWERTY
summary: What if "Sonic CD" happened in alternative universe?

name: Sonic In The Timeline Of Madness
summary: Sonic In The Timeline Of Madness is a fangame about the battle between Sonic and his friends against Eggman's evil plot. With the help of seven chaos emeralds, Eggman decides to mess up time so that he can carry out his plan.

name: Sonic Overdrive
summary: Sonic Overdrive is a Sonic fangame that is a personal take on Sonic 4 episodes 1 & 2.

name: Sonic Outbound
summary: Sonic Outbound is a Sonic fan-game set one year after Sonic Mania's bad ending where Robotnik had the Phantom Ruby and Chaos Emeralds in possession. After the final battle in the core of the Titanic Monarch, Robotnik was stuck in Little Planet and started collecting the Time Stones and preparing his greatest plan yet.

name: Sonic 2099
summary: 2002, the year Sonic 2099 was released on Windows. Made and self published by TGF Team, this action game is available for free.

name: Something In The Well
summary: Something stirs in the backwoods of Montana. You can hear it trying to get in. All you have is your trusty dog and a camcorder. A short 5-10 minute game with 2 endings.

name: Soul's Spectrum: Awakening
summary: You wake up in a mysterious dungeon, full of dangerous traps and unlucky inhabitants. Brain cracking puzzles await you while a dark story will slowly unfold in this supernatural place!

name: Solar Pall
summary: It seems that nothing has changed in the quiet village of Vitalik's grandmother. It's time to have some fun and make new friends! But what if strange things await here at every step? Get ready to go on an adventure full of secrets and mysteries!

name: Soft Kitten Experience
summary: Created by Sylvie & Aria, featuring music by Frédéric Chopin and 煉獄庭園 (Rengoku Teien) The difficulty is extremely high. Controls: Figure it out yourself!

name: Soviet Union 2010
summary: You control a space ship that's equipped with a cannon. Your mission is to destroy as many USA-serving ships as possible, and get out alive while getting as many points as possible.

name: Sonar
summary: Sonar is a cancelled game for the Atari 2600. A prototype of the game was dumped on AtariProtos.com in March 2023.

name: Sonny The Mad Man: Casual Arcade Shooter
summary: Welcome to Sonny The Mad Man! Are you ready for adventure and epic fights?

name: So Much Stuff 4: Bits & Bobs
summary: Uncover an abundance of new stuff in this exciting sequel!

name: Sort It!
summary: A Virtual Reality psychology experiment developed by University of Oxford researchers.

name: Sotsugyou: Graduation - Final
summary: A Japanese game that simulates the work of a teacher in a high school during the last semester before graduation.

name: Sosuria
summary:
Sosuria is a map made for SOSU's birthday.

Sosuria is a proud, peaceful village on the island of Khshayarsha, full of life and hospitality. That is, until one day an evil sorcerer ransacked the land with his army, taking most of the goods and resources for himself and turning the island into an uninhabitable volcanic landscape. Legend has it that a mythical being of wonder dwells in Sosuria's largest and most prominent building, the Temple of the Ancients. It is said that this creature has the ability to turn back time and undo the evil that was dealt to the village. There is only one way to find out if this is true...

name: SolarBlack
summary: SolarBlack is an action-rhythm game made exclusively for VR where you slice and shoot to the beat to defeat an other-worldly threat. Immerse yourself in new worlds and experience the music in every pulsating atom.

name: Soulless Steel
summary: Build your mecha. Fight. Learn the enemy. Upgrade. Fight again. A singleplayer top down, exploration, tactical shooter with mechas. Climb the ranks, side with factions, and try to be the best mecha pilot this world has ever seen.

name: Sonic Rivals Dash
summary: Sonic Rivals Dash is a browser game published in 2006 to promote Sonic Rivals. The game was featured on the Sonic Rivals websites before they were closed.

name: So Below
summary:
A new beginning calls Anita Carver to another city, a new place to live, forget and grow. With all her familial and relationship traumas, getting used to this new life will be difficult. But company is right around the corner, be it good, evil or supernatural.

She is not sure what awaits in Holmes Hideway, but the unseen might have been waiting for her all this time.

name: Sola Rola: The Gravity Maze
summary: Control Wiz and Waz through a series of rotating mazes which will test your speed, logic skills and reactions as they attempt to fight off the twin enemies of BOREDOM and HUNGER!

name: Sonic X: Emerald Grab
summary: Sonic Emerald Grab is an online Flash game published on the 4Kids TV website by 4Kids Entertainment in 2008 to promote the then-airing anime series, Sonic X. It is a simple Sonic X-themed game of match 3.

name: Sonic Boom: Link 'n Smash
summary: Sonic Boom: Link 'N Smash! is a puzzle browser game based on the Sonic Boom television series and was published on the Cartoon Network website.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Chaos Crush
summary: Flash game published in 2006 to advertise Sonic the Hedgehog. The game was available on the websites advertising Sonic the Hedgehog until they were taken down.

name: Soulbond
summary: Customize your fate in a fallen world: forge bonds and uncover secrets in a tale of power, love, and the weight of grief. Your choices define your path: how will you rise in the hierarchy of the damned?

name: Sonic 1 Easy Mode
summary: The Sonic 1 Easy Mode hack is a modification primarily designed as a "port" of the official Easy Mode found in Sonic Jam on the Sega Saturn. It focuses on making the 1991 classic more accessible by altering core game structures and level designs.

name: Sonic Sunventure
summary: Sonic Sunventure is a ROM hack of the original Sonic the Hedgehog (1991) for the Sega Genesis. It features redesigned levels, new mechanics, custom music, and updated visuals with a time travel theme.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Hold Right to Win Edition
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Hold Right to Win Edition is a satirical ROM hack of the original Sonic the Hedgehog 2, created as an April Fools' Day joke in 2012. The hack's title is an accurate description of the gameplay: the player can complete the entire game simply by holding the "right" direction on the controller.

name: Sonic Zoom
summary: Experience the rom hack filled with new levels, visuals and music from the same mind that made the "Sunky the Game" series. What are you waiting for? Milk and Cereal? Just go play it already.

name: Sonic's Fun and Easy Adventure
summary: A playful, ultra-easy Sonic ROM hack built for Sega Mega Drive/Genesis. Showcased during SHC 2017, it emphasizes a breezy, tongue‑in‑cheek experience where level hazards are defanged and spectacle takes center stage. Often credited to Ralakimus (Novedicus), with music and asset contributions from collaborators.

name: Sonic: Brother Trouble
summary: This hack introduces Manic the Hedgehog (Sonic’s brother from the Sonic Underground series) as a playable character with a unique moveset, including the ability to throw drumsticks and climb walls.

name: Soul Stitcher
summary: Explore the deepest Dungeons in this thrilling roguelike action game. Collect souls in the name of the evil God. Fall and come back again and again because it's your destiny to serve for eternity. Stay alive in these challenging missions, or die and rise for more!

name: Sorrows End
summary: A fantasy turn-based RPG, Made with RPG Maker MV. It utilizes a side view battle system, contains scenes that may be frightening and scenes of anguish. Sorrows End is a heart-wrenching tale of loss.

name: Soggy Beans
summary: Fish will come, fish will go. Take photos, collect beans, decorate your seascape, then relax or do other things while your friends swim by in this calming side-idler.

name: Sonic Dimensional Funkin'
summary: Sonic Dimensional Funkin' is a Friday Night Funkin' mod based on the Sonic the Hedgehog series, featuring six weeks and 17 main songs, with a few extras.

name: Sonata
summary:
Role-playing game for PlayStation.
As a "romantic parallel RPG," players form a party from among eight women and ultimately choose one woman as their partner.

name: Solarfall
summary: Large Wizard/Ebon Fortress level. Comes with a start map.

name: Somewhere
summary: Episode with six medium-sized levels including a start map and a boss map. Each level follows an individual textures theme/style: a base, a metal/runic sewer, an Ebon castle, a stone/brick fortress, and a void map.

name: Solaris Arcana: The Eye of the Soothsayer
summary: Discover the source of power: The Solaris Arcana

name: Soul Falchion
summary:
Soul Falchion is a weapon-based fighting game using Takara's engine.

It has 20 characters, most (if not all) of which are based on characters from SNK's Last Blade and Samurai Shodown series, renamed (some with names taken from Mortal Kombat), slightly modified and recolored. The sprites are smaller versions of the sprites used in the Neo Geo Pocket Color games.

name: Soaked in Blood
summary: A TWID-esque Ultimate Doom episode replacement, Soaked in Blood! It's a vanilla mapset in the style of Knee-Deep in the Dead with some modern twists. Ultra-Violence is the preferred difficulty though feel free to pick what suits your skills.

name: Sophia's Spa
summary: Visual novel about sexual affairs in Sophia's Spa.

name: Solune
summary: Enter Solune, a world of fantasy and magic! This turn-based JRPG is inspired by the classics, with modern improvements. Challenge yourself with 50 optional puzzles, discover hidden secrets and face off against powerful end-game bosses, all while on an adventure to save the world!

name: Soviet Project
summary: Explore an abandoned city and solve puzzles in a unique open world horror adventure.

name: Soulcalibur: Broken Destiny
summary:
Experience Soulcalibur: Broken Destiny originally released on the PSP (PlayStationPortable) system, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.
The Soulcalibur series is a weapon-based fighting game in which characters wage battle with a variety of unique weapons.
Soulcalibur: Broken Destiny features the original Gauntlet mode, where players go on an adventure with the characters of Soulcalibur while clearing various missions along the way. The missions are a great way to pick up battle knowledge, techniques, and improve your skills while having fun.

name: Solcialists
summary: Solcialists is The Ultimate Operating System for the best Solcialists control experience. Mars 2066.

name: Soulmask
summary: Soulmask is a sandbox game that prioritizes an authentic survival experience. As the "last one" blessed with the mysterious mask, players will grapple for survival in a primitive land steeped in mysterious faiths, carving out a path to ascendance. Start from nothing, explore, build, recruit tribesmen to fortify your clan, and ultimately unravel the mysterious truths hidden behind the civilizations of this world.

name: Sonic Rush Adventure Flash
summary: Sonic Rush Adventure Flash is a promotional browser game made to promote Sonic Rush Adventure. The game was playable on the Sonic Rush Adventure website.

name: Souls Survivors
summary: Fight hordes of enemies, face unique bosses, learn powerful abilities, and explore a huge and diverse map. Souls Survivors combines Hack&Slash mechanics with Roguelite elements and gives you a straightforward and easy to understand yet deep and complex Action RPG game.

name: Soul Awakening Adventure
summary: Soul Awakening Adventure is a mobile idle game published by Pengchao Dang.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 is a promotional browser game by McDonald's in collaboration with Sega and Paramount based around the movie of the same name.

name: Song of Slavs
summary: Song of Slavs is a 2D sidescrolling strategy/resource management hybrid with a minimalist feel wrapped in a beautiful, modern pixel art aesthetic.

name: Song Song
summary: The story is about a detective This is a psychological puzzle game, The game belongs to the psychological horror genre.

name: Solar War
summary: Solar War! A fast-paced, space-themed, shoot-em-up, bullet hell, arcade style game where players attempt to shoot and weave through a horde of enemy planets in a bid to survive just a little bit longer.

name: Some RPG Game
summary: Welcome to the perilous world of Some RPG Game, a medieval fantasy that immerses you in a gritty and unforgiving realm teeming with danger and opportunity. Set in a time of swords and sorcery, struggling to survive amidst the harsh realities of this treacherous world.

name: Solitary Cat
summary: The ultimate lightweight solitaire featuring simple yet robust rules for hours of dark-mode fun! Based on Klondike, 40 Thieves, and Bakers Game.

name: Solitris
summary: Solitaire, Meet Tetris

name: Solve The Case
summary: Find out all details of the kidnapping through conversations with various people

name: Sonic Advance 2 SP
summary:
Sonic Advance 2 SP is a ROM hack geared at improving some of the less-loved aspects of Sonic Advance 2. Changes included: Adjusted enemy placements to prevent many ‘cheap shots’, such as item boxes bouncing you into enemies. Many bottomless pit areas were replaced with new routes or made harder to fall into at a moment’s notice. More plentiful Special Ring placement, allowing a more freeform approach to entering Special Stages, and Special Stage entry requirement reduced to 5 SP Rings.

Advance 2 is still a challenging game! Bosses haven’t been touched, and in the later half of the game you should expect plenty of enemies and the return of the dreaded bottomless pits. The hack attempts to balance things in a fair way but also rewards memorisation for repeat play and speedrunning - without as harsh a penalty for not doing so.

name: South of Hell
summary: South of Hell is a horror game that takes place at a gas station in the middle of a desert. twenty miles from the nearest town.

name: Sonic RPG: Episode 7
summary: A multi-level RPG-style fighting game. It is really hard, but is very rewarding if you beat the opponent in each level - the game contains a movie that runs between the levels. Passwords are issued for each level so that you can skip them the next time you play if you wish.

name: Song of Horror: One Shot Challenge
summary: Song of Horror has already scared half a million Players. Now we bring this new challenge with an even more terrifying experience: we've unleashed the AI, known as The Presence, to the highest difficulty level and it's out for blood! Will you be able to survive?

name: SOD: State of Disorder
summary: SOD combines roguelike deck-building with mech combat to create a unique experience focused on intense mech warfare and strategic gameplay.

name: Somewhere in Time
summary: Somewhere in Time is a set of 15+1 pure vanilla Doom 2 maps, inspired by the greatest of this category, most importantly Reverie, Revolution! and Scythe.

name: Sonic Maze Craze
summary: Sonic Maze Craze is a browser game released in 2007 to promote Sonic and the Secret Rings. The game was featured on the Sonic and the Secret Rings official websites before they were later shut down.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: A browser game released in 2004 to promote Sega Superstars. The game was featured on the official websites for Sega Superstars before they were shut down

name: Sonic Heroes Puzzle
summary: Sonic Heroes Puzzle is a browser game released in 2004 to promote Sonic Heroes. The game appeared on the Sonic Heroes game websites before they were later shut down.

name: Soulbound
summary: Embark on a journey through time and challenge in Soulbound, an MMORPG Extraction Roguelike that melds a captivating pixel art world with a narrative that bends the very concept of time. Here, extraction isn’t just a mechanic; it's the heart of your adventure.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 Co-op
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 Co-op is a rom hack for Sonic the Hedgehog 2 which adds in co-op multiplayer into the game.

name: Sonic Adventure DX: Multiplayer Mod
summary: A mod for Sonic Adventure DX which adds split screen multiplayer to the game.

name: Soren Game
summary: Soren Game is a dropping puzzle game like Suika Game. You can play on web browser. Players can score points by sticking together puzzle pieces in the shape of Soviet Union countries. The same piece can be put together into different pieces. There's a limit to the container you can put pieces in, and if it overflows, it's game over.

name: Sonic the Broad Jump
summary: Sonic the Broad Jump is a browser game released on Sonic Channel in 2005. It was accessible on the Sonic Channel website before it was later taken down.

name: Soul Blade
summary: "Soul Blade" is a 2D platform action game with classic hand-drawn 2D animations that provide a smooth and immersive visual experience. The combat system is built around the "swordplay" mechanism, delivering intense and exhilarating battles.

name: Sonic X: Speed Spotter
summary: Sonic Speed Spotter is an online Flash game published on the 4Kids TV website by 4Kids Entertainment in 2008 to promote the then-airing anime series, Sonic X. It is a Sonic X-themed game of spot the difference.

name: Sonic Spinball: Life Savers
summary: Sonic Spinball is a browser game developed by Skyworks Technologies to promote the release of Sega Smash Pack for the Game Boy Advance. The game was available on the Candystand games portal and featured Life Savers branding.

name: Sonic Dream Team
summary: In this all-new Sonic adventure, the evil Dr. Eggman has discovered The Reverie, an ancient device with the power to manifest dreams in the real world. Navigate twisted dreamscapes, rescue your friends, and put a stop to Dr. Eggman’s nightmarish dreams of world domination!

name: Songs of Everjade
summary: Explore a mythical world of Chinese high fantasy in this fast-paced action-packed roguelite. Slash your way through enemies, avoid perilous traps, dash out of harm’s way, collect hundreds of items, and build your own playstyle.

name: Sora to Kimi Iro
summary: Sora to Kimi Iro is a visual novel with a trial version released for PC on November 3, 2023.

name: SomaCube
summary: Soma Cube is a challenging 3D puzzle game also known as "Soma Cube Puzzle". The main goal of the game is to use a series of differently shaped blocks to piece together a complete 3D shape.

name: Sonic X: Speed Spotter 2
summary: Sonic X: Speed Spotter 2 is a Sonic X-themed game of spot the difference, and the sequel to Sonic Speed Spotter.

name: Sonic X: Speed Spotter 3
summary: Sonic X: Speed Spotter 3 is a Sonic X-themed game of spot the difference, and the sequel to Sonic X: Speed Spotter 2.

name: Sonic Superstars: Lego Sonic Skin
summary: Speed through the world of SONIC SUPERSTARS as the Blue Blur, now in LEGO form!

name: "So, About Last Night..."
summary: "So, About Last Night..." is an interactive web-based novella. Taking place in 1996 Southern California, Lacey tries finding the girl she hooked up with before she woke up with the worst hangover of her life and an impulse to drink blood.

name: Sonic Adventure 7
summary: Sonic Adventure 7 is an unlicensed 2D platformer based on Sonic Adventure for the Game Boy Color released by Makon Soft Studios in 1999.

name: Soul Street
summary: Psychic Sleuth: Street of Falling Souls is a deductive adventure game that combines narrative and puzzle solving, with rational reasoning to obtain relevant and important information to advance the story and unravel the truth of the case, as well as the mysterious forces behind the organisation.

name: Somme Trench
summary: Somme Trench is an interactive historical-military novel by Andrew J. Schaefer, where your choices control the story. It's entirely text-based, without graphics or sound effects. You play as a fresh British infantryman at the Battle of the Somme, one of the longest and bloodiest battles of World War One.

name: Sound Mind
summary: In Sound Mind, you and a friend (or a bitter enemy) play as Kaine or Mabel. The goal is simple: Keep all of the inheritance to yourself.

name: Sona-Nyl of the Violet Shadows Refrain
summary: The 5th entry in Liarsoft's Steampunk visual novel series is a mysterious fairytale in which fantasy and reality intertwine. The story unfolds from the perspectives of 2 women: one who travels in the ruins of Engine City New York, and one who finds herself in an underground wolrd with a violet sky.

name: Social Dev Story
summary:
A simulator where you develop your very own dream game. Can you make a game that reaches a billion downloads?! Jump on the social game craze!
Easy-to-play social app developing company game. Band together your team of great staff and bring them to the top of their game!

Develop groundbreaking games and become #1 in the industry!
Manage a game development/management company and create an amazing game special to you! Train up staff and think up new project ideas all while racing against tight deadlines to become the game maker that everyone knows and loves.

name: Sorcevival
summary: Sorcerers have nearly succumbed to corruption. In Sorcevival, a horde survivor roguelite, it's time to turn the tide. Choose wisely how to empower your magic spells as you face nightmarish creatures. How far will you go in this battle for survival?

name: SOS Zombie: Survival
summary: SOS Zombie follows the harrowing journey of a group of diverse survivors trapped in a city overrun by a zombie apocalypse. Seeking refuge in an abandoned house, the group fights waves of increasingly aggressive zombies while preparing for a rescue helicopter scheduled for evacuation a rescue point.

name: Sovereign Reign
summary: Gifted with divine will, establish your Deity's kingdom on Earth. Recruit believers, erect essential structures and vanquish barbarian threats to shape your realms destiny and Reign as Sovereign.

name: Somewhere Under the Sea
summary: A three level level episode released on March 12, 2015 based on Adam's earlier "Rapture" map inspired by the underwater city from Bioshock.

name: SoundTown
summary: An accessible one-button music game for children and young people with complex physical and cognitive needs.

name: Sonic Free Riders: No Kinect Patch
summary: No Kinect Patch is a mod for Sonic Free Riders that completely changes the way the game is controlled and played and quickly became the definitive way for people to experience Sonic Free Riders. This patch allows the game to be played with controller, eliminating the need for a kinect.

name: Sonic 3 & Knuckles Battle Race
summary: Sonic 3 & Knuckles Battle Race is a competitive 2-player romhack of Sonic 3 & Knuckles. A creative use of technical limitations, the players are put into Sonic 3 & Knuckles' stages- however, the camera only follows the player who's the furthest ahead. When the camera scrolls past the other player, the former wins a point and the latter respawns. It's heavily inspired by the older Sonic 2 Battle Race, bringing polish and additions to the game formula, and putting it in Sonic 3's more complex levels. Note: this game is 2-player only, and it is unrelated to Sonic 3 & Knuckles' "competition" mode, which features exclusive levels.

name: Songs of Steel: Hispania
summary: Relive the conflict between the mighty Roman Republic and the brave Celtiberian people of Numantia! Featuring hand-drawn illustrations, classic turn-based strategy mechanics, and combat tactics, with decision-making and side missions.

name: Soldier Yōki
summary: Soldier Yōki, is an indie, action, and third-person shooter game. Solo or in cooperation, up to 4 players, explore the different settings, with diverse gaming experiences. Face the Extraterrestrial alliance and defeat the Boss in order to win the game.

name: Solitaire Classic
summary: Indulge yourself in a classic game of Solitaire! Keep your eye on the clock as you try to arrange the cards in sequence. Open columns and transfer cards in sequence to the four stacks. It's not as easy as it sounds!

name: Sofi Origins
summary: Sofi Origins is an adventure, suspense, and horror game in which you play as Sofi, a girl with a very sad past, but who in her world has powers. Alongside Sofi, you will experience fear and sadness in a unique way. You will have to use your skills and stay focused to confront the past.

name: Solo
summary: SoLo is a Sci-Fi third person shooter set on a hostile desert planet. Recruited to fight alongside an alien studying the planet, you must battle with a race of interplanetary poachers that are plundering the wildlife and natural resources

name: Soul Knight Prequel
summary: Soul Knight Prequel is a pixel-art action RPG featuring loot farming. Slash monsters to upgrade your power, or party up for treasure against the odds. Our newest ARPG continues to feature Soul Knight's familiar posse of chibi characters, while satiating the fans' hunger for more lore and quests!

name: Soul Warden
summary: Soul Warden is a deep dungeon-crawling RPG that combines classic roguelike gameplay with a pinch of collect-a-thon progression, plenty of humor, tons of loot, and a build-your-own-dungeon sandbox!

name: Soulshard
summary: In a realm between life and death, a confused soul, haunted by a life filled with misguided choices, seeks redemption and freedom.

name: Sol Uknight
summary: Delve deep into a mystical realm, from two distinct protagonist story perspectives! Whether communicating with your musical "Constellator" or uncovering cryptic languages with "The Wheel of Life". Solving mysterious puzzles, adventuring realms, or collecting key story items will put you to the test!

name: Soul device
summary: Soul Device is a 2D platformer shooter with features of the roguelike genre. On your way you will encounter various items that will strengthen you, equipment that will give you new abilities, and several weapons that will be responsible for your attacks.

name: Soul's Remnant
summary: Soul's Remnant is a free to play 2D platformer MMORPG by Chaomoon, with a focus on social gameplay and exploration. Customize your skills with our classless system, team up with others, and defeat monsters, bosses, and dungeons together!

name: Sonic.exe The Disaster 2D Remake
summary: Sonic.exe The Disaster 2D Remake is adapting and rebalancing well-known Roblox experience (originally created by OutLaikRBLX/OutLaik) in 2 dimensions, adding many additional mechanics and features for gameplay diversity.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog is a promotional mobile-browser game based on Sonic Superstars. The game was made to promote the December 2023 McDonald's Happy Meal campaign to promote the game.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Spinball
summary: A J2ME port of Sonic the Hedgehog Spinball.

name: Social Status: Life Simulator
summary: In this online survival life-simulator, you start off in town with no money and no prospects in life. Get an income, a house, interact with other players, save money, buy the things you have always dreamed of. Become a part of the social elite and be remembered as a social legend.

name: Sonic DS
summary: A tech demo featured at E3 2004 which had the player swiping back and fourth and the touch screen to allow Sonic to gain speed.

name: Soul Covenant
summary: The moving experience of a story of life told through death.A VR Tactical Action game experience with a high level of immersion, where the player will be one with the protagonist and take on a battle for the fate of the world.

name: Some Goodbyes We Made
summary: I have some memories of saying goodbye that I don't want to forget, so I turned them into 11 minigames and backed them up in this collection.

name: Sonia no Daibouken: Mittsu no Hihou no Kakusareta Nazo!
Sonic Superstars: Lego Fun Pack
summary:
The LEGO Fun Pack includes:
- LEGO Tails Skin
- LEGO Amy Skin
- LEGO Knuckles Skin
- Additional LEGO Stages for Battle Mode

name: Sonic Drift 16-Bit
summary: Get ready to race with Sonic Drift 16-bit, the electrifying Genesis-style kart racer brought to you by the creators of Sonic Triple Trouble 16-bit! This bold Game Gear reimagining speeds its way into the spotlight, delivering an exhilarating "best-of" the Sonic Drift series in a vibrant, revamped form!

name: Sonic: Lock & Load
summary:
Sonic: Lock & Load is a hyper-fast stylish action first-person shooter based on the Sonic the Hedgehog series of games and built on GZDoom.

It's heavily inspired by the high-speed platforming of Sonic Robo Blast 2, the heavily movement-based FPS gameplay of ULTRAKILL and the stylish action of Devil May Cry.

name: Sonic Robo-Blast! From The Past
summary: Sonic Robo-Blast! From The Past is a remake of two classic fangames from 1998 on a new engine in "standard definition 480p widescreen" with rad new features!

name: S.o.L.o.
summary:
../ Year 2.433 - Planet Tartessos /..

Unexpectedly, humans leave the mining planet, abandoning hundreds of robots to their fate under the sole tutelage of an artificial intelligence called I.S.A.C.

The extractions of ETHER (a valuable substance unique in the galaxy) are beginning to affect the circuitry and positronic minds of some of the robots.

… 100 Years Later …

name: Soulers
summary: Soulers is a Team-Building Twin-Stick Shooter. Assemble a team with time-slowing Protagonist and Colleagues with different abilities, and save the world from invasion of 'Glitch'.

name: Sonic Robo Blast
summary: A remake of the original Sonic Robo Blast, updating it to a new engine, included in the Sonic Robo Blast from The Past compilation. It aims to recreate the game faithfully, addressing its issues and modernizing its features.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2
summary:
SRB2 TGF (or SRB2 The Games Factory) was the first version of SRB2, which was developed between March and July 1998 before being scrapped. Unlike all following versions, SRB2 TGF was still a 2D game, created with the game-making tool The Games Factory. Compared to Sonic Robo Blast, SRB2 TGF was considerably more advanced: It featured monitors, springs, shields, spikes and the ability to spin on the ground. The levels included features such as water, moving platforms and mine carts. Enemy collision was much less buggy and the player could now bounce off enemies and monitors.

SRB2 TGF was later scrapped to be released as the 3D game in the Doom Engine.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2
summary: A remake of Sonic Robo Blast 2 (The Games Factory) released in the Sonic Robo Blast from The Past compilation. It aims to recreate the game faithfully, addressing its issues and modernizing its features.

name: Sonic Robo Christmas Blast
summary: SRB1 Christmas (also known as Sonic Xmas Blast) was released in December 1998, during the period between the end of SRB2 TGF's development and the release of SRB2 Halloween a year later, as it was clear by then SRB2 would no longer be using this engine. It is largely a repackaging of SRB2 TGF's existing levels with Christmas-themed names and a winter theme applied. The ability to save the game was not present however, and the game itself would start immediately on load.

name: Sonar Shock
summary: Submarine’s haunted! Hunt and be hunted in this horror dungeon crawler inspired by the decay of the Soviet Union (and immersive RPGs from the 90s).

name: Southfield
summary: Weird farming meets silly physics in Southfield! Combine chaotic crops with unpredictable effects, build your dream farmstead, and experiment with playful machinery. Wobble your way around an ever-changing island solo or with up to three friends and unearth its secrets.

name: Soldier Force
summary: Soldier Force is a fan remake of Star Soldier by Studio Siesta, with enhanced graphics and four playable ships from other games in the Soldier series.

name: SOVL: Fantasy Warfare
summary: SOVL is a ruleset for playing fantasy wargames. It can be played with miniatures on a table or digitally on Steam.

name: Sonic Forces Overclocked
summary: Sonic Forces Overclocked is a mod for Sonic Forces whose aim is to introduce fully new thought-out levels, with brand-new level design, visuals, and an original soundtrack.

name: Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing Arcade
summary: An arcade port of Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing.

name: Sonic XG
summary: Sonic eXtended Genesis, aka Sonic XG, is a Sonic fangame created by Euan "Sir Euan" Gallacher and Joseph "Nitemare" Waters, and has gone through many different variations in the past. Its most recent build was released on August 17th, 2023.

name: Solve et Coagula
summary: Solve et Coagula is a limit-removing replacement for Doom Episode 2: The Shores of Hell created by Nicolas Monti that was a runner-up for the 2023 Cacowards.

name: Sonic Colors DX
summary:
Sonic Colors HD/DX is a bundle of original modifications to the original (wii) Sonic Colors on a modified version of the Dolphin Emulator, with the goal of bringing the game up to modern graphics standards.
This mod aims to be more faithful to the original design than Sonic Colors: Ultimate, while containing fewer glitches.

name: Sonic Anniversary
summary: A cancelled PlayStation Portable port of Sonic Generations that was cancelled very early in development when it was still under the name Sonic Anniversary.

name: Sonic Superstars: Holiday Pack
summary: Bring cheer and joy to the holidays with this complimentary Sonic Holiday Costume!

name: Somsnosa
summary: If I had to, like, identify some part of this that expresses the theme of "Minimalism," it'd probably be the plot. Yeah.

name: SomnaBuster
summary:
If the dream is real to you, it is worth fighting for!

Accounting student Macy is down on her luck and out of her mind, but her life of hum-drum is abruptly interrupted by a visit from a mysterious firefly. After stumbling down a seemingly endless hole, she wakes up in a strange new world. With an explosive broom in tow, Macy sets out discover the mysteries of Esperanto and find her way home.

name: Sonic CD: Miracle Edition
summary:
As the earliest remastered of the classic Sonic Titles, Sonic CD has fewer changes and features compared to later remasters and Origins.

The purpose of this mod is to bring Sonic CD more in-line with the later remasters/Origins by adding several new features/options originally available in other mods.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2 Infinity
summary: A total conversion mod for Sonic Robo Blast 2 that changes its gameplay to resemble that of Phantasy Star Portable 2 Infinity.

name: SOS Mata Atlântica: O Jogo
summary: SOS Mata Atlântica: O Jogo is a game developed by Ovni Studios in collaboration with the SOS Mata Atlântica Foundation, where you choose an endangered region and reforest it by planting seeds, creating animals, and more.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Collector's Edition
summary: Keep warm with Cartman’s Knit Beanie, enjoy your bathroom time with the Cartman Talking Toilet Paper Holder, or get into the holiday spirit with the Cartman Snow Globe. The Collector’s Edition also includes a select set of tarot cards, the original soundtrack, and the game SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! on the platform of your choice.

name: Soul Harvest
summary: You are a very, very good boy trying to help a very tired Death Emissary complete his day's work gathering souls that are lingering in limbo.

name: Soreike! Anpanman: 5-tsu no Tou no Ou-sama
Soreike! Anpanman: Fushigi na Niko-niko Album
Sonic Nebulous
summary:
Sonic Nebulous is a fan-game based on the Sonic the Hedgehog SatAM TV series and includes elements from the original Sonic the Hedgehog games and comics.

It was released in 2009 by qwerty919 (AKA ironrind).

name: Soundless: Final Verse
summary: An update of Soundless that adds a new epilogue, text tweaks, new art and better accessibility features.

name: So 2 Mice Walk Into a Bar...
summary:
In the adolescent year of 2018, one "stick mice in my head and then beat my head in with a hammer and let them back out" was birthed into the world via a purulent sludge. Quick, hasty, raw, it ended up being a moderate success.

"So 2 Mice Walk Into a Bar..." is not a sequel to that. There is no JUMP Team here. In fact, we hate JUMP Team now. This is instead a spiritual successor which focuses on the most fun aspect of "stick mice..." (quickly designed levels focused around an ASM gimmick of sorts) without the limitations of "stick mice..." (begone sole C3 resources!).

Much of this hack was designed during the month of December 2019, hastily and under the influence. We hope you enjoy it as much as we enjoyed making it.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Top Down
summary: A mod for Sonic Robo Blast 2.

name: Something Unlimited
summary:
Something Unlimited is a comic-based parody brothel management game. You play as Lex, seeking to concoct a way to rid the world of superheroes while simultaneously placing yourself on one of its thrones. Unfortunately though, plans of world domination tend to cost a lot of money and you’re practically broke. When Roulette comes to you with the idea for a “meta-bordello”, you think up the perfect way to supply her with incredibly enticing workers – as long as you get a fat cut of the profits, of course.

Will you be able to “convince” enough heroines, henchwomen and villainesses to work for you? Can you grow the bordello enough to bankroll your final plan for world supremacy? Will you finally be able to take down the heroes/heroines once and for all, as well as your villainous rivals?​

name: Something Else
summary: This Super Mario World romhack is the result of over two years of work. It features lots of fun and varied levels, a new powerup, an original plot and a lot more. You play as Luigi seeking to go home from another dimension.

name: Soul of Sovereignty: Prelude
summary:
Soul of Sovereignty is a visual novel of deadly kindness and selfish virtue in a world of magic and ruin.

Story and music by ggdg (Cucumber Quest), featuring tracks by Toby Fox (Undertale, Deltarune).

name: Solbrain: Knight of Darkness
summary:
The old gods have forgotten this land (Cannae). No one could save our people when darkness began to spread and collect the souls of men for his army.
Solbrain - Knight of Darkness is a 3D exploration game.

name: Sora to Muku no 6-ki
summary:
You are the commander and train 6 boys and girls as pilots of "Muku Airplane".
While building the deck, you use cards in your hand with various effects to teach the children the three statuses of "piloting," "shooting," and "support," as well as "special skills.

In this title, you select one of three countries to begin play.
Each country has its own play style and scenario, allowing for a variety of ways to play.

name: Something
summary: A game about doing Something

name: Sonic Megamix Mania
summary: Sonic Megamix Mania is a fan-made mod of 'Sonic Mania Plus' that recreates the levels of the original 'Sonic Megamix' Sonic 1 Rom-Hack, as well as re-imagines them in a new mode!

name: Sonic X Shadow Generations
summary: Shadow the Hedgehog is back with Classic and Modern Sonic in Sonic X Shadow Generations, an all-new collection featuring two unique experiences! Play as Shadow in a brand-new story campaign featuring never-before-seen abilities that prove why he's known as the Ultimate Life Form! Speed through iconic stages from Shadow's history, discover hidden secrets in an expansive hub world, and unlock new powers to take on Black Doom and save the world. Sonic X Shadow Generations also includes a complete remaster of the highly acclaimed Sonic Generations, a time-traveling adventure featuring a greatest-hits collection of 3D and 2D Sonic stages, now with upgraded visuals and new bonus content.

name: Soul of Butterflies
summary: Soul of Butterflies is a point-and-click adventure game with a unique worldview. Players will take on the role of Anders and explore an extremely enigmatic world. Amidst indescribable struggles and fears, they will gradually piece together the truth of this world.

name: Soul of Butterflies: The Lobby
summary: "Soul of Butterflies: Incubation" is a point-and-click adventure game with a unique worldview. Players will take on the role of Anders and explore an extremely enigmatic inn as they unveil the world's hidden reality.

name: Somniata
summary: Uncover the mystery—turned nightmare—of a missing family in rural Massachusetts. A lone detective must survive the horror unleashed upon a family of four.

name: Solace Inc.
summary: A time-traveling autobattler where you assemble the best mercenaries (with the biggest bosoms) to fight off hordes of enemies.

name: Solaria
summary: Guide your city from fledgling solarpunk community to futuristic metropolis, one tile at a time. Watch your citizens survive and thrive. Solaria is a minimalist, solarpunk city builder where the city builds itself!

name: Solstale
summary: Solstale will take you on a whimsical 2D platformer adventure . Run, jump, and explore vibrant levels with friends. It's more than a game; it's a heartwarming journey into a hand-drawn universe.

name: South Scrimshaw: Part Two
summary: South Scrimshaw, Part Two continues the story of one life in a vast alien ocean. It is a richly illustrated experimental visual novel, written in the style of a nature documentary.

name: Soul Runner
summary: The walls change as you play! You wake up in an ever changing labyrinth that you must escape from. Don't let the monsters get you though.

name: Soulivion
summary: ​Soulivion is an immersive fantasy role-playing game with an in-depth demonic companion. Reclaim your soul and decide the fate of the afterlife.

name: Solar Storm
summary: Solar Storm is a classic turn-based artillery shooter. You are a tank pilot, fighting for control over the solar system. Battle your friends in a fully destructible terrain to see who is the best!

name: Something Something Spaceship
summary: Explore a malfunctioning spaceship and retrieve the items needed to fix it, while avoiding a colourful cast of enemies. An isometric platform puzzler inspired by games from the 8-bit era.

name: Soul Sader
summary: You becomes the knight who notices the disaster that's coming. A knight who has decided that his own power cannot prevent it wants to gain the power of other knights. You can use the portal to get directly to where the knights are, but the other knights won't be obedient.

name: Sou Desu, Anata no Koibito Desu.
summary: A psychological horror visual novel game about a stalker.

name: Soulflow
summary: Survival horror game where you try to escape a monster that is chasing you, try and escape in the shortest time possible

name: Sophia's Spa: Priya's Pole Dancing
summary: Six one-minute animations of Priya's pole dancing: two types of clothing, a night dress and a bikini along with the options: bra and panties, only panties and completely naked.

name: Sol Cesto
summary: Sol Cesto is a tactical and frenetic roguelite in which you have to master your luck. Choose a hero and reach the bottom of a random dungeon. In this grim world, every action has consequences...

name: Solitaire: Match 2 Cards - Valentine's Day
summary: Solitaire: Match 2 Cards - Valentine's Day - a card game and a love story. 120 new deals for lovebirds are all yours!

name: Solomon's Key
summary: The NES port of Solomon's Key, a puzzle game developed by Tecmo in 1986 for arcade on custom hardware based on the Z80 chipset. The game is generally recognized as one of the most difficult games to appear on the NES. The player, controlling a sorcerer known only as Dana must overcome unlimited enemy spawning, challenging level designs, a countdown timer, instant death from any physical contact with enemies, and limited ways to dispatch enemies.

name: Soundscape
summary: Exploratory musical metaverse hybrid reality warp world.

name: Sonic Superstars: Shadow Costume for Sonic
summary: Step into the intensity, mystery and ultimate footie-pajamas of this costume inspired by one of Sonic's greatest rivals! Embrace the darkness with the Shadow Costume for Sonic!

name: Solitude
summary: Beached upon the coast of a haunted land you must survive the trials of an ancient malevolent force which seeks freedom from its shackles. Battle against the horrors of the night, build shelters to weather the elements, scavenge for supplies and uncover the mystery at the heart of the island.

name: Soccer
summary: ported to the Atari 2600 as games 33-40 of the launch title Video Olympics

name: Source Checker
summary: Test your re-source-fulness and try to identify fake, humorous and real news from each other. See if you know what news sources are and if you you spot a reliable one in a news story.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Official Level Design Collab 2023 - Round 2
summary:
Welcome to Round 2 of the 2023 SRB2 Official Level Design Collab! The OLDC is a celebration of all of the map creators in our community. This time around marks one of the most jammed packed OLDC’s in the 2.2 era! With participants being more familiar with the UDMF format, unique level designs, gimmicks, and a unique hub with rooms by the participants, make this one of the biggest collabs that the OLDC has seen this time around!

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Official Level Design Collab 2023 - Round 1
summary:
Welcome to Round 1 of the 2023 SRB2 Official Level Design Collab! The OLDC is a celebration of all the map creators in our community. This time around, it is also the introduction of UDMF to the event, unlocking unique new level creation possibilities.

Single Player​:
- Spleenik The Game - dashdahog
- Rigonemetis 33 - InferNOr

- Frosty Pass Zone - JABSphere94

name: SolForge Fusion
summary: SolForge Fusion is a card-battling game where players tactically deploy creatures and cast potent spells to outmaneuver their adversaries—each card played levels up, amplifying its power!

name: Solar Serpent Squadron
summary: Solar Serpent Squadron is a survivor bullet heaven game with snake-like movement. You will build your snake "body" as weapons, and destroy hundreds of enemies swarm coming right at you!

name: Sonic 1: Return to the Origin
summary: This mod presents the levels in Sonic the Hedgehog 1 reversed, where the player must proceed from the right side of the level to the left side. How well do you know these levels? Do you know them forwards AND backwards?

name: Souhide Series: Omatsuri-zukushi
summary:
The summer festival that everyone enjoyed is now available as an easy mini-game collection!

There are 4 mini-games: goldfish scooping, yo-yo fishing, sauce senbei split, and ring throwing, and if you clear it, an expert mode will appear in each game.

You can get lottery tickets according to the score you played, and you can collect the items you took in the lottery. In addition, if you clear certain conditions, a hidden game will appear, and you can enjoy it as many times as you want.

name: Soulivion II
summary: ​Soulivion II is an immersive fantasy role-playing game with an in-depth demonic companion. Dominate the afterlife and decide the fate of everything.

name: Soul Warden Professional Academy
summary: Soul Warden Professional Academy is a simulation management and tactical strategy game. Here, you will rebuild a desolate combat academy, recruit and train professional soul wardens Lead them to break through their limits in various combat styles and reach the pinnacle.

name: Soul Shifters: Online
summary:
This is an exploration-focused game, so there's no predefined path to follow or a specific sequence of missions to complete; you are free to explore and discover its mysteries.
Face and absorb various daemons, open mysterious chests on the map, talk to NPCs. While there's no set mission sequence, some of them will open up new possibilities and paths for you.

name: Soliopop
summary: High speed, airborne, arcade action! Bounce the ball off platforms to gain score, hit targets to multiply incoming score, and avoid falling off the map.

name: Soccer
summary: One of the first four original games for the Pop Station. It is a generic soccer game with the players moving vertically.

name: Solar Quiz VR
summary: The educational app Solar Quiz VR will introduce you to the planets of our Solar system in virtual reality mode in the format of an entertaining quiz.

name: Soulbind: Prologue
summary: Soulbind: Prologue is an action platformer in the Roguelike genre. The hero is a common skeleton and an outsider. But there is one special feature - you can replace your body parts with parts of your opponents' bodies. Learn the backstory and start your journey in the world of Allaar.

name: Solo Flight
summary: Save your town in this action-packed, shoot-em-up, flight simulation game after a giant, alien worm rudely attempted to remove your civilization from existence. Start your engine, pilot and welcome to Solo Flight!

name: Sol Apocalypse
summary: KNOW YOUR ENEMY. FIRE YOUR CANNONS. A spaceship management and combat game. As the Captain of Silver Wolf, command your crew and use your energy strategically. Change your future with your decisions. Arm your ship and strengthen its shields. Survive in the solar system full of dangers.

name: Solar Raiders
summary: Suit up, grab your guns, and embark on a cosmic heist in this fast-paced bullet-hell roguelite. Solo or with friends, your goal is to overcome enemy packed dungeons and steal the Solar Core. Raid, loot, unlock powerful skills, create unstoppable builds and prepare to die.

name: Soda Scuffle
summary: A survivor game. The items in life suddenly mutate, and you will control the soda that gains special abilities to defeat one monster after another to maintain peace. Rely on your movements to avoid enemy barrage. Pick up experience to upgrade, defeat all bosses you encounter, and you will win.

name: Solitary Mark
summary: This is a casual puzzle game that is very simple and easy to understand, suitable for players of all ages. Players need to eliminate blocks of the same color or shape by clicking on them, or swap positions to connect them into three or more patterns. Each elimination earns points, and special items can also be used. The game interface is simple and beautiful, with smooth operation, exquisite graphics, and cheerful music, but it will not make you feel tired while you are crazy.

name: Sovereign Elect
summary: To become the new king, a contestant must secure the favor of at least four of the seven influential guilds in the kingdom. The contest is open to individuals of any background, fostering a diverse array of contestants vying for the throne.

name: Souls
summary: The souls are imprisoned in the mansion. Free them. Then you too can live.

name: Soko64
summary:
Sokoban is a famous puzzle game designed in 1981 by Hiroyuki Imabayashi, and first published in December 1982.

You have to place all crates over the targets, by pushing them.

This C64 version includes 64 8x8 tricky levels by David Skinner.

All levels are unlocked from the beginning, for you to try them all.

Solved levels will be marked with green.

name: Soulmaze
summary: Get confused and have fun! Take control of two characters simultaneously and independently through many mazes making them find each other as fast as possible! Soulmaze is inspired in the belief in soul mates that challenges the ambidexterity and motor coordination of the player!

name: Soul Wizards & Rogulite
summary: Adventurers led by a mysterious girl take on the challenge of a labyrinth that reshapes itself with every entry, aiming for the deepest layer. This title is a new kind of RPG that introduces soul-like and rogue-lite elements into a Wizardry-like 3D dungeon RPG.

name: Solse AI-Quest
summary: Solse AI-Quest: an AI-powered RPG where conversations shape the adventure. Navigate a pixel-art world, engage with dynamic characters, and influence the story through choice-driven actions and time skips. A retro-style game re-imagined.

name: Soul Hero Adventure
summary: A pixel-styled bullet hell strategy magic/fantasy CRPG

name: Soviet Soldier
summary: Experience history from the perspective of the Red Army in this story-driven FPS game. Make choices that will affect your comrades and the entire world. Fight in historical battles where you put down insurgents, eliminate enemies, and defend the motherland. The fate of the USSR rests in your hands.

name: Sojourn Past
summary: Embark on a transformative journey, where immersive visuals and stirring music breathe life into a captivating story. Traverse handcrafted landscapes, overcome intricate challenges, and unveil secrets in a one-of-a-kind adventure. Experience a deeply personal experience of self-discovery and growth.

name: Soccer Squad
summary: Be the best and bring your football team to the first division. Combine team management with 3d action.

name: Solar Wolf
summary: SolarWolf is originally based on Atari 2600's SolarFox. The point of the game is to scramble through 60 levels collecting space boxes. Each level gets harder. Obstacles like bullets, mines, and asteroids cover your every move. Beat the Skip timer and grab the powerups for your only chance.

name: So Who's Dr. Rabbit?
summary: An edutainment mystery game about the wonders of oral hygiene.

name: Solares
summary: Test your puzzle solving skills in the grid-based city of Solares. Move boxes to their colored locations by using switches and devices with new mechanics.

name: Song of Eriel
summary: "Song of Eriel" aims at building a game world with a deep economic and social system. Every NPC is vividly alive, with their own decisions and full range of emotions, naturally giving rise to a variety of stories. Here, you can chart your own course and author your distinctive saga.

name: SokoFarm
summary: SokoFarm is a Sokoban puzzle game with bright, cosy visuals and cute characters played out in a sleepy rural setting. Roll Chonky Chickens, Ducks and Geese to their preferred nests in the fewest moves possible. Play through the seasons to see new farms and features for even more brain teasing fun!

name: Song of Yosef
summary: Song of Yosef is a Metroidvania platformer with wacky enemies and fun physics.

name: Soul Eater
summary: The player embarks on a journey through a sword containing the soul of a being desperate for revenge against their past betrayers. As the player travels the world, they seek out those who betrayed them in the past, and with each encounter, they have the opportunity to seize their souls.

name: Soul #531
summary: As a recently deceased ghost, you only remember one thing, You have to get back to your dog. Fight enemies and solve puzzles to escape the underworld in this action puzzle platformer. Explore the different layers of the underworld, and face challenges along the way, drawn in a charming 2D style.

name: Soundelta
summary: A rhythm game with a unique spin: Spinning. Push your skill to the limit with 3 sets of 3 lanes on a spinning notefield. Featuring a growing roster of songs, VFX in every map, and a powerful editor for custom maps.

name: Soulscape: Shadows of The Past - Episode 1
summary: Soulscape: Shadows of the Past is an immersive and atmospheric adventure game that will take you on a journey into the world of Blake Turner, a former agent grappling with the shadows of his own past. Join us on the adventure through episode 1.

name: Somber Echoes
summary: Take the role of the resurrected Adrestia and embark on an epic journey to prevent your twin sister from unraveling the universe. Master acrobatic combat, explore the Greco-Roman space vessel Atromitos, and shape your destiny in Somber Echoes.

name: Solar System Simulator
summary: Gravity and exploration sandbox

name: Some Assembly Required
summary: Build robots, help humans, cause chaos! Some Assembly Required is a sandbox game about designing and building robots to serve the needs of squishy, hapless humans in the world of tomorrow.

name: Soar: Pillars of Tasneem
summary: Experience a beautiful world of floating islands through the eyes of a dragon

name: Sobosuba
summary: Shoot, squish, merge, amass! sobosuba is a satisfying physics game where you shoot and combine squishy blobs together, creating ever bigger blobs for the high score.

name: Source of the Nile: Digital Edition
summary: The single-player version of the legendary board game "Source of the Nile", finally brought to the digital realm. A challenging game of discovery played on a hexagon-grid map showing known Africa ca. 1820, in which the player competes with nature in order to survive.

name: SOS: Forgotten Planet
summary: SOS: Forgotten Planet is an Educational Survival Horror game where you learn Morse Code. Input Morse Code to open doors, listen to and decode it to open chests. Explore cautiously and find out the truth behind the Forgotten Planet’s destruction in this procedurally generated story.

name: Sophias Pizza Restaurant
summary: Help Sophia make her dream of starting a successful pizza restaurant come true. Sophia’s Pizza Restaurant is a fun mash-up of match 3 and time management.

name: SokoPenguin
summary: SokoPenguin is a Sokoban-style puzzle game, where you control a penguin who must push boxes to clear the path to its cozy igloo.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Season Pass
summary: Continue your Snow Day adventure with a Season Pass for SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! which includes and all-new Game Mode, New Weapons, a Weapon Variation, and Cosmetic Packs.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Cred Pack
summary: A kid today is defined by their hydration drink – and their swag. Impress your friends and show the world how much CRED you have. The CRED Cosmetics pack gives you plenty of cred with a fresh hairstyle, a CRED hoodie, and a cape.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Underpants Gnome Cosmetics Pack
summary: Elevate your style with The Underwear Gnome Cosmetics Pack! Unleash your fashion creativity with a trendy Underwear Gnome hat, a stylish beard, a vibrant and a green tunic.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - To Danse with Ravenous Shadows
summary: School is cancelled and Henrietta is bored. Join her efforts to pierce the veil and she will allow you to “Danse with the Ravenous Shadows” of South Park.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Digital Deluxe
Soreike! Anpanman: Panya-san te donna Toko?
Soreike! Anpanman: Waku-waku Suizokukan 1 - Suizokukan de Ikou
Soreike! Anpanman: Waku-waku Suizokukan 2 - Anpanman Gou Umi no Tanken
Soreike! Anpanman: Nakayoshi Doubutsu Land 1 - Ninkimono Atsumare!
Soreike! Anpanman: Nakayoshi Doubutsu Land 2 - Africa no Nakama-tachi!
Solar Merge
summary: Drop adorable planets to merge them and create even bigger magnificent celestial elements in this cozy physics puzzle game!

name: Solisquare
summary: Solisquare is an all new solitaire game that is fun and easy to play. But don't be fooled, there is more strategy than in regular solitaire.

name: Solitaire by MobilityWare
summary: Solitaire by MobilityWare is the original & best free Solitaire card game!

name: So, This Vampire Walks Into a Bar
summary: Join our broke protagonist Jackie, who, after a workplace accident, will never look the same again. Jackie desperately tries to make ends meet by working in an unusual bar, despite having no experience at all!

name: Sonic Riders DX v2.0
summary: Sonic Riders DX Version 2.0 features new characters, new cosmetics, new super forms, improved gameplay, revamped stages, revamped gears, quality of life and mechanical fixes, and improvements to competitive balance from the previous versions of Sonic Riders DX.

name: SoundKilla
summary: SoundKilla a game steeped in Caribbean Sound Clash culture. Succeed by collecting dubplates, mastering DJ skills and conquering formidable bosses. Set against a backdrop of cityscapes and tropical islands, this game offers a unique blend of music, strategy and storytelling from start to finish.

name: SoulTail
summary: Play SoulTail and save the forest. Summon and nurture a guardian spirit with various cards and their combinations to protect the forest from the encroaching monsters. Become a guardian who defends the forest with the power of your strategy and luck!

name: Sokoseed
summary: Discover the joy of puzzle-solving with a natural twist in Sokoseed. Grow saplings and strategically maneuver boxes through clever, minimalist stages in this peaceful yet challenging gaming experience.

name: Souvenir
summary: The 54-year-old protagonist, living solely on memories from the past 10 years, undergoes a year of hypnotherapy with a psychiatrist to recover lost memories from 44 years ago. On January 14th, with no significant progress in the therapy, he encounters ruins and a young girl during hypnosis.

name: Soulrise
summary: Soulrise is a challenging precision platformer that can be played alone or with up to three friends. As you climb a tower, you determine the angle and power of your jumps. Be careful... One mistake and your progress is set back by an unpleasant fall!

name: Solar Kingdoms: Human Survival
summary: Solar Kingdoms is a real-time strategy game where you command forces across solar systems, engaging in large battles both in space and on the surfaces planets. Establish colonies, find resources and artifacts, and fight up to 8 factions in skirmish, large campaign, missions, and multiplayer.

name: SoulShake
summary: After waking up, you will find a way to escape from an abandoned hospital in the basement and figure out what happened.

name: Sociopat
summary: Sociopat is an absurd comedy driven game that combines point and click adventure with action packed FPS game. Play in a role of an anti-hero and do some mischievous acts, NOW!

name: Sonic Overture '95
summary:
Sonic Overture '95 is a fan-made prequel to the first Sonic the Hedgehog, inspired by 32-bit games from the Saturn era and the scraped concepts from the original Sonic the Hedgehog. It tells the story of Sonic's adventures on Christmas Island.

The game is an unofficial revival of the game known as Sonic Overture, which had a demo released in 2014.

name: Sonic 3: D.A. Garden Edition
summary:
Sonic 3: D.A. Garden Edition is a ROM hack of Sonic 3 & Knuckles created by D.A. Garden. It aims to be a "vanilla" but complete and fully featured take on S3K, with 23 acts of new level layouts matching the scope and size of the original game.

In 2020, a user named Thorn ported the hack to the Sonic 3 AIR project as a mod, allowing it to be played with the additional features AIR provides.

name: Solely Puzzle
summary: Solely Puzzle is a browser based jigsaw puzzle game.

name: Sonder
summary: Experience an innovative co-op adventure where two players have to work together. Engage in collaborative puzzle solving and dynamic combat with each player having unique abilities. Delve into a psychological narrative that explores the essence of humanity.

name: Solis
summary: Elio is a boy who deals with reality through imagination. He finds himself trapped in a dark dungeon mirroring his thoughts. This wordless puzzle platformer tells a story through memory shards. Only by gathering them, he hopes to break free.

name: SOVL: Reptilian Kingdoms
summary: This is a Faction Pack for SOVL - Fantasy Warfare. It adds the Reptilian Kingdoms to the game.

name: Soul Return
summary: Help a little soul go through a unique and wonderful world. Explore the area, solve puzzles, find scraps of memories to help the hero reunite with his family and find out why Death didn't come for him.

name: Sounds of War
summary: Experience the action! Sounds of War delivers intense 5v5 battles across modes like Capture The Flag and Free for All. Customize weapons, rank up, and become the ultimate warrior. Join a clan, challenge friends, and dominate the battlefield. Warfare redefined!

name: Soul Mates
summary: Pursue love in the afterlife as a ghost in a town full of other single spirits. Court quirky characters, go on haunting dates, and find your soul mate.

name: SOS OPS!: Guns n' Ops
summary: GUNS N' OPS! is not just DLC, it's an explosive party in the world of shooters that will turn your perception of strategy and fun upside down. Are you ready to dive into this insane chaos?

name: Sonic Boom Cannon
summary: A two week mini game flash project made by Xanadu32 on newgrounds. This hedgehog-powered cannon can fire your favourite sonic character down courses to collect rings, chaos emeralds, and distance for rings.

name: Sonic Boom Cannon 2
summary:
It features 5 times more content than the original game. There's over 50 characters to unlock (52 to be exact). There is also 5 farley large minigames to unlock such as a full pinball adventure game and a 2 player battle game.

Main game goal - fire your sonic furry down the stage to gain distance. The more distance you achieve the higher amount of rings you will be rewarded. Use the rings to unlock more characters and store items. The more characters you have unlocked, the more rings you will be rewarded at the end of each shot. In a sense, the game gets easier the more you play.

The store releases one new item a day. Most of the items are keys to unlock certain characters while other items provide more game content and functionality. Come back every day to unlock them all! (or cheat if you can figure out how (its simple really (really really simple) ) )

name: Soul Strike
summary:
Easy Peasy Monster Squishy! Hack and slash like there’s no tomorrow! Soul Strike - Idle RPG is the perfect action idle game that you have been looking for!

Slay and strike vampires, titans, zombies, slimes, and dragons to continue your legendary adventure and battle your way to be the number 1 legend of this fantasy war!
Step into a free online idle RPG game and experience stress-free gameplay.

Discover why Soul Strike stands out as a top rogue-like idle action RPG game in today’s gaming landscape.

name: Solendara
summary: Enigmatic Hack and slash style Action RPG where ancient mythology and magic blend with modern civilization~A story that reveals the forbidden, the desires, and the secrets of the world~

name: Something's Not Right
summary: Ever gone somewhere and thought "Something's Not Right"? Explore, investigate and experience an ever changing environment. Enter the world and decide if everything is the same or whether something is different. Make your choice carfefully as it may be the last decision you ever make.

name: SOVL: Deepwood Guardians
summary: This is a Faction Pack for SOVL - Fantasy Warfare. It adds the Deepwood Guardians to the game.

name: Solium Infernum: Belphegor, Paragon of Impiety
summary: Take the Infernal Throne as Belphegor, the Paragon of Impiety, a diabolical inventor whose contraptions are designed to serve one wicked purpose; to corrupt, weaken, and enslave!

name: Soul King: Out of the Box
summary: Lynn must call on her abilities and blasters once agian to brave the dangers of this new land, face new nightmares, and find the pieces needed to get legendary creator and dream weaver Grimzo Out of the Box

name: Soul Surge
summary: Soul Surge is a fast-paced roguelite, where speed equals damage. Slide, kick and tear through the seven stages of grief. Evolve your abilities, to confront the root of corruption and emerge victorious?

name: Solomonaris
summary: Discover the mythological legend of The Solomonari in this adventure story-rich game. You will play from 2 different perspectives and unveil the mystery of Father Iancu, his son Ptolomeu and Solomon. Featuring stunning graphics, beautiful voice lines and 4 different levels for over 15 minutes of gameplay.

name: Sowon : The Toy Wonderland
summary: One night, the attic door, the one that was always closed, slid open, sending a girl falling into a strange world. Will she ever be able to get back home?

name: South Park: Snow Day! - 420 Pack
summary: Celebrate 420 with new cosmetic items for SOUTH PARK: SNOW DAY! Featuring cool outfit items for your New Kid.

name: South Pole Bebop
summary:
A multiplayer Into The Breach-inspired turn-based strategy game. It is designed for two players, is set on a 9x9 board where each player controls characters and bases. Each player commands three characters and three bases, aiming to eliminate the opponent's characters or bases while fending off a zombie horde that attacks both players.

Players can create a customizable deck before each game, consisting of three characters and up to 15 unique ability cards that enhance bases and provide special powers to characters. During gameplay, players can purchase ability cards using collectable cores. These cards are limited to those included in the player's deck, which can be modified and reused for subsequent games.

name: Songs of Travel
summary: An animated graphic novel exploring the unique stories of five migrants seeking new beginnings in Europe. Together, these stories paint a mosaic of themes such as our hopes, dreams, and identities; home; and the things we treasure most.

name: Source Multiplayer Pack
summary:
In 2005, the retail release of Counter-Strike: Source included Half-Life 2: Deathmatch and Day of Defeat: Source as bonus games.

In 2010, Steam released a digital version of the same bundle as Source Multiplayer Pack.

name: Someone to Hold Me
summary: A very short, simple visual novel made in a week, starring an asexual girl and her internal and social tribulations. Featuring one ending, an unlockable epilogue, and a few post-game secrets.

name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed
summary: The PC version adds 5 exclusive characters, being Ryo Hazuki, Football Manager, Shogun, General Winter and Willemus.

name: SoulCalibur III: Arcade Edition
summary: Soulcalibur III: Arcade Edition is a reworked version of Soulcalibur III with all glitches found in the console version fixed and the overall balance of many moves revamped. Amy, Hwang and Li Long are also official characters with Amy getting a new outfit for the second player.

name: Sonic Boom: A Dating Sonamy Sim?!
summary:
Sonic Boom A Dating Sonamy Sim?! or SBDSS, is a bite-size visual novel fan-game made to attempt to tackle an idea I've always had lurking (menacingly) in the back of my mind: "What if there was a sonamy dating sim?"

Following the events of Sonic Boom S2 EP. 44 : Sonic the newly appointed delivery boy is led to a house along the water's edge. Greeted by a familiar face with... intentions, he plays along.

name: Sokoblox
summary: Sokoblox is a hybrid of two classic puzzle games: Sokoban (the push puzzle) and Bloxorz (the rolling block puzzle).

name: Sonic Mayhem
summary: To celebrate the 20th anniversary of the release of Quake 2 comes this singleplayer unit based on a side-mission to Stroggos!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: This Game Gear port of the Sega Master System version makes some changes to emerald locations and bosses.

name: Sonic X Bowling
summary:
Sonic X Bowling is an online Flash game published on the 4Kids TV website by 4Kids Entertainment on 11 June 2005 to promote the then-airing anime series, Sonic X. It is a simple Sonic X-themed game of bowling.
The game is based around the traditional ten-pin bowling game. Here, the player assumes control of Sonic on a bowling lane with ten bowling pins at the end. The player can send Sonic down the bowling lane as a curled-up ball so he can knock down the pins like an actual bowling ball. When having to roll Sonic, he will spin in one place while a blue arrow automatically swings left and right in front of him. When Sonic is then thrown, he will head in the direction that the arrow was pointing in at the time of the throw, before making a small turn in the opposite direction. How Sonic is aimed will determine the number of pins knocked down.

name: Sonic Chronicles: The Dark Brotherhood
summary:
Is an online Flash game released in 2008 to promote Sonic Chronicles: The Dark Brotherhood. The game was featured on the Sonic Chronicles: The Dark Brotherhood's official websites before they were shut down.
The player controls Sonic, who can interact with the characters and the environment in order to read character bios, trailers, story tidbits, etc. In this game, Sonic will automatically follow the cursor. which is a virtual Nintendo DS stylus for the mouse. Sonic can also collect Rings in order to unlock hidden media, and is able to visit Green Hill Zone and Voxai Colony Beta. The game has 75 Rings in total hidden around the two environments (some of which are hidden behind scenery in the areas). Obtaining enough Rings will grant the player two wallpapers as rewards, as well as a set of icons that are granted when all the Rings are collected.

name: Sonic Ring Thing
summary:
Is an online Flash game published on the 4Kids TV website by 4Kids Entertainment in 2008 to promote the then-airing anime series, Sonic X.
The objective of the game is to score as many points within sixty seconds by clicking objects that move from the bottom of the game screen to the top. The player will earn one point for clicking on a Ring, five points for clicking on the Master Emerald and lose ten points for clicking on Dr. Eggman in his Egg Mobile.

name: Sonic Universe 2
summary:
Two months after Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles' adventure in Sonic Universe 1, Robotinik returns. He calls Shadow to help him, but Shadow doesn't accept because he lost badly two months ago...
Robotinik doesn't like it and leaves.
So Shadow turns good and tries to support Sonic & co. against Robotinik (again!!).
Now Robotinik is back stronger than ever! He takes the Master Emerald and leaves!
Help Sonic & Friends get the Master Emerald back!

name: Sonny Legacy Collection
summary: Sonny 1 and Sonny 2, updated for modern hardware, team up in the Sonny Legacy Collection. Traverse a story-rich world where strategy meets supernatural in a quest for identity and survival. Master tactical turn-based combat and discover the truth behind Sonny's resurrection in these classic RPGs.

name: Soul Battles
summary: Soul Battles offers a unique twist on the classic block puzzle genre. Dive into Tetris-style gameplay, where merging and matching blocks takes on a whole new dimension. Solve intricate puzzles in our Block Blast mode or explore endless possibilities in our captivating Blocks adventure!

name: Sonic FGX
summary: Its a Sonic Fan game created by Gamer Dee. Is a Side-Scroller Platformer based on the Sonic Advance series

name: Sonic PC
summary: Sonic PC is a fan game developed and released by Physik Multimedia in 1998, packed in with Sonic Klik & Play Collection. The game is currently only available in Sonic Klik & Play Collection, as the original game has yet to be found. It uses 32-bit conversion images of sprites from Sonic the Hedgehog CD and Sonic the Hedgehog 2, instead of the original 16-bit sprites.

name: Sore Ike! Anpanman: Hajimete Kaketa yo! Oboeta yo! Hiragana, Katakana: 50-on Board Kinou-tsuki
Sonic Rumble
summary: Ready, Set, Rumble! Join Sonic in this intense arcade royale game set in Dr. Eggman's diabolical Toy World. Collect legendary skins, all-new emotes, and build skills as you progress through this action-packed game! Mayhem is best with friends!

name: Sonic Heroes Competition
summary:
Use the LEFT & RIGHT arrow keys on your keyboard to direct
Sonic in the direction of the rings. Try to collect at least 70 to
enter the competition. Avoid Mines as these will slow you down
and reset your score to O. Good Luck!

name: Sonic Riders X
summary: A re-imagining of the Sonic Riders games with the creators' own ideas to put a new spin on it.

name: Sorcery+
