summary: Sorcery+ is an expanded re-release of Sorcery. Besides new graphics and sound, it features an additional scenario which is played after finishing the original content. Here the player visits 28 new locations in a quest to destroy the necromancer.

name: Soulscape
summary:
You're a guy in a wheelchair. Cast magical dragons to destroy your enemies! Explore the huge and free world of 'Soulscape'.

God has chosen you to be the protector of the new world, but there's one problem. You have no legs. You need to get to the peak of the world and harness your true power!

Find the many secrets of this world and get the Golden Legs!

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Snowball
summary: The all-new snowball is perfect tool for all those who mastered the other weapons in the game. Unleash devastating new effects on enemies and grant powerful supporting effects on your allies too.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Bear-Serker Pack
summary: Intimidate your enemies with this grizzly warrior costume. Look ripped and sweet with a kid-drawn six pack, facial tattoos, and vicious bear helmet. It's the perfect outfit to show everyone you are here to pillage and burn!

name: Souls Chess
summary: Dive into Souls Chess, where the Sengoku era meets chess and auto-battler. Command samurai units, claim upgrades, and engage in stat-driven combat to reign supreme on a chessboard like no other. Outwit the AI and emerge as the ultimate warlord of feudal Japan!

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Asspen Pack
summary: Get ready to hit the slopes with the Asspen Cosmetics Pack featuring iconic outfits from the season 6 episode, “Asspen.”

name: Sodden
summary: The story of survival in a closed scientific town. There are unexplained anomalies around every corner. There are terrifying monsters behind every door. Survive while a dark otherworldly something penetrates the world, absorbing everything around.

name: Social Democracy: An Alternate History
summary: Play as the Social Democratic Party of Germany in 1928, and try to stop the NSDAP from taking power. Guide the party through elections and parliamentary politics, and deal with the Great Depression and the spiraling political violence that characterized the late "Weimar Republic".

name: Solarys The Witch of Fire
summary: Take control of the witch, Solarys, and fight your way through beat-'em-up styled levels, using kicks, punches, and fire magic.

name: Somnium Tenebris
summary: Somnium Tenebris is a 5-player, investigative horror game set in a Lovecraftian world. Explore the depths of the ocean with your team as you uncover evidence in your efforts to identify the megalithic creature... and escape before it's too late.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Project Mettrix
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog: Project Mettrix is a fan game led by Stealth, created using his own E02 Game Engine. This platform makes this game available to DOS, Windows, Linux, MacOSX, PSP (CFW), and Wii (Homebrew Channel) users, and has allowed a significant amount of mechanical evolution from the game's earlier incarnations.

name: Sonic Legends
summary: Sonic Legends is a non-profit fan project and re-imagining of classic, notable levels throughout the long-lasting history of Sonic fan games!

name: Soul of Savarog
summary: Soul of Savarog includes four of Twisted Universe's mobile horror thriller games. All of these plays tell the story of Savarog. Play Savarog, Savarog 2, Rule and Savarog 3 respectively.

name: Solnox: Grimoire of Seasons
summary: Become the master of seasons in this tactical turn-based deckbuilder. Dominate the ever-changing battlefield by unleashing the four seasons and utilizing their terrain-altering effects. Learn to create perfect synergies & guide your three sorcerers to victory against unholy creatures.

name: Soul Interface
summary: This game is a virtual aquarium \ petri dish. Grow \ design virtual lifeforms, experiment, watch them compete for survival in a shared environment, spread them across space to other singleplayer worlds....<3

name: Sorelle
summary: Welcome to the magical world of Sorelle: a whimsical 3D puzzle-platformer that immerses you in the magical seaside town of Isola Chiara. Play as sisters Alessandra, Bella, and Capri as you explore the magic of sisterhood in a puzzle-solving adventure to restore magic and save the summer festival.

name: Somnium
summary: You trapped in an infinite dream loop. To reach the morning, you must carefully observe your surroundings.

name: SongBird: FlingAThing
summary: A unique, stylish platformer based around flinging yourself as fast as possible in any direction. Venture deep into the "Songbird Short Stop" to fix a cash register that won't scan milk in this exhilarating precision platformer.

name: Songs of Conquest: Rise Eternal
summary: Embrace the darkness in your endeavor to crush the Stouthearts. Raise the dead to serve once more. For the scholars of Loth know that death is not the end, it is merely the beginning.

name: Sonic 3D Snowboarding
summary: When you board over a ramp, press spacebar to do a trick. The further up the ramp you are when you press spacebar, the better trick you do. Down hill there are 15 jumps. See how high you can get your score before you run out of ramps to jump off.

name: Someone's Outside
summary: You had a long day at work and just arrived home. However, something feels off.

name: Sombionic
summary: Shoot monsters and romance them during combat! In Sombionic you play as a female scientist fighting monsters and genetically engineered humans, harvesting their rare genes and organs for your own inventory.

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: The Chaotix
summary:
The Chaotix Are Here!

Six unique characters, six unique playstyles! Play as Espio, Mighty, Charmy, Vector, Heavy, and Bomb in SRB2!

name: Sonic Robo Blast 2: Heroes
summary:
A Sonic Heroes inspired level pack for Sonic Robo Blast 2 by STHE1230.

Team mechanics implemented like in the real Heroes game. There is a total of 34 emblems to find. Each level is a combination of act 1 and 2 from the original game. The Chaos Emeralds are hidden in the levels, think you can find them all?

name: Soviet Anomaly 7
summary: You are trapped in an endless soviet-era building.Observe your surroundings carefully to reach escape.Don't overlook any anomalies.If you find anomalies, turn back to downstairs.If you don't find anomalies, come to upstairs.

name: Souptown Matty
summary: Souptown Matty is a story-based mystery-solving dog simulator. Around the time when spirits linger, an unexpected visitor comes and steals your owner's beloved necklace. It's time to take action on your own and start investigating.

name: Sound Horizons
summary: Score unique melodies in this minimalist rhythm game. Experience a dynamic music that reacts to your actions, and try to survive until the end.

name: Soviet Zombies
summary: Soviet Zombie is a thrilling and immersive zombie survival horror game that transports players back to the mysterious atmosphere of the 1980s to 1990s Soviet Union. This game offers a unique and experience as you navigate the harrowing world of post-apocalyptic horrors set in the Eastern Bloc.

name: Solomonic
summary: I've made a game where you can split a baby in two. I didn't want to publish it because I feel bad about it, but people seem to like it?

name: Sonic PC Port Remake
summary: The Sonic PC Port Remake is a Sonic creepypasta game created by JohnKun and JoeDoughBoi.

name: Soulkin
summary: Soulkin is a tactical roguelite game blending strategic monster-collecting and turn-based combat. As the summoned heroine, Nadia, you’ll harness the power of Souls to bond with magical creatures and lead them against the encroaching corruption threatening Ankiril.

name: Sonic Utopia
summary: Sonic Utopia is a 2D Sonic fangame created by BlueFrenzy in 2006 made with Klik &Play. It is most well known for its original zone Panic City, which has since made appearences in Ring Racers and Sonic Legends (Two other famous Sonic Fangames). It is not to be confused with Sonic Utopia (2020) by Mr. Lange.

name: Sonic Gaiden
summary:
Sonic Gaiden is a 2003 fan-made hack of the original Sonic the Hedgehog game for the Sega Mega Drive.

This hack is significant in the Sonic ROM-hacking community for several reasons. First, it's a hack of a Sonic 1 title; at the time of its release, such hacks were slightly rarer as Sonic 2 was the most frequently hacked Sonic game. Secondly, it is a hack of the Japanese Sonic 1 ROM; the U.S. Sonic 1 is more commonly used, but the Japanese revision has added features such as scrolling clouds and rippling water. Thirdly, the hack allows the option to play as either Sonic or as Mighty the Armadillo, who became popular as a founding member of the Chaotix crew and as a playable character in SegaSonic the Hedgehog. In addition, the hack includes new levels with new artwork and separate endings for each character.

name: Sonic Frenzy Adventure
summary: Sonic Frenzy Adventure is a retro-style fangame developed since 2004, featuring 11 zones and 5 playable characters, including two original ones. The game introduces unique mechanics such as a revised ring system with four levels, various shields with passive effects, and special powers exclusive to Sonic. Players explore each zone, ending in a boss fight, with a storyline focused on defeating EggRobo's mechanical empire. Achievements track high scores and hidden collectibles, and the game offers character-specific routes and challenges.

name: Soul Blade
summary: The console version of Soul Edge adds more content to the original arcade game such as new characters and additional game modes.

name: Sonatina
summary: Sonatina is a challenging action-adventure RPG. Fight epic battles against formidable foes using rhythmic shmup (“shoot them up”) combat.

name: Solitar: Retro Picks
summary: Solitar Retro Picks is a collection of relaxing and challenging solitaire games, perfect to play while listening to an audio book or while binge watching your latest favorite TV series.

name: Sokoban
summary: A mod for Dinothawr which implements four levels from the original Sokoban game.

name: SOVL: Ratkin Clans
summary: This is a Faction Pack for SOVL - Fantasy Warfare. It adds the Ratkin Clans faction to the game.

name: Sonic Nexus
summary: Sonic Nexus was a game created by Nexus Team, headed by Slingerland. The game used the Retro Sonic engine by The Taxman who joined the project in 2008. The game began development in the summer of 2006 and had three demo releases, two at the Sonic Amateur Games Expo and one during the summer of 2008. It is a critically acclaimed fangame, garnering comments such as, "absolute perfection of the classic Sonic style" from SAGE visitors and various blogs. The character lineup consisted of Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles.

name: Some Munnings
summary:
As the world's foremost expert on Sir Alfred James Munnings, only you can differentiate his art from a series of creative works!

Some Munnings are present, but watch out for tricky counterfeits and increasingly-complicated certification requirements!

name: Solridge
summary: Solridge is an educational video game aligned with third-grade Common Core competencies. As the player, you will obtain gold by helping the townsfolk with their problems. If you want to save the village from disaster, you must continue gathering gold and growing stronger!

name: SOF: Enemy from the future
summary: Lead the SOF squad and defend the world against alien invasion! Engage in thrilling turn-based battles and uncover the mysteries of enigmatic extraterrestrials. Your time has come – join the fight and safeguard our future!

name: So Much Stuff 3: Odds & Ends - Collector's Edition
summary: Discover So Much Stuff!

name: Solar Dominion
summary: Its Sentries versus Serpents in this multiplayer shooting adventure. Team up or compete against one another to earn rewards.

name: Solstice
summary: Help Poppy as she journeys through unknown lands in search for her lost sister. Unknown secrets lie ahead, as not everything is originally as it seems... Solstice is is an emotional yet action-packed journey of self-discovery, forgiveness and acceptance.

name: Sonic 2: Return to Westside Island
summary: Sonic 2: Return to Westside Island is a ROM hack of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 for the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis focusing on level layout changes to the majority of the original game.

name: SoulSync City
summary: A cyberpunk movement shooter based on momentum and speed.

name: Sokoban DS
summary: Sokoban, the classic Japanese puzzle game, comes to your Nintendo DS offering you hours and hours of entertainment. Your objective is to push boxes (or balls) to their correct place through a small space full of obstacles.

name: Sofie: The Echoes
summary: Sofie: The Echoes is a third-person action-adventure game that immerses players in a story-driven experience. Explore diverse environments, solve challenging puzzles, and unravel the mysteries surrounding Sofie’s family.

name: Sonic Exe One More Time
summary: Created by Mr Pixel Productions, One More Time is a new, more graphic take on the original Sonic.EXE creepypasta.

name: Sonic Exe One More Round
summary: An improved version of Mr Pixel's "Sonic Exe One More Time", featuring new art and content.

name: Sonic.EXE One Last Round
summary: This is a total rework of the original "Sonic.exe One Last Round" game, where the story about Sonic OMT will end, it should be noted that One Last Round Rework will be a kind of "reboot" where everything seen before will be tried, but in the best way

name: Sonic 2 Recreation
summary: Sonic 2 Recreation revamps the original game with new levels, playable characters, graphics, and gameplay mechanics.

name: Sounds of Shadows
summary:
An echolocation-based stealth horror game for Windows.

You are B4-BY, a sightless maintenance robot in an underground science facility. While you were powered down, calamity struck the facility's populace. For most of the scientists, it is too late.... But one of them has survived, and it is your task to find and save her.

However, something roams the dark and quiet corridors of the facility.

You are not alone.

name: Sonic Superstars: Retro Diner Amy Costume
summary: A Retro Diner Costume for a classic gal.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode I
summary: Differences in the mobile version include 2 of the levels being different from what there is on home console.

name: Sonic the Very Useful Engine
summary: Thomas was everywhere.

name: Soul Sipper
summary: Suck the souls of unsuspecting victims to survive in Soul Sipper, a twisted platformer game by Mors, Gaem, and Catonator. Use your straw to propel yourself through 9 levels filled with many different obstacles!

name: Soul Park
summary: Build an infernal fun park, judge your customers' sins and give them what they deserve: a HELL of an entertainment!

name: Sorcero
summary: In Sorcero, your goal is to command thousands of units into epic battles while supporting them with powerful spells cast from your mage tower. The game features both a campaign mode and a skirmish mode. In the campaign, players will face a series of challenging skirmishes, upgrading and choosing their spells and units between battles to prepare for the next encounter.

name: Sonic The Fighters Blitz Hyper Edition
summary: Sonic The Fighters Blitz Hyper Edition (STFBHE) is the continuation of Sonic the Fighters Blitz (STFB), a 2D re-imagining of the arcade game Sonic The Fighters created by Restless Dipstick. STFBHE aims to rebalance and expand upon the original STFB.

name: Sonic Championship
summary: The original arcade release of Sonic the Fighters, released as Sonic Championship outside of Japan and in Sonic Gems Collection.

name: Souvenirs
summary: Explore a house in search of Leonardo's memories. Souvenirs is a merge like strategy game, created by a tiny independent French studio.

name: Son and Bone
summary: Son and Bone is a fast-paced first-person shooter where you take on the role of Sam Judge, a Sheriff, that after tracking down a notorious bandit who attacked a farm and kidnapped a local, has found himself on an alien world overrun by prehistoric creatures and dinosaurs.

name: So Many Words
summary: Find the hidden word, each word guess is met with feedback indicating the correctly positioned letters. This is a word game that requires mastery of the English language, logic and a bit of luck. Choose to test your skills with words ranging from 4 to 9 letters in length.

name: Sonic [Unl]
summary:
In 2010 an unknown rom was posted on the romhacking community of Sonic the Hedgehog. The rom in question was found near an abandoned nursery under broken condition. The rom was eventually dumped for all to play.

This rom became infamous for not having the greatest controls, and it appeared to be very glitchy. Some the glitches were that collision was off, and enemies spawned less frequently, it was removed on October 30th of 2010.

One user managed to grab it in time, and played the hack for themselves, and it wasn't just glitches that they saw.

name: Something Bad is on the Moon
summary:
Found Footage: Apollo 17

The Apollo 17 mission was the last publicly disclosed mission to the moon.

Since then, numerous missions have been launched in absolute secrecy.

Something very bad happened on Apollo 17, and we recorded it.

name: Solitary Sentinel
summary: Welcome to Solitary Sentinel, a captivating single-player roguelike tower defense experience where you must defend against constantly evolving enemies by upgrading a single tower. Enjoy simple controls, and deep strategic gameplay as you fend off the relentless onslaught!

name: Sorrow Asylum 3
summary: Sorrow Asylum 3 is a looping horror game, a mix of an abandoned asylum and your mind's prison.

name: South Words Hero
summary: Explore a world where names are everything. Rip letters from your own name and use them as weapons, shields, and tools. Each name opens new possibilities.

name: Some Heroines Climb Up a Tower to Ask God Why the Game Has a Name That's So Long
summary: In this erotic turn-based strategy rogue-like, make it to the final boss by pushing and pulling your way through a relentlessly difficult horde of God’s demonic angels. Get new sets of class skills every single run and master them to combo your enemies back into the afterlife.

name: Soar Up The Charts
summary: Soar Up The Charts is a fast-paced rhythm game and arcade style rail shooter where music is your weapon! With tracks provided by Alden Ave and KeepFlying, be ready to turn it up and blast your way through those radio robots!

name: Soul of the Forest
summary: Embark on a quest to unite the forest against the tyrannical king in an hour long, turn based RPG epic! Soul of the Forest was created by a team of 55 students over the course of 2 semesters as a case study of modern turn-based RPGs.

name: Sorcerer Smackdown
summary: In Sorcerer Smackdown, joining the fight is simple: grab a friend, choose a character, and let the match begin! Unleash both physical and magical attacks using the keyboard for commands, mixing and matching moves to craft devasting combos to prevail against your opponent!

name: Soccer Party
summary: Soccer Party is party game of soccer that delivers chaotic 2 vs 2 matches where skill reigns supreme. Dash, kick, and jump your way through unpredictable environments filled with obstacles. No power-ups, no gimmicks - just pure soccer action!

name: Solar Voltage
summary: After a huge solar storm destroyed their ship and left them stranded, help Volt and her crewmates escape the dangerous planet filled with deadly robots and a mysterious AI.

name: Sonic 2006
summary: A level pack that demakes Sonic The Hedgehog (2006)'s zones to Sonic Robo Blast 2.

name: Soulthread
summary: A dynamic, turn-based RPG set in a world full of mystery! Play as Mabel and unravel the secrets of the universe by finding the four crystals of the book. With the help of her old high school friend, Will, and a mysterious mage named Nyxra, anything is possible in this world of epic proportions!

name: Sombra
summary: Sombra is a 2D platform video game with a pixel art style where you have to guide a cat to the exit of the cave it has fallen into, with the only option of clicking a button to perform different actions.Help this scared little kitty find her way back home.

name: Solar Sweets
summary: A multiplayer kitchen-simulator game where you can compete with your friends to find how who is the better chef! Create 10+ different types of pastries including: Waffles, Croissants, Pancakes and more!

name: Sooty's Revenge
summary: Enter "Sooty's Rest," the forbidden forest where the legendary fire prevention mascot, Sooty The Bear, is real. Use your compass, flashlight, and survival skills to escape his pursuit. Navigate, hide, and outsmart Sooty in this thrilling wilderness survival horror game. Can you make it out alive?

name: Somewhere in Hell
summary: Somewhere in Hell is a mod inspired by Krinkels' Madness Combat mainline flash series. Featuring over 15 weapons, 3 playable characters, and a whole lot of violence.

name: Solaris Strike
summary: Planetary Conflict: 2301 is sci-fi multiplayer third person shooter set in the future, in a war between the Lunar Federation and Planetary Union.

name: Sonsgorod: The Archipelago
summary: Attack, outmaneuver, misdirect. Sonsgorod is a roguelike card battler where positioning is key, enemies can be turned against one another, and one bad play can cost you everything. You'll need all your skill and creativity to prevail as you journey into the past and face down a mighty empire.

name: Solateria
summary: In a world where the Litt have perished, a small pyron warrior embarks on a journey to find the King, the Primordial Flame, the last hope to save the world. Defeat mighty foes, unleash fiery attacks, and master parrying. Explore a beautifully hand-drawn world and uncover its secrets.

name: Sonic x Shadow Generations: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
The digital deluxe edition allows access to the game 3 days earlier, it also Includes:
-The Base Game + Digital Deluxe Season Pass:
-- An additional character skin and level for Shadow (releasing Holiday 2024)
-- Terios Skin
-- Extra BGM Pack
-- Digital Art Book + Soundtrack
-- Skill Points (Sonic Generations)

name: Sodablood
summary: Chase pins as a bowling ball with dreamlike abilities in a surreal bowling alley.

name: Somnus: Nonogram
summary:
This story is about a dream we all once had during our childhood.
In the quiet of night when everyone else is asleep, take a fantastic journey through dream land.
This story is about a dream we all once had during our childhood.
Discover the stories that await you at the end of the dream.
We'll be waiting for you inside the dream of Nonogram.

name: Solid Chunks
summary: Step into the thrilling world of "Solid Chunks" where your keen eye and dedication are the keys to our society's success! In this fantastically hand-drawn comic book realm, our noble humanoid fly overlords have bestowed upon us the great honor of collecting their precious poo.

name: Solar: Survival Space Battle Simulator
summary: In SOLAR, you survive in space, expand and customize your fleet, and battle enemy fleets and up to 12 bosses. With tactical decisions and rewards, you optimize your spaceships for epic battles.

name: Sokubaku Kanojo to Pet na Boku: I'm Your Pet
summary: Wouldn't anyone be happy to have a girlfriend who makes them lunch and comes to pick them up every morning? If I had to pick one flaw...it would be that this love is very suffocating...

name: Somnilithe
summary: Multiplayer Yume Nikki inspired game made for Dream Diary Jam 8, featuring characters from Yume Nikki and .flow.

name: Sonic and the Moon Facility
summary:
Sonic and The Moon Facility is a 2D Sonic fangame that follows Sonic and Tails on an adventure to discover the secrets of a mysteriously reactivated research facility.

This build includes all the levels in the game, however only SONIC can complete the main campaign of the game. Debug tools will unlock once you beat the game, or if you know how to access them already.

name: Sonic.2017
summary: This is a playable Subterfuge game created by Romeo-Hosting, based on the short animation by Coda.

name: Sonic: After the Sequel - Omega
summary: Sonic: After the Sequel - Omega is fan-made enhanced version of Sonic: After the Sequel.

name: Sonic2.EXE
summary:
An unofficial prequel to the Sonic.EXE creepypasta game.
It explains the events before the MY5TCrimson's Sonic.EXE game.

name: Soap Bubble
summary: Guide the bubble through 13 challenging levels of the mine. Use the arrowkeys to steer - and go easy or you'll hit a wall. And I worked quit [sic] a bit on sound, both for atmosphere and audial clues - so crank that baby up!

name: Sojourn Through the Decade
summary: An autobiographical game focusing on the ten years of creating worlds and its respective characters, with The Sojourner seeing how his stories have fared since then.

name: Sonic Legacy
summary: Sonic Legacy; A re-imagining of the original VS Sonic.EXE mod made by original developers and prominent figures in the Sonic.EXE community, dedicated to the history of Sonic.EXE and other surrounding freaky media, connected characters, and creepypastas.

name: Solaris 2
summary: Free online MMORPG game. Play with your friends. Conquer the continent and be the best. This is a private server for Metin2.

name: Sonic Souls
summary: Sonic Souls is a Fan made creation, its been made with Unreal Development Kit (UDK).

name: Sonic The Hedgehog 2D
summary: A 2D remake of Sonic '06 which features a complete remake of all Sonic stages and bosses.

name: Solace Creek
summary: Solace Creek is a Horror game with a focus on suspense, exploration, stealth & puzzle solving. You wake up in a sinister place, haunted by a monstrous presence. Uncover the mystery of this dark place... or become its prey.

name: Sons Of The Dream Forest
summary: The beautiful and cruel wilderness requires you to learn survival skills, such as building campsites, making tools, hunting, and gathering. You can cut down trees, fish, plant crops, and even collaborate with other players to tackle environmental challenges together

name: Something Is Wrong With My World Map
summary:
"Something is wrong with my World Map" is a puzzle game, where you need to play with various sizes in the world map in order to create the right path to continue.

Switch size by exiting a village on a different side, or even by simply opening the map!

Step on a mountain to flatten it, or switch to the small size to enter caves!

Will you "step up" to the challenge?

name: Soteria
summary:
Made for the #GBJAM, Soteria is a Game Boy styled top down level-based shooter.

There are 15 levels filled with monsters and obstacles to overcome with the help of bullets and vombs.

name: Some Some Convenience Store: Yena After Story
Some Some Convenience Store: Soohee After Story
summary:
Find out what happens after Soohee Pyeon's ending

Before I knew it, it had been a year since I'd met Soohee.
As if fate were guiding our actions, we all ended up back at the convenience store.
The reason: the store, relationships, and Some Some...

name: Some Some Convenience Store: Adela After Story
Some Some Convenience Store: After Stories Pass
South Park: Snow Day! - Bigger, Longer & Uncut Anniversary Pack
summary: Celebrate 25 years of "South Park: Bigger, Longer & Uncut" with all-new cosmetics

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Nonconformist Weapon Variation Pack
summary: Abandon the normy daggers and seize these malevolent Sickles. Drain the lifeblood of the unworthy and repurpose their essence to power the darkness within you. This reskin of the daggers comes with upgrade cards and macabre new cosmetics.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - To Danse with the Veiled Horde
summary: Gather up to three fellow souls and delve into four maps "Main Street", "South Park Elementary," “Town Square,” and beyond.

name: Sonic Advance: International
summary:
Sonic Advance (Android) International is a collection of mods for the Sonic Advance's Android port that gives quality of life improvements to the game.

The mod pack went by other names before: it started as Anniversary Mods Pack, then was retitled to MOST Mods, being retitled once more to the current title.

name: Sonic & Shadow Black Ice
summary:
The story is based on the old fairytale story The Snow Queen.

This will be a story driven game. So there will be no battling. Just moving around, interacting with people and objects while solving simple puzzles.

The game will contain voice acting but only for the main cast. Sonic, Shadow and The Snow Queen.

name: Sonic 2: Rescue Tails
summary: Sonic 2: Rescue Tails is a reimagined version of the 8-bit Sonic 2 for the Master system and Game Gear, in the style of the 16-bit Mega Drive/Genesis Sonic games.

name: Sonic Adventure Blast 2
summary:
Sonic Adventure Blast 2 allows you to play as Sonic, Tails, and Knuckles in Adventure style gameplay.

Blast through over 80 missions as you explore both classic and brand new levels.

name: Sonic Dungeons: Prototype
summary: This a concept for a first-person action game set in the Archie Sonic universe. A game where the player explores the open world of Mobius, recruits various freedom fighters to their team, and raids enemy fortresses ran by Dr. Eggman.

name: Sonic Eclipse
summary: Sonic Eclipse is a 2D Classic Sonic Fan Game, created by the BrainBox Interactive Team, featured as an entry to this years (2024) Sonic Amateur Games Expo!

name: Sonic Emerald Madness
summary: Sonic Emerald Madness is a boost styled Sonic game that takes its inspiration from Sonic Rush, Sonic Colors and a bit of Mario 64.

name: Sonic Endless Adventure
summary:
Welcome to Sonic Endless Adventure! This is a fan game in which there level created in real time.
In the game you will visit the Green hill level, again. You have only 3 lives, losing them, will end the level. During the passage you will encounter Red Star Rings. With it you can open music for the level.

name: Sonic Fighting Heroes: King of The Ring
summary: Sonic Fighting Heroes: King of The Rings (SFH: KOTR) is a MUGEN-based 2D Fighting Game, which has been in development since 2017.

name: Sonic Freedom Frontiers
summary: Sonic Freedom Frontiers is a game that intends to feature many levels, three playstyles, and a longer story. It plans on combining light influence from RPGs with and Platformer inspiration, making it a larger scale game. It has cutscenes that tell of a narrative with a science fiction flavor, that I wrote. It also has two different styles of platforming, one with more emphasis on physics and momentum, the other on combat. If it is completed, it is likely to have five different zones, all with five levels in each of them, with most of them being platformer styled levels. It is meant to feature hub worlds with top down gameplay, NPCs you can talk to, and saving.

name: Sonic Gamebook Origins
summary:
A brand-new old adventure!
Relive the classic adventure gamebook Sonic vs. Zonik, now in full digital glory!
Everything is recorded by the game! No more pencil and paper - enjoy the adventure without lifting a finger!
Progress saves automatically, so come back and resume your game as you please!
Never get lost again with the included Cheat Sheet, a detailed guide to every section in the game!
Toggle a variety of options to customize your experience and foil Robotnik's diabolical traps!
Features authentic Sega Genesis music to suit the mood of each location!

name: Sonic StrikerZ
summary:
Welcome to Sonic StrikerZ!
Using 2D Fighter Maker 2022, experience 1v1s, 2v2s, 3v3s and even 4v4 2D chaotic fights across as of right now in this version 27 Zones with 11 characters, including a story/campaign mode with bosses and online!

How you use your power is up to you...
Do not forget your dreams...

name: Sonic Into Cyberspace
summary: Sonic Into Cyberspace is a 2D modern Sonic game that aims to evolve and expand upon the 2D Sonic formula. This game places an emphasis on freedom of movement and flow, maintian high speeds to enter boost mode to go even faster and collect rings to reduce the amount of time to enter boost mode.

name: Sonic Magenta
summary: Sonic Magenta is a free 2D Sonic the Hedgehog fan game made by Scorbunny Channel.

name: Sonic Re;Velocity
summary: A 2D Sonic fan game with a heavy focus on high-speed momentum and stupidly fast platforming, with a simple control style, a unique gameplay style and a strange emphasis on going as fast as hedgehogly possible.

name: Sonic Skyfall
summary:
From Stick Drift Studios comes Sonic Skyfall, a brand new Sonic fangame being made with the Infinity Engine framework, taking inspiration from Unleashed, Colors, Generations, and Frontiers! The very first demo is now playable, featuring the first 4 levels of the game. Each can be played as either Sonic or Shadow, and both hedgehogs have their own collectibles to find. Explore the Atlas Sky Islands in Nanite Nimbus Zone and enter the Liminal Spaces: pocket dimensions that somehow emits familiar energies.

Both Hedgehogs each have one new ability/quirk added to them to mix things up a little. Sonic still has his Bounce Bracelet as his Air Special, but can now also utilize a new Ground Special Ability called the Cylaunch. As the name implies, it is based on the Cyloop from Sonic Frontiers, except it sees Sonic instantly launching himself high into the air, while also being able to take out closeby enemies on the ground. This ability will drain 10 units of Sonic's Boost/Energy Meter, so use it with caution! Shadow's Chaos Control is his Special Ability, which also costs 10 Energy. Not only does Shadow slow down time, but he also reduces his own gravity by a very noticeable amount. With proper use of this perk, Shadow can reach unthinkable heights while cutting down times! Both characters can also fire a projectile that seeks closeby enemies at the cost of 3 Energy. Shadow will fire a Chaos Spear, and Sonic will launch a Sonic Boom Shockwave.

name: Sonic Tameshi
summary:
Sonic Tameshi is a Classic Sonic Fan Game created on the Sonic Worlds engine.

The game's story follows Sonic after he finds out about Dr Eggman's new plan to extract all the natural resources from an Mystical island. Face Metal Sonic and save the island, stop Eggman from building the Pleasure Island Theme Park and save the beautiful paradise hidden on the other side of the sea. Sonic will feature the Drop Dash, Insta-Shield, Peel Out and a Wall jump!

name: Sonic Unleashed +
summary: Sonic Unleashed + (Plus) is a sonic fan game that aims to port Sonic Unleashed to PCs.

name: Sonic Velocity
summary: Sonic Velocity is a 3D Boost formula hedgehog game in the vein of Sonic Unleashed and Generations.

name: Sonic X TMNT: Score Party
summary: Sonic X TMNT: Score Party is a collection of mini-games featuring classic Sonic and teenage mutant ninja turtles from the animated show from the 80s! In these mini-games you will need to collect a certain number of points. Their total number is rated S or D rank, depending on how many points you have collected. In this demo, you will be able to run at super sonic speed as Sonic and kick some shells as Leonardo! At different levels from the games of both franchises, you will meet Dr. Eggman's badniks and Shredder's foot soldiers (and not only)!

name: Sonic: The Secret Tracks
summary:
It's time to get Funky!

Sonic and Secret Tracks is a Sonic themed overhaul of the popular Rhythm Game of Friday Night Funkin. A collaborative effort between Sonic fans in order to bring a fun, radical experience by the mania for the mania.

name: Sollire
summary: Sollire is a Gradius-style Shoot Them Up combined with bits and pieces inspired by Sonic, Megaman and Zelda.

name: So Hungry
summary: So Hungry is a casual idle game. Come and collect various animal and plant cards!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Legacy Bundle
summary:
This bundle includes the original Sonic Generations plus its Casino Night DLC, as well as:

Sonic Adventure + DX DLC
Sonic Adventure 2 + Battle DLC
Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 1
Sonic the Hedgehog 4: Episode 2
Sonic the Fighters (Xbox Only)

name: Sonic NG
summary: Sonic NG is a fan-made game in the Sonic the Hedgehog franchise. Players control Sonic and possibly other characters as they speed through levels inspired by classic Sonic games. The game likely features fast-paced platforming gameplay, with Sonic running, jumping, and spin-dashing through various environments. Sonic NG may incorporate both 2D and 3D elements, blending traditional side-scrolling sections with more modern 3D gameplay. As a fan creation, the game probably aims to capture the essence of classic Sonic titles while introducing new elements or improvements. Sonic NG might include original levels, characters, or gameplay mechanics designed by fans to expand upon the established Sonic formula. While not an official Sega product, Sonic NG represents the ongoing enthusiasm of the Sonic community for creating new experiences within the beloved franchise.

name: Sonic Adventure SX
summary: When Eggman opens a portal to Scuttle Town from Mobius, Sonic must chase him and stop him from taking over Shantae's world. With both worlds merged, Sonic and Shantae must find the Chaos Emeralds and stop Eggman and Risky from taking over the dimensions.

name: Sol Frontiers
summary:
Engage in space battles, upgrade starfighters, and explore the vast galaxy!

Every sun has its shadow. In SOL FRONTIERS, every space battle in the galaxy is a step towards unraveling the mystery. Engage in turn-based strategy to illuminate the darkness in this space battle saga.

name: Sonic Alpha
summary: Sonic Alpha is a 2D classic sonic fan game inspired off the time when older 2D Sonic fan games were made such as Sonic XG, Sonic Nexus, Sonic Classic, Sonic Axiom, etc; with a Mania inspired touch. It will feature returning stages as well as new ones.

name: Sonic Eternal
summary: Sonic Eternal is a fan game inspired by Sonic 3 and Knuckles Chaotix.

name: Sonic Metal Adventure
summary: Welcome to Sonic Metal Adventure! A 2D platformer similar to Sonic Rush with Dreamcast era graphics and music.

name: Sonic Battle for Station Square
summary: Sonic Battle For Station Square is a game that experiments by bringing the collectathon style of games to 2D. This game is heavily inspired by the game "Spongebob Battle For Bikini Bottom"

name: Sonic Adventure Blast
summary:
Sonic Adventure Blast is a fan game that aims to capture the feeling of movement in Sonic Adventure and Sonic Adventure 2, while making various changes and additions to make it feel new and unique.

There are 22 different levels (plus a boss fight), with a total of 60 different missions to collect A ranks. There are also hidden NPC's hidden throughout the levels to collect. You can unlock different skins to play as by finding these hidden NPC's and getting A ranks.

A large amount of levels are from Sonic Adventure and Sonic Adventure 2, but there are also plenty of levels from other games as well. Delfino Plaza and Noki Bay have been made into treasure hunting levels, where Knuckles searches for randomized emerald pieces. In Kingdom Valley, you play as Tails, who can use his fly ability to reach the many cliff ledges and structures in the level.

There are four different types of missions - Normal Mode, Ring Attack, Lost Chao, and Hard Mode. Ring Attack has you collect a certain amount of rings, which vary per level. In Lost Chao, you have to search for a chao hidden somewhere in the level. Hard Mode is for treasure hunting levels, and the pieces are not randomized, but you don't have a radar, so look closely!

name: Sonic Stranded
summary:
Sonic faced many dangers before, but now, he will have to face a new one... hunger. In this 3D, Adventure-like game, Sonic will be stranded on a deserted island and it's up to him to build a settlement and find other castaways, who were prisoners on Egg Carrier before it crashed. And most important, survive. However, the island has keys to many mysteries, including origins of the original Phantom Ruby...

This 3D Sonic fangame is style of Sonic Adventure is aiming to create engaging level design with dozens of alternate paths and zero boost pads. This game brings Classic-like physics which can be used to reach new paths, elemental shields, new Special Stages, multiple playable characters with unique abilities designed with S3&K/Mania/Advance philosophy and heavy focus on story.

name: Sonic Mania: Colorful Encore
summary: Colorful Encore is an enhancement project for Sonic Mania Plus focused on reimaginated or revamped palettes for Encore Mode. Some of them were reworked from scratch with original themes, others are enhanced versions of the originals. It also improves some sprites and other visual assets.

name: Sonic Limitless
summary: Sonic Limitless is a 2D modern fangame that aims to recapture the gameplay found in Generations.

name: Sonic: Battle of Chaos Mugen - The Final Battle
summary: This game is a fighting game with elements of Sonic The Hedgehog.

name: Sonic Mania: The Misfits Pack
summary: Sonic Mania: The Misfits Pack is a semi-large scale Sonic Mania mod that adds a multitude of new levels.

name: Sonic Mania & Sonic Plus
summary:
Sonic Mania and Sonic PLUS is a complete overhaul of Sonic Mania and its DLC:

- Every character has been turned into Sonic, while still retaining their original moves and some even receiving their own unique custom sprites!
- Every badnik and Object been turned into Sonic.
- Every stage's color palette has been edited to Sonic's colors. Sonic might even appear in the background occasionally, so keep your eyes peeled!
- Some music tracks have been remixed to include various vocal themes from the Sonic franchise (Usually Sonic's theme).
- Special Encore palettes for the levels that still relate to the Sonic theme while being different to the original in some fashion. (For example, Chemical Plant in Mania mode uses Sonic's Mania palette, while in Encore Mode it uses his Sonic 2 Palette.)
- Special Stages are not way past cooler with the addition of 5 million Sonic models on the screen!
- A very special ending for those who manage to make it all the way to the end of Encore Mode!
- ...and tons of other secrets and easter eggs to find!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Pangoture
summary: A Sonic and Pangolin Love crossover game.

name: Sonic 1 8-bit Redux
summary: A game which intends to remake Sonic 1 for the Game Gear with Mania extra features such as a time attack mode, 16:9 aspect ratio, multiple different customisable art styles and multiple playable characters.

name: Sonic Knight In Training
summary:
Sonic Knight In Training is a browser game released on the Neopets website in February 2009 to promote Sonic and the Black Knight. The player controls Sonic the Hedgehog, armed with Caliburn, in the center of an isometric corridor with crossroads pathways.

The game is a reskin of Lego Star Wars II: Blaster Battle, another sponsored Neopets game previously released in 2006 to promote Lego Star Wars II: The Original Trilogy.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 for mobile as part of the Sonic Cafe service.

name: Sonic Island: Lost Paradise
summary: A fangame about another Sonic's adventure. Being a "Sonic Island" duology reimagining.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: Entropy
summary: The first episode in the Sonic the Hedgehog RPG series.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: In The Belly of The Beast
summary: The second episode in the Sonic the Hedgehog RPG series.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: Return to Iron Lock
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: Return To Iron Lock is the third episode of the Sonic the Hedgehog RPG (e.g. SatAM RPG) series, whose first episode debuted at SAGE 2020

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Blasting Adventure
summary: This game is a remake of Sonic 3D Blast 5, Sonic Adventure 7 and Sonic Adventure 8, Game Boy/Game Boy Color bootleg games by Makon Soft/Yong Yong.

name: Solidarność
summary:
Solidarność is a 1991 Polish strategy computer game developed by P.Z.Karen Co. under the direction of Przemysław Rokita and published by California Dreams. It was created by Polish programmers specifically for an American audience in order to support a Hollywood film about the life of Lech Wałęsa, which was never actualised.
Set in Poland in the 1980s, the player takes the role of the leader of an illegal union, and aims to gain more support in 7 regions than the Communists. The player achieves this through speeches, printing leaflets, organizing demonstrations and strikes.

name: Sonic DL Adventure
summary: Sonic DL Adventure is a work-in-progress 2D fan-game inspired by Sonic Adventure and Sonic the Hedgehog (2006)

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Borderline
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog: Borderline is a ROM hack of the original 1991 Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Genesis. The project reimagines South Island through a narrative set after the events of Sonic Mania Plus, where Dr. Robotnik uses a portal and the Chaos Emeralds to build "Robotnik Land," a machine threatening to awaken an ancient monster in the Earth's core.

name: Sokama
summary:
Sokama is a Gameboy style platformer developed for GBJAM 12 and DINOJAM4.

66 Million Years Ago...

The sky had darkened and fire rained from above. Plants withered in what little light there was. Animals that didn't adapt, or turn on each other, fell as well. You are a small rodent-like mammal, separated from your family and trying your best to survive.

name: Sonic Uprising
summary: SONIC UPRISING is a 2D side-scrolling platform fan project led by bennascar and Team Giga-Drive. Uprising is inspired by the classic formula from the Mega Drive Era of Sonic the Hedgehog, expanding it by taking elements from various other titles in the series. The project's goal is to create a story inspired by SEGA's Sonic Forces, while also being able to tell a narrative that goes far beyond a simple reboot.

name: Solitaire
summary: The classic card solitaire, now for Vircon32, with difficulty selection (drawing 1, 2 or 3 cards).

name: Sonar Scout
summary: Pilot your submarine to activate and reestablish a network of beacons while carefully utilizing your sonar to navigate the low-visibility depths of the ocean.

name: Songs of Conquest: Vanir
summary: Songs of Conquest's first new faction has arrived from the shores of the Bleak East. Conquer the lands of Aerbor as the mighty raiders of Vanir and witness their powerful transformation into the Vildra.

name: Sonic Beyond the Speed
summary:
Enjoy this fangame in 2d at full speed and platform.
Eggman plans to attack with his air fleet and so that sonic and tails do not bother them he will teleport along with the Chaos Emeralds to places of the past.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: The Home Saver
Sonic Dreamscape
summary:
An adventure for one hedgehog.

Sonic Dreamscape (or Dreamland in other regions) is a game about Sonic entering Dreamland in quest to stop Eggman from wielding the power of the dreamscape.

name: Social Warfare
summary: Be a troll-for-hire on social media! You will serve in the Social Warfare battalion and promote loyalty to the Great Kingdom of Eternia, while disrupting society in the enemy nation.

name: Solar Collision Control
summary: Control the power of the sun in Solar Collision Control, a thrilling arcade game where you must survive as long as possible by avoiding obstacles, collecting stars, and completing challenging missions to achieve the highest score.

name: Soccer in a Box
summary: "Soccer in a Box" is a soccer game that supports 2-8 players competing on the same stage. Use various dances to kick all the balls into the opponent's goal!

name: Sonic Dynamo
summary: An adventure-style Sonic fangame, focused on exploration.

name: Souls of Shadow
summary: Souls of Shadow seamlessly blends deep role-playing elements with thrilling action combat, delivering an unparalleled adventure for players. Get ready to embrace the challenge, uncover the truth, and save this world engulfed in darkness!

name: Soup Boy Goes to the Soup Convention
summary: The Soup Convention is in town. Can you win the soup eating contest?

name: Sonic Generations
summary: A time-traveling adventure featuring a greatest-hits collection of 3D and 2D Sonic stages, now with upgraded visuals and new bonus content.

name: Sonic.EXE: The Assault
summary: Forgetfulness… Regret… Revenge… When he makes mistakes… what would a father get from his son? What would a son do to calm his sorrow? And what would a ruthless demon commit to feed his rage.. And to calm his hunger? Play the game and resolve the mysteries through a bunch of spooky environments, lots of obstacles, challenging puzzles & an intense terrifying gameplay!

name: Sonic and the Mayhem Master
summary:
Sonic and the Mayhem Master is a fanmade RPG game that is based on the Sonic Storybook series. The game offers a new look that fits to the aesthetic of the genre. Explore the world of steampunk, as weird things are about to happen. Solve cases with your sugar-freak partner, and find out the truth of this mechanical city.

The game was eventually rebranded, losing the ties to Sonic the Hedgehog, retitled as Mekanikko.

name: Sonic Regress
summary: Sonic Regress is a fangame trying to follow the functionality of the classics of the 16-bit era, with the goal of being another classic Sonic adventure.

name: Soccer World
summary: Master your goalkeeping skills with Soccer World—your ultimate training tool! Whether you're aiming to improve or complement your outdoor practice, our immersive VR game brings pro-level training right to your headset.

name: Softie
summary: Softie is a short creepy (but cute!) point-and-click adventure game. Take on the role of a cuddly teddy bear trying to find their lost owner in a peculiar house.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Gear Shift
summary: Save Tails from the clutches of Dr. Robotnik in this complete re-imagining of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 for the Master System and Game Gear!

name: Solitaire Grand Harvest
summary: Play Solitaire Grand Harvest and get a sweet 10,000 coins welcome bonus! Play this fun, free TriPeaks Solitaire game! Endless fun solitaire games & a solitaire farm that's just waiting for you to build it!

name: Sonic: The Murdering Insanity
summary: Sonic The Murdering Insanity is a RPG Horror Sonic game. With chases, complex boss fights and voice acting.

name: Sonic Ringworlds
summary: Sonic Ringworlds is planned to be an SA1-like Sega Saturn homebrew game.

name: Sonic Kick
summary: Sonic Kick is a Sonic fangame inspired by the Advance and Rush series, meant to be the combination of Rush's adrenaline-fueling speed and Advance's momentum-oriented origins, all built from the ground up.

name: Sonic Revisited
summary: Sonic Revisited is a new take on recreating the first Sonic game from scratch.

name: Sonic Hoshi
summary: Sonic Hoshi is a 2D fan game that fits in-between the story of Sonic the Hedgehog 2 and 3.

name: Sonic Chaos Remake
summary: A fan-made remake of Sonic Chaos by Laiker_2003

name: SokoCode
summary: Sokocode is a programming sokoban "Zach-Like" where you take on the role of an intern at the newest box-centered enterprise, BoxTopic.

name: Soul Injector Commando
summary: FPS where you are tasked by God to give souls to the wealthiest people on Earth, helping them get normal jobs and be productive members of society.

name: Soul Armors Recollect
summary: Soul Armors Recollect is a single player RPG about a journey of recollection. Smash up your enemies with various weapons and skills. Explore and collect equipment and items as you try to remember why you're left with only your armor.

name: Solitary Echoes
summary: You were a technical support engineer on a geoforming outpost on LV-513, tasked with changing a very important light bulb when the outpost was overrun by a hostile alien lifeform. During the attack you managed to grab some supplies and lock yourself into a maintenance room. After some days, the noise and the screams from outside slowly die down. After some weeks, your supplies slowly run out. Time to head out. See what's going on. Find help. Survive.

name: Soap Bubble 2
summary: Expanding the core concept of Soap Bubble 1, this game has the bubble struggling with wind tunnels, water hazards and a vast array of haywire machinery.

name: Songs of Rats
summary: The Wreckage resounds with the echoes of countless songs, filling the air of a constantly shifting maze where bravery and sacrifice are key to staying alive. Then, without warning, one song goes silent. Will you step into this dicey labyrinth and uncover its secrets in this minimalist and dark RPG?

name: Souls That Wait: Penunggu
summary: Step into the shoes of a new security guard at a Malaysian school with a dark history in this first-person, realistic supernatural thriller. Encounter spirits rooted in Malaysian folklore, make critical choices to free trapped souls, and uncover the truth behind the eerie manifestations.

name: Somnicoda
summary:
Somnicoda features an assortment of dreams for your perusal, from idyllic forest pathways to brooding cityscapes. Be wary however as these dreams may twist into nightmares...

Through the somnia you will come across keys and equipment to help you progress through the dreamscape and piece by piece bring an end to the turmoil within.

name: Sonic X Shadow Generations: Sonic Jam Skin
summary: A legacy skin for Classic Sonic inspired by his look in Sonic Jam.

name: Solborne Gorge
summary: Bathed in the presence of a dark, uncaring sun, the pumpkin-populated abattoir of Solbone Gorge struggles to release itself from diseased misery. This features very simple mechanics, and belongs to the "walking simulator" style of game. Only mouse-look and simple movement controls are required.

name: So I'm a Spider, So What? Ruler of the Labyrinth
summary: I was just an ordinary high school girl, but suddenly I was reincarnated as a spider monster. Armed with only my human knowledge and my overwhelming positivity, I'm forced to use spiderwebs and traps to defeat far stronger monsters just to stay alive in a clicker game...

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Beta Hoax
summary:
In 1999, Cyan Helkaraxe wanted to stir up more interest in Sonic 1 among the Sonic community. He decided to do something which had never been done at that time: create a ROM hack. The resulting hack would become known as the Sonic 1 Beta Hoax.

Cyan set to work on the Sonic 1 REV00 ROM, researching its internal workings primarily by a trial and error process, since there was absolutely no documentation on Sonic 1 available at the time. His goal was to create a hoax prototype a game that mimicked the behavior of a "genuine" Sonic 1 prototype.

In May 1999, Cyan released his hack to Simon Wai's Sonic 2 Beta page. The ROM was deliberately not listed as a hoax; rather, it was released under the title "Sonic 1 beta?".

The release of the hoax prototype stirred up more interest in Sonic 1, and when it was identified as a hoax, Andy Wolan invited Cyan to the Sonic Stuff Research Group for his work in creating the ROM hack.

name: Sonic 1: WTF Lame
summary: Sonic 1: WTF LAME is Joke ROM hack of the original Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Genesis. While it largely plays like the original game, it is designed as a technical troll that is impossible to beat normally. The hack introduces special "WTF LAME monitors" which, when broken, trigger a high-quality PCM sample of the Benny Hill theme.

name: Songbird
summary: Step into the spotlight and transform your living room into a vibrant stage with Songbird! Whether you're a seasoned performer or having fun with friends, this immersive singing experience delivers the thrill of karaoke directly to your home. From the musical minds behind Guitar Hero, immerse yourself in a fantasy world that is the first ever Karaoke game in VR. Songbird is the ultimate choice for music lovers and VR enthusiasts alike.

name: Somewhere
summary: The goal of SOMEWHERE is to survive on the wild island of Esterhull. Gather resources, craft tools, and manage hunger, thirst. Explore mysterious locations, uncover the secrets of a lost civilization, and interact with other players: form alliances or compete for survival in a hostile environment.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Good Times with Weapons Pack
summary:
Harness the power of speed and stealth and follow the path of the Ninja with the all-new Ninja Stars ranged weapon variation. Strike quickly with a decisive burst of projectiles and vanish back into the shadows, for the life of a Ninja is complex and full of peril.

This DLC features an all-new weapon variation of the Wand: the Ninja Star ranged weapon. It also includes three brand-new upgrade cards and new cosmetics.

Hat: Ninja Hat
Facial Features: Ninja Mask
Tunic: Ninja Tunic
Hat: You're a dog!
Facial Features: Ninja Star to the Eye
Emote: Ninja Star Emote

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Nichole's Home Brew
summary: The Board Girls have unleashed diabolical new Home Brew rules for Snow Day, featuring game-altering modes like The Floor is Lava, Air Superiority, and Super Pissed Off.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Hammer
summary: Stand firm against the darkness and assume the mantle of a Paladin to bring swift and glorious justice to the battlefield with the all-new Hammer melee weapon. Smite your enemies with ground-shattering attacks and protect your allies with powerful shields and buffs.

name: Solstice
summary:
It's been over a year since that dreaded autumn.

One snowy evening over winter break, Jade decides to accompany Harmony to a concert for a band they both like. What follows is a short story about getting out of your comfort zone, personal realizations, and being there for your friends.

Set one year after the events of Courting Death.

name: Sol Mates
summary: Steer, shield, and blast your way through space in this chaotic co-op party game. You and your ragtag crew will take on missions, make quick decisions, and work together to make a name for yourself in the vast expanse of the universe.

name: Sociable Soccer 25
summary: Embrace the excitement of the world's favorite sport in Sociable Soccer 25. Created by legendary game designer Jon Hare, Sociable Soccer 25 features his signature fast-paced, arcade-style and intuitive gameplay, enriched with multiplayer head-to-head matches and collectible player cards.

name: SokoNature
summary: SokoNature is a Sokoban-inspired game with a unique twist. The character and blocks come in three sizes, each interacting differently. Small characters can't push medium or large blocks, while large characters can push all sizes, with larger blocks moving fewer spaces. The game centers on saving the forest from fires, adding a thematic layer to the puzzle-solving mechanics.

name: Sofia in Exchange for Lies
summary: Peek into the sins and memories of five personalities through surveillance cameras. This is an immersive, mystery adventure game that unravels the thoughts of the dark past that lie dormant inside Sofia, a suspect in the murder of a presidential candidate, and uncovers the truth behind the crime.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: The Blue Blur! Super Sonic - Quiz Game
Sonic Game Land
summary: «Sonic Game Land» is an unofficial fan-game featuring racing concept gameplay influenced by the titles like Sonic Rivals and Sonic Riders. Race with your opponents across four circuit-based zones to see who is faster.

name: Soccer Bros
summary: Fun, fast-paced 1 on 1 soccer game with lots of action! Pick from a variety of characters and let the play begin. Go for crazy shots, make that penalty kick, or maybe even tackle your opponent! The controls are very simple: Use either the arrow keys or wasd to control your bro. Space bar will shoot if you have the ball and tackle if you are on defense. Be sure to allow notifications so you will know when fun new soccer characters are added to the game!

name: Sonic Frontiers: Sonic Adventure 2 Shoes
summary:
Take it back to the early 2000s and railgrind in style with your own pair of iconic shoes from Sonic Adventure 2!

This offer is available to our newsletter subscribers in select countries who signed up prior to January 31, 2023.

name: South of the Circle: Deluxe Edition
Solasta II
summary: In a Mana-infused land, a dark force led by the enigmatic Shadwyn threatens Neokos. Bring your party of adventurers together across perilous realms in this Turn-Based Tactical RPG based on the SRD 5e ruleset. You make the choices, dice decide your destiny.

name: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds
summary: Race across land, sea, air, space, and time in Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds! Warp through Travel Rings into new dimensions where something new awaits around every twist and turn.

name: Soulblaze
summary: Soulblaze is a creature-collecting roguelite in which you catch and train creatures called animons to fight your way through several regions and defeat their bosses in tactical turn-based battles with dice rolling mechanics. Build your team, upgrade and customize techniques, collect stickers, and hopefully survive until the end!

name: Sonic X Shadow Generations: Sonic the Hedgehog 3 Movie Pack
summary:
When transported to an unknown dimension, Shadow must race through the streets of modern-day Shibuya to defeat the forces of G.U.N.

Take on a new look as Shadow and play through a unique level inspired by the new movie, Sonic the Hedgehog 3, featuring the voice of Keanu Reeves!

name: Soul TCG
summary: Welcome to Soul TCG: Card Battle Games, the ultimate card games where your journey as a legendary TCG player begins! Immerse yourself in a world of anime games filled with powerful heroes, and epic card games as you collect cards of unique anime characters. Each TCG card holds a mighty warrior, waiting to be unleashed in thrilling card games.

name: Sokomonster
summary: Unleash chaos, strategize destruction, and conquer the city - monster style!

name: Solitomb
summary: Use your solitaire skills to assemble powerful combos and defeat the dungeon's monsters. Grab treasure and spend it to build a set of powerful, synergistic abilities to help you. Manage both your own resources and the demon's patience to hopefully survive the ordeal.

name: Soulfall
summary: Descend into Hell and reclaim your soul in this fast-paced Action RPG roguelike where your choices shape your destiny. Create your hero, pick your class, and fight your way through hordes of demons, slimes, and skeletons in a journey of vengeance and redemption.

name: Soccer Pro Simulator
summary: Soccer Pro Simulator is a realistic football (soccer) simulation designed to make you feel like a rockstar, making the crowd roar after scoring amazing goals. From powerful midfield shots to spectacular bicycle kicks, experience the thrill of becoming a true legend!

name: Sonic and the Elements of Harmony
Soul Shuffler
summary: In this card-based roguelite, you'll be a demon specializing in the souls of inanimate objects. Explore the ever-changing Limbo, defeat and collect the countless souls within, use them to expand your Domain, and dominate the Infernal Tournament with your mad soul-shuffling skills to make Hell yours!

name: Souten Koihime: Shigen no Ou
summary: First title of a new series in the long running Koihime franchise, this time taking place in ancient China.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Rebirth of the Azure Wind
Sokocrab
summary: Step onto the sandy shores of SokoCrab, a captivating puzzle game where you guide a clever crab through 40 engaging levels. Your mission? Push barrels onto designated spots to clear the path to the next stage, all while navigating a vibrant beach-themed world.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 1 @ Sage 2010
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 1 @ SAGE 2010 is a specialized ROM hack of the original 1991 game for the Sega Genesis, developed by Cinossu. It was released specifically for the 2010 Sonic Amateur Games Expo (SAGE).

name: Sorcerian System New Scenario Vol.1: Uchuu kara no Houmonsa (1989)
Sonic the Hedgehog: Legend of the Blue Blur 2
Sonic Incursion
summary: Sonic Incursion is a fangame utilizing the Sonic GDK extension to the Unreal Development kit. Play as Sonic or Metal Sonic as you take the fight to the vicious Metallix Empire, before they convert all life into twisted mechanical beings! The gameplay is 2.5D for the regular stages, with certain Act 3's featuring singular gimmicks.

name: Sovereign's Enigma
summary: Sovereign's Enigma is a 2D platformer with survival elements, in a densely interconnected cave, where the player needs to uncover the story of an ancient civilization to solve a mystery from the past. This game is a slow and immersive experience, with a strong focus on storytelling, atmosphere, and characters.

name: SoftWar Cyber Fight
summary: A Science-Fiction Visual Novel Role-Playing Game with a story centered on the cyberworld conflicts. New"SoftWars" are battles involving sentient softwares namely viruses and anti-viruses, deciding the fates of computer systems.

name: South Park: Snow Day! - Chaos Pack
summary:
Embrace the Chaos with these all-new free cosmetics:
Hat: Chaos Minion Hat
Tunic: Professor Chaos
Cape: Professor Chaos
Emote: Maniacal Laughter

name: Soreike! Anpanman Card de Tanoshiku ABC
Soreike! Anpanman Doki-doki! Rescue Drive: Car Navi-tsuki
Soreike! Anpanman o-Mise ga Ippai! TV de o-Ryouri Tsukucchao
Sonic the Hedgehog 3: Race with Team Sonic
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog 3: Race with Team Sonic is a promotional browser-mobile game based on the Sonic the Hedgehog 3 movie. The game was released by McDonald's as a part of it's collaborative Happy Meal campaign for the movie.

name: Soreike! Anpanman: Hajimete Dekita yo! Oboeta yo! Anpanman Hitori de Dekichatta!
Sokorobot
summary: In this puzzle game, a robot need to clear paths to unlock new levels!

name: So Many Zombies
summary: So Many Zombies! is a fast-paced top-down shooter with rogue-lite elements that pits you against relentless waves of the undead. Face heart-pounding action and test your skills in a chaotic, bullet-filled battlefield where every second counts. How long can you last against the swarm?

name: Sonic Scene Creator 5
summary: Featuring 100s more sprites, backgrounds and many different kinds of elements to use to build your own scenes in this sonic scene creator flash game with this being the 5th instalment by Zhuburz.

name: Soporfall
summary:
A collection of five interactive narratives exploring a variety of dreamscapes which, interwoven, tell the story of a shattering dreamer.

Befriend fallen angels, spelunk impossible ruins, find love amidst regal bugs, get in poetry battles with forest critters or delve into a pastry-making bureaucracy. Soporfall valley is yours!

name: Sorrow
summary:
SORROW is a "Survival Horror RPG" created for the Haunted PS1 community.
Inspired by games like King's Field, Bloodborne, and Silent Hill.

name: SoulCalibur IV
summary:
"Swords will be honed and weapons optimized as the world renowned weapon-based fighting series Soulcalibur unveils a fourth installment. Delivering new gameplay modes, characters and enhanced features with unprecedented 3D modeling and animation, Soulcalibur IV strives to be the definitive fighting game experience. The unrelenting pursuit of two legendary swords continues as Soulcalibur IV re-introduces classic warriors from the series as well as debuting new characters bringing new conflict and intrigue. Soulcalibur IV propels the fighting genre into the next-gen era with visually realistic environments, interactive stages, enhanced AI, and a new battle system."

Exclusive to the PlayStation 3 version is Darth Vader from Star Wars, who’s inclusion was meant to represent the system colours.

name: Soul Survivor
summary: Soul Survivor is a roguelite where you upgrade your character by killing hordes to become strong enough to take on their boss and gain their abilities!

name: Soccer VR
summary: Dive into the immersive world of VR soccer (football)! Experience the thrill of a full match with three difficulty levels and various formations. Refine your skills in dedicated practice modes, including penalties, free kicks, curved shots, cross finishing, and ball smashing.

name: Sobreviva Ziggy!
summary: Survive with Ziggy through the challenges of a carioca marine life in search of its ideal mate. Take the opportunity to learn more about the life of a seahorse and its daily challenges, as well as predators and prey!

name: South of Midnight: Premium Edition
summary:
Immerse yourself into the macabre and fantastical world of South of Midnight with the Premium Edition, which includes the full game, up to 5 days early access, and digital access (in English) to:
• South of Midnight Artbook
• Original Soundtrack composed by Olivier Deriviere
• The Boo-Hag Comic book by Rob Guillory
• Music Video: Songs & Tales of South of Midnight
• Documentary: Weaving Hazel’s Journey, Director’s Cut

name: Southside Racing
summary: Race and battle using weapons and karts themed after Vtubers and content creators! All characters in game can be found livestreaming on Twitch. Race through different Vtuber themed levels like TomaKey's Liminal Spaces or Meat's Silly Safari and slow each other down with weapons!

name: Solomania
summary: Solomania is a romance drama about flawed heroes and their collateral damage. With your new reluctant partner, prove that you're not as messed up as everyone thinks. Your mission? Investigate a strange civilian report in the woods, smoothly and without issue. Playing nice is optional.

name: Sonic 3 & Tenna
summary:
Eggman's off on vacation, Ring Racing, so Tenna came out of Eggman's TV and took everything while he was gone.

Blast through Sonic 3 with a Deltarune twist! With over 18 completely new bosses to fight, 6 new gameplay gimmicks to endure, and a modified story, Sonic 3 & Tenna completely transforms the game into a new, yet familiar experience! Not a Undertale, Deltarune or UTDR fan-content fan? That's okay! The bosses have been designed with Sonic gameplay philosophy in mind, and the entire experience itself is stand-out enough to not require any prior UTDR knowledge.

name: Somnus
summary: SOMNUS is a first-person indie game in the genre of adventure with elements of horror. The protagonist, a young boy, faces a difficult ordeal: his mother is seriously ill, and in order to pay for her treatment, he takes a job as a night guard.

name: Sonic Battle 4: The Call to Chaos
Sonic Wings Reunion
summary:
Sonic Wings Reunion is a sequel to the arcade-style shooter SONIC WINGS. The previous version was sold in 1998.

Choose from 8 characters and destroy the mysterious organization “Fatamornagana” that has progressed into the modern world. The scenario changes depending on the combination of characters.

The first new Sonic Wings (Aero Fighters) game in 26 years, with original staff members from the series involved in its planning, production, and oversight. This all-new installment in the classic vertical-scrolling shoot ’em up series is designed for all fans of the genre to enjoy.

name: Sonic Infinity Adventure Pack Season 2
summary: Get ready for Funky Action Season 2! Get ready to reunite with the world's famous hedgehog on a high-speed cinematic adventure! And get ready to Explore stunning new worlds in speeds and in ways like never before! This upcoming rendition of the Adventure Pack is a remaster to an Infinity fangame classic that also expands upon the gameplay experience with new speeds, new levels, new areas, and new heights! This demo contains Abyssal Dungeon in it's entirely, one of many expansive levels in the Adventure Pack, all created with the Infinity Engine feel in mind.

name: Sonic 4
summary: A Sonic game which was being produced by VibrantDarkness and Cinossu, shown as a secret title at SAGE 9. Information about it is scarce, its SAGE booth didn't get properly archived. According to the page, Sonic, Tails and Knuckles would be in the game. No release date was given.

name: Songs of Silence: Lighteaters
summary:
Dwellling deep in the Silence, these ancient beings have haunted Irdheim and Sonnan for countless cycles. Stuck between life and death, their insatiable craving for the Hymn forbids them to fade away...
Wield the arcane powers of the Lighteaters against your opponents in Skirmish single- or multiplayer, with Songs of Silence's first faction DLC!
The DLC focuses on providing fresh Skirmish content.
2 new hero archetypes
6 new hero vocations
8 new units
5 new strategy cards (including 1 new building upgrade)
8 new battles cards
1 new unit perk
1 new capital

name: Sorcerer's Servant
summary: It is a roguelike spinning RPG where you turn slots to strengthen equipment and fight monsters. By chaining equipment with slots, you can strengthen your abilities and upgrade to new equipment. Use your skills to lead her to victory.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: The Freedom Fighters
Somnifuge
summary:
Compelled by a mysterious note, you step into the grand mansion. As you explore its dark corridors, you must solve cryptic puzzles, confront the residents, and uncover your purpose.

SOMNIFUGE is a first-person indie horror game that blends exploration, puzzle-solving and psychological horror. Drawing inspiration from the eerie atmospheres of Silent Hill and Alone in the Dark—as well as the many indie horror games they influenced—SOMNIFUGE calls back to PSX-era horror with its retro visuals.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Hands of Time
Soundscape
summary: Explore real subway stations in South Korea from the perspective of a completely blind individual. SOUNDSCAPE is a 3D simulation game that immerses players in the experience of navigating as someone with total vision loss.

name: Sol-Rui: After Mini
summary:
Rui can't catch a break... Her life was turned on its head when she was transported to Roots, a world full of monsters, demons, and magic. Thankfully, she was able to awaken the powers of Sol within her and save that world from destruction! Alas, she had only just returned to her world after saving that one, and now monsters are attacking her town and kidnapping people!

Following the trail, she stumbles upon Tuberoth, a demon who only seems innocuous on the surface... He promptly traps her in a nightmare world made of illusions, a deadly game with her freedom at stake! Can she step up to the task and awaken from these terrible nightmares?

name: Sokobundle
summary: Come have fun with this challenging puzzle bundle!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
summary: A fangame based on the Sonic the Hedgehog TV series, also known as Sonic SatAM.

name: Sonic Genesis of the Azure Wind
summary: Dr.Ivo Robotnik (his nick name is Eggman) has invaded the peacefull planet of Mobius! , with his army of robots bent on enslaving all the small animals into being living batterys for his army so that he can turn Mobius into on huge city!.Using a combination of the planets animals , gold power rings , and 7 mythical Chaos Emeralds the Dr hopes to have total control of the planet , thats where you come in...Take control of Sonic The Hedgehog , the fastest animal alive! using the Rings and Emeralds free the animals and stop Dr.Robotnik!

name: Sonic Genesis of the Azure Wind
Sonic X Shadow Generations: Digital Deluxe Upgrade
Sonic GML
summary: A fan‑made 2D Sonic the Hedgehog game created in GameMaker: Studio using GameMaker Language (GML). Released in 2015 by independent developer ZykovEddy, it recreates the look and feel of the classic Mega Drive/Genesis Sonic titles while introducing original level layouts, custom sprites, and unique gimmicks. Distributed freely online for Windows PC, it is not affiliated with or endorsed by SEGA.

name: Somnis: Rumble Rush
summary: Somnis: Rumble Rush is an engaging real-time strategy game that combines strategic deck-building with fast-paced combat. Players enter the dream realm of Somnis, constructing diverse decks of units, buildings, and spells to compete in both PvP and PvE battles. The game offers a blend of PC RTS depth with mobile gaming convenience, allowing for strategic gameplay anytime, anywhere.

name: So Much Stuff 4: Bits and Bobs - Collector's Edition
summary: Uncover an abundance of new stuff in this exciting sequel!

name: Solir
summary: Discover the unique atmosphere of Solir, a 2D platformer designed to offer relaxation, accompanied by a fantastic soundtrack.

name: Sonic 1 Sigma
summary: Sonic 1 Sigma is a ROM hack of the original Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Genesis. This hack reimagines the 1991 classic with a focus on refined level design and expanded character abilities, effectively bridging the gap between the original game and its 16-bit sequels.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Game Gear/Master System Remake
Sonic Boom and the Smash Crew
Sonic Fear 2: Metal Sonic Out of Control
Sonic The Hedgehog 2: Archives
summary: “Sonic The Hedgehog 2: Archives” is ‘another beta hack’ that seeks to bring back cut content from the game's Prototypes, revitalize the game's concept and release levels and badniks, and fully recreate the early concept of the time-travel story. Along with this hack improves both the prototype content and the final content by adding new animations, badnik and character shots, level art and backgrounds, new music, and more.

name: Solace Inc. 2
summary: A co-op shooter about a time-travelling company where you recruit your employees against even more hordes of enemies.

name: Social Hook
summary: Catch powerful monster cards with your fishing rod and battle against other players in exciting duels.

name: Sovereign Brain Empire
summary: “Who isn’t a baby anyway?”~You travelled to a parallel world governed by the Sovereign Brain AI. In SB Empire, you’re an adopted “one-year-old”, recognized as a "Monarch-level" prodigy! There will be beauties giving you a sheltered babyhood. Your brilliance and privileges will change their fates!

name: Solo Defender
summary: Solo Defender is a vertical space shooter game where the player clears waves of multiple enemy types and mini bosses to ultimately face off the the final Mothership and free the Janera system.

name: Solitaire: Draw 1 - Draw 3
summary: An LCD game of Solitaire by John N. Hansen.

name: Sorcery Slam
summary: Sorcery Slam is a competitive/party puzzle game inspired by retro era classics. Play with up to 6 Sorcerers locally or online to collect powerful elemental Gems and be the first to power up your ultimate final blast for the win!

name: Somniora: Chapter 1
summary: Somniora is a horror-puzzle game. Get ready to delve into the adventure of our character, who is trapped amidst strange dreams, while searching for answers to the questions lurking in their subconscious.

name: Soul Trader
summary: Welcome to the NecronomiCon: The most anticipated convention for necromancers from across the land! Gather your minions and craft powerful synergies as you face your rivals in this inventive Roguelike Deckbuilder!

name: Sonic 1 Delta
summary: Sonic 1 Delta is a ROM hack of the original Sonic the Hedgehog (1991) for the Sega Genesis. The project’s primary objective is to create a "unified" 16-bit adventure by integrating various development concepts, prototype materials, and beta elements that were scrapped from the original game's retail release.

name: Sol Rush Misadventure
summary:
Sol Rush Misadventure is a visual novel about Blaze and Marine going on a treasure hunt on the quest to find the Achlysolis Blade, an ancient treasure hidden for generations.
