As Blaze and Marine go together solving various puzzles on their quest, they also build a closer bond to each other. Could this treasure have some link to Blaze's path? Can Marine convince Blaze about the thrill of adventure?

name: Soko Banana
summary: "Soko Banana" is a puzzle game developed for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES), inspired by the classic Sokoban concept. Players guide the young monkey, Skid, through banana warehouses across five distinct islands, each introducing unique mechanics such as pits, breakable blocks, and teleporters. The objective is to maneuver banana crates to designated exits while collecting bananas to unlock bonus levels. The game offers 55 levels in total, including hidden secrets.

name: Solid Void: Nature Puzzles
summary:
Challenge your mind and creativity!
Solve beautiful puzzles!
Experience a journey of logic and design!

name: Sorting Inc
summary: A casual and relaxing game about sorting various items. Join Sorting Inc and climb up through the departments to become the absolute expert in the field of sorting.

name: Sonic Flow 2: Next Dimension
summary: Sonic Flow 2: Next Dimension is a Sonic game that takes place 5 years after the events of Sonic Forces in the Classic Dimension. Following the story of the very very badly made first game, the gathering of the 7 Chaos Emeralds in Modern Sonic's frozen dimension causes his dimension and all connected ones worlds to shatter into floating pieces.

name: Sonic 1: Point & Click Edition
summary: In this unique, gimmick-based ROM Hack of Sonic The Hedgehog, you can use your mouse pointer to interact with objects in a variety of ways. Hovering over Rings to magnetize them to Sonic, picking up & throwing monitors to break them apart, & clicking on springs to bounce the cursor away are just a few ways you can interact with the world around you. Be careful though, not everything you mouse over or click will be so friendly to you.

name: Sonic Surge: Rhythm Showdown
summary: Sonic Surge: Rhythm Showdown is a fast-paced rhythm game based on classical games of our childhood where players battle to the beat and hitting notes to unleash powerful combos and grind for the highest score. Master the music, dominate opponents, and conquer electrifying tracks!

name: Sonic Remade
summary: A fan remake of some zones from Sonic the Hedgehog (8-bit).

name: Sonic Paradigm
summary: A W.I.P. Sonic game built on the HTML5/JavaScript "Legacy Engine"

name: Sonic 2: Chaos Adventure
summary: This hack overhauls the game with new mechanics, power-ups, level designs, and a new story.

name: Sonic RPG: Episode 10
summary: An official continuation and conclusion to the classic fangame series Sonic RPG.

name: Soundrace
summary: A German-language FUJI cassette tape promotional platformer game for DOS with a 90's electronic music soundtrack.

name: Sonic Unleashed: Apotos & Shamar Adventure Pack
summary:
The fifth of six DLC packs released for Sonic Unleashed in 2009, which contain extremely difficult stages that reuse many assets from the original levels. This pack includes new levels for Apotos and Shamar.

Includes five daytime & four nighttime stages will take you through a quaint seaside town and ancient ruins in a desert oasis! This pack includes three brand new stages and six new missions.

name: Soko Spectacle
summary: Push crates of fireworks and find a way to light the sky in this relaxing puzzle game.

name: Soldiers From The Sky
summary: A real-time strategy game that does not require micro operations

name: Soko Banish
summary: Help Ardos push all the soulstones onto rune circles in this puzzle game based on the classic Sokoban, but watch out: as in the popular classic, stones can only be pushed and not pulled, so try to avoid unwinnable situations that would surely spell doom as you uncover the right sequence of moves. Open gates, avoid roaming ghosts, and when all challenges are mastered, use the Level Creator to create your own for more fun!

name: Sonic and the Dragon's Path
summary: An upcoming Sonic fangame based on the Storybook series.

name: Sonic Scramble
summary: Sonic Scramble is a 2D Platform Fighter featuring the cast of the Sonic the Hedgehog series. Using mechanics familiar to other Platform Fighters as well as mechanics inspired by Traditional 2D Fighting Games like a meter, special cancels, and super moves, Sonic Scramble aims to be a Sonic Fighting Game like no other.

name: Soccer Dash: Football Simulator
summary: Control the ball, conquer the game!

name: Sonic The Rise of The Death Egg
Something Took Her
summary: Within the rural town of Oakview, students are vanishing. One is Amy Morrison, a troubled friend of yours. People say she made a pact with something in the vents of the school. Unravel the mysteries surrounding the town's past, survive the supernatural trauma, and search for traces of your friend.

name: Sokowand
summary: Sokowand is a top-down puzzle game which fuses sokoban-inspired puzzles with a magical floor that can be ripped out. Need to cross a gap? Use the floor next to you! Push boxes to open doors, manipulate signals, redirect laser by rotating mirrors and rewire entire floors full of electricity.

name: Solward
summary: Solward is a first-person party-based science fiction dungeon crawler RPG with grid-based movement and realtime combat. After a long voyage in space, Kali, Jenna, and Heather have returned home only to find that their planet has been invaded by an alien threat.

name: So Much Stuff 5: Mix-Knacks - Collector's Edition
summary:
Explore beautifully crafted levels, clear diverse scenes, and relish in a multitude of engaging mini-games.
Collect charming trinkets to adorn a fresh room in "So Much Stuff 5: Mix-Knacks."
Get ready for another delightful sorting adventure!

Collector's Edition brings:
- interesting sorting puzzles!
- 8 more chapters of fun!
- visit your collection room!

name: Something Strange has Come Over God's Country Tonight
summary:
a short surreal horror game about repressed queerness,
made for the rainbow jam 2023.

name: Solais
summary: Delve into some ancient ruins following a mysterious voice, but watch out for the encroaching darkness! Keep your torch lit via passing flames and reaching checkpoints as you descend deeper. Avoid spikes, watch out for dowsing waterfalls, master difficult platforming and discover the ancient secret within!

name: Sono Hi no Kemono ni ha
summary:
Ritsuki, his younger sister Runa and childhood friend Mayu attend a school that is popular for its drama activities, with many of its graduates going on to become famous actors and scenario writers. Shortly after the entrance ceremony, they were invited by their classmate Inori to join the drama club. Ritsuki was eager to aim for the school’s primaries for the national competition, but first year students were forbidden from participating in the contest. They wouldn’t accept the fact that they were excluded just because they didn’t have much experience. If only they were given the opportunity to demonstrate their acting abilities…

Rumour has it that there is a ghost that haunts the theater. It is said that it will grant any wish so long as it is related to drama.

name: Sonic Eurospinball
summary: A Sonic advert game made for Eurospin, an italian retail-trade company.

name: Sonic and Seanic: The Dark Brotherhood Saga
Sonic Brick
summary: Sonic Brick is an early Sonic fan game made in Kilk & Play by Johan Leion in 1997.

name: Sort of Justice: Chapter 1
summary: Sort of Justice is an immersive adult visual novel set in the dark side of society. As you plot your revenge against your backstabber, you will encounter many personalities, discover relationships and uncover buried secrets.

name: Something To Write About: Unbroken - Book One
summary: Unbroken brings you into the world of a young professional athlete and former soldier, navigating your life,friendships, relationships and your complicated past. The choices you make will not only impact yourself, but everybody around you, choose wisely.

name: Sonic Runners Adventure
summary:
The Java Port of "Sonic Runners Adventure"

Rescue Sonic's universe in a brand-new endless runner!
Unlock loads of Sonic characters like Tails and Knuckles, and power them up!
Shred across 4 iconic locations and Bonus Mode with spectacular new graphics!

name: Sonic & Shadow
summary: Sonic & Shadow is a colorful 3D open world game.

name: Sonic and the Black Knight HD
Sonic Origins Pocket Edition
summary: Sonic Origins in Neo Geo Pocket Color style!

name: Sonic X-Treme
summary: Created by Voxel, this is a fan recreation of Sonic X-Treme.

name: Soap Soup
summary:
Soap Soup is a mod for Soup, an obscure Japanese minimalist art-game from 2007 where you walk around a series of small abstract rooms and generally soak in the atmosphere.

Includes guest rooms by AgentRedJackal, Amon26, Ivan Zanotti, Nikki Kalpa, Quinn K., Dream's Bell, and lazugod.

name: So Much Stuff 5: Mix-Knacks
summary: Explore beautifully crafted levels, clear diverse scenes, and relish in a multitude of engaging mini-games. Collect charming trinkets to adorn a fresh room in "So Much Stuff 5: Mix-Knacks."

name: Sound of Slash
summary: A rhythm action game in sync with the music, experiencing a variety of cool actions. A ranking system that allows users to compete globally while playing their favorite tunes. A free store system where players can share and play their own created music and notes with others.

name: Sorority Panty Raid
summary: A stealth game in which you control a fratboy at your local sorority. Steal all the panties before advancing to the next room. Let us know what you think of it...

name: Sonic Color Cursed
summary: Sonic Color Cursed is a 2D speed based platformer, inspired by the Genesis classics with a 1-bit artstyle! Dr. Eggman is up to his antics again and this time he’s stolen all the color from the planet! Sonic and friends will have to put an end to Eggman’s plans with flying colors! Or else the world will forever cease to have color! There are RGB scales for you to adjust to have your own shade of the game. You can also enable colored outlines for important objects!

name: Sonic Debut
summary: Sonic Debut is a ROM hack of the original Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Genesis. The project reimagines the game by integrating prototype and concept material from Sonic's early development rather than aiming for a retail-accurate remake. It features significant mechanical shifts, such as replacing the traditional ring-based health system with a Hit Point (HP) counter and requiring a double-tap of the jump button to enter a rolling state.

name: Sonic: Lost in Nightmare World
summary: A fangame based around the scrapped concepts of Sonic 1, combining some elements from the early prototypes.

name: Sonic Essence
summary: Sonic Essence is an original 2D Modern Sonic adventure built with the Retro Engine V4 Decompilation. It features completely original sprites, levels, badniks, and an all-new soundtrack featuring remixes and original compositions! This project aims to push the potential of Retro Engine (V4) modding to show the fresh and new experiences the decompilation can offer!

name: Sonic Unleashed: Chun-nan Adventure Pack
summary:
This DLC introduces six new single-player missions in the Chun-nan region:

- Four daytime stages featuring Sonic in high-speed platforming action

- Two nighttime stages featuring the Werehog with combat-focused gameplay

The pack includes remixed “Hard Mode” versions of existing levels, offering increased difficulty and replay value. Players must unlock the Chun-nan region in the base game to access this content.

name: Sonic Unleashed: Empire City & Adabat Adventure Pack
Soviet Spooky Tales: Green Eyes
summary: Have you ever heard of the damn Green Record? Or maybe the Black Sheet is trying to kill you at night? Have you ever seen a Blue Nail in a pie? The visual novel "Soviet Spooky Tales: Green Eyes" is the first of five planned games in the entourage of Soviet children's horror stories, where everything happens for real. The story tells about a girl named Dasha from 4th grade, who disobeyed her mother and listened to a green record. Together with her, you will face a mysterious and terrible evil, and only you can decide what awaits her in the end ^___^

name: Song of Feathers
summary: 《Song of Feathers》 is a deeply immersive post apocalyptic survival adventure game. In this world shrouded in the shadow of the apocalypse, Players will play as the last human in this desperate land, searching for the meaning of survival and the opportunity to rebuild civilization.

name: Sonic 1 Pilot
summary: This project was characterized by its high-quality visual overhaul, including custom-designed level art, redesigned Badniks, and a unique HUD although the hack was cancelled during early development.

name: Sonic Character Designer
summary: Sonic Character Designer is a Flash-based character creator from 2004 that lets you build custom Sonic-style characters by mixing parts and colors

name: Some Bullshit
summary:
Have you ever wanted to escort a ditzy, hungry girl across the world? Well, now you can with:

Some Bullshit

name: Sortik Systems
summary: Take on your new role at Sortik Systems. Your task seems simple: place each object in its rightful place and contribute to the perfection of order. But what if this perfect system hides dark intentions?

name: Soul Brave
summary: Soul Brave is a multiplayer action platform MMORPG with anime-style graphics.

name: Sonic Lost World: DLC Restoration
summary: This mod ports the Wii U exclusive DLCs to the PC version of Sonic Lost World.

name: So Fart Away
summary: Help Linguini, our hero, escape from a stinky trap using only your FARTS! Avoid farting on others and uncover the wild mechanics of your farts by solving simple and challenging puzzles in this comedic sokoban game! Think twice before you fart!

name: Soccer Field Pro 3D
summary:
Soccer Field Pro 3D is a Multiplayer Football/Soccer game that offers a dynamic and realistic football experience, allowing you to customize your own training, perform incredible dribbles, enjoy advanced physics and fully edit your player.

Play the game how you'll like. Cooperate with friends to create the perfect plays or go solo to demonstrate the beauty of your skills. Use your body to defend the goal or use your ability to attack the opponent's. Be the piece that your team needs or the X factor that changes everything.

Become a great player and start your legacy on the fields!

name: Sonic Battle Cards
summary: Sonic Battle Cards is an unfinished Sonic-themed collectible card game uploaded to Newgrounds in March 2007. This demo allows players to engage in turn-based card battles featuring characters from the Sonic universe.

name: Sonic Sky Chase Zone
summary:
This is a Flash version of part of the Sky Chase Zone from the classic 1992 game "Sonic the Hedgehog 2".

Your mission is to help Sonic to kill 25 Valkyn badniks in each level in order to progress to the next one, and finally to take on Dr. Robotnik in an aerial battle. Use the Cursor keys (Arrow keys) to fly Tails's Tornado airplane towards the enemies and then use the Space Bar to make Sonic spin-jump off the wing to attack.

Be VERY careful though, because in this game the controls are reversed and are the same as in a real airplane!! You have to press the Down Arrow key to go UP, and the Up Arrow key to go DOWN!

There are twice as many badniks to kill in each level as in the previous one, and each time you defeat Dr. Robotnik in Level 4 the game returns to Level 1 and the badniks speed up.

Because the game becomes very difficult after a while, there is an invincibility cheat just in case you want one - press Up, Down, Left, Right + "A" in the title screen to activate it - Sonic will turn yellow and will be invulnerable to enemy hits if you enter the cheat correctly. (But since you can then never die, you will need to either press your keyboard's F5 key or click your browser's refresh button to reload the game and reset it back to "normal" mode.)

name: Source Code
summary: "Source Code" is a large-scale multiplayer online and LAN FPS/TPS game set in the backdrop of World War III. It features building and portal systems, a comprehensive Zombie DLC, and a wide array of firearms and equipment for competitive shooting.

name: Son of a Glitch
summary: A throwback arcade style 2D Side-Scroller. Step onto the motherboards of the past but be careful the firewall doesn't catch you! Collect files and survive to increase your score.

name: Solitaire Quest: Love Blossoms
summary: In this game you'll find everything you need for an perfect vacation – vibrant locations, varying difficulty levels of solitaire, hidden object levels, and a heartwarming love story.

name: Soleil Survivor
summary: Control a lost shadow creature that is being hunted by a gang of solar-powered skulls in a gloomy forest. The sun rays are harmful to the creature's shadowy body, so aim to avoid them for as long as possible!

name: Soda Splash
summary: Soda Splash is a multiplayer co-op survival PVP game made with a game editing tool『CliCli』. Players team up to defeat soda cans and gather resources to enhance their characters. Work strategically to increase the rival's soda cans for the victory!

name: Soccer Manager 2025
summary: Manage elite football clubs and lead your dream team as a football manager!

name: Soul Mates
summary: You’re trapped inside a haunted house, stalked by angry ghosts. To survive, you’ll have to run, hide, strategize, give gifts, chat, flirt… Wait, what kind of game is this? Oh right, it’s a point-and-click survival horror dating sim!

name: Soul Oath
summary: Help Zeke on his quest to protect his hometown and live up to his lineage, as he will learn from love, pain, friendship, death and ultimately, life, in this classic RPG worth about 15 hours of playtime.

name: Somniphobia
summary: Escape the reoccurring nightmare and stop the cycle by fighting through strange enemies and collecting items and information to get out. Somniphobia combines traditional survival horror and rogue-like elements. Can you find a way out of your ever-changing nightmare?

name: Sock Dating Simulator
summary: A 100% serious game where you turn into a sock... and seduce other socks!

name: Sonic.Exe 2: The Game
summary: A video game adaptation of the sequel to the original Sonic.EXE story.

name: Something is Weird
summary: You rent a cheap but big house while you're on vacation. But something is weird. Really, really weird...

name: Soulchain
summary: Use your soul as a grappling hook in this tight, non-linear, physics-based platformer. Swing through hundreds of hand-crafted challenges, explore a vast world inspired by classic metroidvanias, and find your place within the seasons of the Afterlife.

name: Soupcosis
summary: A short horror game about drinking soup

name: SoundlessNightmare
summary: Keep quiet and avoid making loud noises. Please refrain from making any sound for 10 minutes to enter a sweet dreamland. Of course, you can choose not to have a microphone!

name: Sorcery Climb
summary: Climb to the top of each treacherous mountain making sure to carefully commit to leaps and dashes because when you miss, you may just fall all the way back down to the bottom.

name: SoulPactum
summary: SoulPactum is a brutal 2D platformer where every wrong jump ends in failure. Precise timing and patience are the keys to finally making it through the deadly levels.

name: SOS: Save Our Sandwiches
summary: Point & click aboard a private luxury yacht on a dark and stormy night with funny evil witches and sandwiches Features rain effects, exploration of an entire ship, puzzles, and monsters

name: Solanis
summary: A free-to-play, single-player adventure game that invites players to soar through the remnants of a world scarred by ancient conflict. A thousand years ago, humanity tore the moon from the sky, sealing it within you and chaining you to the earth. Now freed, you must journey into the scorched, war-torn land you once called home and return the moon to the sky.

name: Soccer Golf!
summary: Kick a hole in one!

name: Some Assembly Required
summary: A humorous horror game, where your job is to gather body parts from freezers while various types of zombies do their best to make a meal out of you.

name: Sorry Survivor
summary: In "Sorry Survivor," the main character becomes irresistible and rejects girls who approach him, aiming for his dream heroine. It's a simple top-down, harem-denying, Vampire Survivors-like 2D action game.

name: Sodahazard: Taste Test
summary: A struggling content creator goes toe-to-toe with conspiracy and catastrophe in this short, narrative RPG. Adventure to the world of the Soda Kingdom, a plastic paradise that values the brand above all else!

name: Souper Game
summary: Souper Game is a fun and spicy clicker where you play as... SOUP! That's right—an irresistible, hot, and aromatic soup that the elven girl Sylvie prepares for the rude and insatiable Troll. Your mission? Not only to become the perfect dish but also to earn her affection!

name: Sounds & Rhythms
summary:
How well do you know your animals and musical instruments? Explore the beauty of nature with your ears.

Discover and identify animals and musical instruments by listening to their sounds and rhythms.

Listen to nature's acoustics, discover new animals or instruments, and learn fun new stuff!

name: Sort Em All
summary: In Sort Em All - Water Puzzle, your mission is to finish the water sorting levels. Sort and merge the same color water in tubes with various shapes, using your strategic skills to solve each sorting game level. As you progress, the water puzzle games become more challenging, adding to the sorting puzzle joy while putting your brain to the ultimate game test. Exercise your mental muscles and logic as you relax and fill the bottles with the right combinations of water.

name: Soccer Showdown
summary: The most advanced shootout game ever! Represent your nation in this global online free-for-all.

name: Soldiers vs. Zombies: Tower Defense
summary: Soldiers vs Zombies is a tower defense game where zombies have overrun the world, and humanity’s last hope lies in elite soldiers. Armed from laser rifles to death machine guns, you’ll deploy troops and use special skills to stop waves of mutated zombies!

name: Social Democracy: Petrograd 1917 - An Alternate History
summary:
It is March 1917, and the Russian Empire is entering a whirlwind of change. The unpopular Tsar has just been overthrown. Power now belongs to the Provisional Government on one hand, and the Soviet of Workers' and Soldiers' Deputies on the other. How will the new political order confront the devastation of war and the economic crisis? What is the future for democracy in Russia?

Play as the Mensheviks, Socialist-Revolutionaries, Kadets, or Bolsheviks, and steer the revolution to victory or collapse.

name: Sorry We're Closed
summary: Sorry We're Closed is a nostalgic, single-player survival horror game with rich lore, deep characters and multiple endings. Explore unsettling locations with fixed camera angles. Open your Third Eye to see between worlds, uncover secrets and solve puzzles.

name: SOG: Vietnam
summary: Head to Vietnam as a lone SOG operative. Gear up, upgrade your skills, and explore the danger-filled jungles. Complete the missions assigned by your country and eliminate enemies using napalm and artillery in a brutal, tactical, turn-based 2D roguelite that does not forgive mistakes!

name: Soul Mirror Relics
summary: As a youthful offender, sent to a place called the Soul Mirror Relics, When the mirror reflected past memories, after witnessing a myriad of people and events, whether to let go, whether to live or die, whether to accept or not, are all endings

name: Souls End
summary: Souls End is an auto-battler roguelike where you'll draft unstoppable armies, placing units and items in just the right way to create awesome synergies! Cast spells while battles unfold and find relics to further elevate builds. Will you defeat life itself-or will you meet a Souls End?

name: Soccer Shootout
summary: Soccer Shootout is a simple soccer game where you do penalty shots against a goaltender and try to get as many goals as possible.

name: Solitaire
summary:
The classic game of Klondike Solitaire. Honestly, not much to say about this one. But hey, it is a nostalgic and comfy game to play.

Includes both single and triple card play modes.

name: Soultracer
summary: You and your friends stumble upon a gateway to another reality, one that harbors horrors beyond human comprehension. Fight through all evil and survive at all costs. There's something special about you, Soultracer, and only you can save your friends from the terror within.

name: Souls of Chronos Gaiden
summary: Souls of Chronos Gaiden is a 2D action-adventure game. Play the role of the sword-wielding girl 'Kolia' and the her partner 'Mika' to embark on an unusual journey of revenge. Strengthen your character, defeat powerful enemies, and witness the flash of light at the end of the journey.

name: Solstorm
summary: SOLSTORM is a classic hand-crafted arcade bullet hell, skillfully weave, and dodge through 9 stages with waves of projectiles as you persevere and see a space odyssey to the end!

name: Sophistry
summary: Play as a famous philosopher, build your deck, write books, and gather synergistic ideas. Engage in philosophical debates, where victory is earned by answering profound questions or captivating the crowd. Improve your philosophers and their books, create questions and lead the debate!

name: Sons of Odin
summary: Sons of Odin is a tactical multiplayer card game with fast matches and shifting rules. Choose your hero, unleash godlike powers, and adapt to runes and trickster’s coins to outsmart rivals in tense and unpredictable duels

name: Sonic Blitz
summary: Sonic Blitz is a collectible card game with an emphasis on lightning-fast gameplay that is easy to jump into at any time. Sonic Blitz draws on the rich roster of characters in the Sonic the Hedgehog universe to create a diverse pool of cards that players can collect, upgrade, and assemble into strategic decks to take on opponents in fast-paced one-on-one battles that unfold in a matter of minutes.

name: Soviet Survival
summary: Soviet Survival is an isometric, open-world survival game where you must find your place in the ruined Soviet Union.

name: Soulmask: The Golden Legend
summary: Soulmask - The Golden Legend now alive!

name: Sokobos 2
summary: A puzzle game about pushing vases into a cart, but you can push the cart too!

name: SourceWorld
summary: SourceWorld is a Dungeon Crawler Half-Life 2 mod with Immersive Sim elements. Be an indebted explorer doing raids on procedurally-generated parallel dimensions. Your job is Multiverse Research, but the curiosity comes with putting everything in danger of something lurking in far universes.

name: Software CEO
summary: Build your own software empire from scratch. Manage projects, recruit staff, design components, and grow from a garage startup to a tech giant. Create SaaS platforms, sell software, or fulfill contracts. Balance quality, deadlines, and innovation in this relaxing yet deep business simulation game.

name: Song of Morus: Limbo Express
summary: Third-Person On-Rail Shoot 'em up, where a young Taoist priestess and a deity of Death escort a spiritual train through the underworld. Nonlinear space, physics-defying action, and relentless speed await.

name: Somewhere in Time and Space
summary: Step into Farra’s shoes and begin a journey only you can understand. Collect topics, connect with others, and try to stop them from falling into the unknown. In a seemingly endless loop, move toward a fate waiting to be understood — and find yourself again.

name: Solitude
summary: A survival shooter with story elements where you explore a hostile alien world after crash-landing your spaceship. Complete quests and gather the resources needed to escape.

name: Solar Savage
summary: Build your vehicle, roam the lands, live your best SolarPunk life!

name: Sometimes Toast Is O.K.
summary: Sometimes Toast is O.K. is a chaotic point-and-click sandbox where you explore your kitchen and make toast! Throw around bread, spill jam, burn the house down, or feed the cabinet demon. Whatever you decide to do, this hilarious breakfast adventure has endless comedy in store.

name: Soul of the Dungeon
summary: Survive against hordes of ninjas, upgrade your character with coins dropped from enemies, get unique skills with cards from chests, and face powerful bosses in this fast-paced, top-down shooter with rogue-lite mechanics.

name: Soul Cards
summary: Soul Cards is a retro single-player deckbuilder roguelite. Customize your deck, recruit powerful characters, modify your cards, and defeat the devil and his minions to get your soul back!

name: Soul Ryder RPG
summary: A surreal Turn-Based RPG / 2D Platformer inspired by the Mario RPG series.

name: Solus Machina
summary: A lone robot, deemed worthless by its creators, seeks freedom and adventure in a hostile world

name: SoulForge
summary: Harness the power of a corrupted blade as you navigate forgotten ruins, kill monsters, and balance your soul between power and corruption in this dark, atmospheric dungeon souls-like game!

name: Soul Chained
summary: A co-op souls-lite adventure awaits in Soul Chained. Face brutal enemies, overcome complex platforming challenges, and learn to work together within the constraints of the Soul Chain. You will be chained to your co-op partner so remember to communicate!

name: Sorderon's Shadow
summary: You have to complete nine tasks in order to bring the evil Sorderon down.

name: SocialChess
summary: A polished, full featured way to play chess against friends or random opponents online. Play fast chess with a clock, or play many correspondence games at a time making moves whenever you have a chance every day or so.

name: Soul Cauldron
summary: Create a Coven of Witches in this Min-Maxing dungeon runner, where you meticulously redesign your characters for every new dungeon with over 500 unique spells in 6 spheres of magic. Get ready for hours of stat comparing, synergy building and running side quests for that set item you're missing.

name: Soul Nexus
summary: Soul Nexus is a text-based adventure game where you explore strange environments and interact with even stranger individuals. Will you wander the spaces forever or will you eventually fulfil your goal of being free?

name: SoulWander
summary: Soul Wander is a moving journey to restore lost colors and light to a dark world. Can you find the light in this darkness? Each region has its own story. Grow stronger with weapons and soul powers. Your choices shape the world’s fate. Begin your quest to reclaim lost colors now!

name: Soulglass
summary: Soulglass is a chill physics-based roguelite where you push a giant mystical hourglass to keep the sand flowing while managing afflictions that alter physics and create obstacles.

name: Soul Sight
summary: A relaxing "Spot the Differences" game. 30 artworks and a chilled lo-fi electronic soundtrack

name: Songs of Yummy
summary: Songs of Yummy is a cozy and idle game. Food is scarce in the army, and you play Jia Xu and Cheng Yu, ordered to prepare for our army supplies. You will use every means to make everything in the world into military food.

name: Solitaire of Stygian Shadows
summary: Battle through countless arrangements of evil cards and bring order to our world! Solitaire of Stygian Shadows is a randomly generated card game where each playthrough is completely unique!

name: Solene's Spin Story
summary: In this action-puzzle game, you control Solene, a sunny little star, and navigate cramped and treacherous levels to find the exit. Your best friend Sélène, perpetually in orbit around you, is injured, so watch out for the slightest bump against a wall or obstacle!

name: Solar Wave
summary: A large-scale 4X strategy game with indirect control and a focus on simulating a space empire. Capture systems, develop your economy and logistics, call up hundreds of powerful fleets and watch them incinerate enemies of the Solar Empire.

name: Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive
summary:
The Solo Leveling webtoon is now an action RPG!
Live the epic journey of E-Rank hunter Sung Jinwoo on his way to becoming the Monarch of Shadows!

name: Songs for a Hero + Shieldmaiden Bundle
Soul Blade
summary: A Taiwanese bootleg 2D demake for the Genesis and SNES of the 3D Namco fighting game of the same name.

name: Solitaire Dreamscapes
summary: Drift away into a world of cards and dreams.

name: Soul Astray
summary: Jump, dash and use abilities granted by your immortal soul to outjump damnation in this challenging, yet whimsical, puzzle-precision platformer. Flex your creativity and precision as you overcome hand-crafted trials with minimal instruction.

name: SolCycle
summary: Enter the 3D sci-fi world of SolCycle! Play as a robot cat archaeologist, explore a post-human community rebuilt by plant-fueled robots, and barter with the locals in card-based gameplay! Learn to navigate the citizens’ requests while under the spell of a time-loop. Don’t forget to watch the clock!

name: Someone Knocks The Door
summary:
A crazy man has escaped the asylum.
Police warns you not to let anyone in.
Someone knocks the door.

This is a very short horror game made in 1 day for the Rhomita Game Jam.

name: Sonic Slash
summary: This is a one-handed action game

name: Sobakistan: The Land of Dogs
summary: Sobakistan — the land of dogs, is a darkly satirical narrative immersion in a closed-off totalitarian dog state — where any step could send you to prison.

name: Some: The House
summary: SOME: The House is a horror house escape video game where your primary goal is to escape the House. Your goal is simple, find the keys to the door and do not get caught doing it. Escape the House at all cost!

name: Sounds of Her Love 2
summary: A cute romance visual novel set at an international school in Japan. As you approach the final hours of your school years together, help your sweet but shy girlfriend Ceri overcome her fears to be able to play the harp at the school's graduation ceremony. A tender, wholesome love story awaits.

name: Sonic Speedfreshed
summary: Sonic Speedfreshed is a 3D side scrolling Sonic fan-game. This fan-game aims to improve apon the flawed aspects of the original classic games, like the bosses for example.

name: Soulrift
summary: Explore the Forest of Souls as you defeat enemies in tactical, turn-based battles. Choose from a great variety of classes, races, abilities, and equipment to deeply customize your character in this highly replayable traditional roguelike, as you delve deeper to find out the truth about the forest.

name: Somnambulo
summary: Enter a psychological horror experience where a young psychologist must navigate a surreal world shaped by forgotten memories and fears – both her own and those she once tried to heal. Face what was buried. Reclaim what was lost. Escape – before it’s too late.

name: Sonic Valkyria: Kanon
summary: "Every time you shoot an enemy, music is born." The heartbeat of rock becomes your aim. An impulse shooting game with anime song rock and lock-on! "Sonic Valkyria: KANON"

name: Soul Machine
summary: First Person Rogue-like with an incentive of choice. Set on a planet where a silent war between an alien race and a human soldier rage on. Craft your own build with self made weapons and personalized upgrades. Erratic enemies keep you on your toes so Fight like a machine with soul and purpose.

name: Sonic Dash: 3D Endless Runner
summary: Endless runner action has never been faster with Sonic Dash! Feel the speed as you navigate fun 3D runner race courses with Sonic the Hedgehog, Knuckles, Tails, Shadow, and more. Collect rings and race past challenging obstacles in this fast running game by SEGA! Sonic Dash is a fun run game for kids and adults alike.

name: Solaris: Good Harvest
summary: A humble farmer sets out to rescue his chicken from monstrous abductors. Punch, slash, and parkour your way through elemental-infused chaos in this fast-paced 2D action-platformer!

name: Sonic Frontiers: Holiday Cheer Suit
summary:
Bring some holiday spirit to the Starfall Islands with the Holiday Cheer Suit!

The Holiday Cheer Suit can be equipped by accessing the Title Menu and then selecting the EXTRA CONTENT submenu.

name: Something a Little Super
summary:
An interactive novel by Barbara Truelove.

Raising a kid ain't easy. Throw super powers into the mix and well... that's where the real fun begins.

Something a Little Super is a 20,000 word interactive story about adopting and raising a child with super powers. Your choices will shape them into the person they'll become (hero, villain, or something else...)

name: Sonic World Doom
summary:
Many monsters from Hell have appeared in a new world... Doom Guy heard of it and decided to rip and tear all the baddies... But this world has some mechanics Doom Guy was not ready for...

A Doom II mod that takes place in the Sonic World that has been attacked. Lots of platforming, springs, and more!

name: Solitaire Battle
summary: Slay your enemies by playing solitaire, synergize your card-powered attacks and abilities, then break the game and become the best to ever Solitaire Battle in this roguelike deckbuilding autobattler!

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: Legacy of Solaris
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog: Legacy of Solaris isn't an official game, but rather a major fan-made mod for the infamous "Sonic the Hedgehog (2006)" game, often called "Sonic 06." Its primary goal is to enhance and correct the myriad of issues and bugs that plagued the original title, transforming it into a more playable and definitive version. This extensive community-driven project seeks to redeem the unfulfilled potential of "Sonic 06" by meticulously addressing its notorious flaws. The mod dramatically improves the game's core mechanics, rectifying common glitches, camera problems, collision issues, and character physics, resulting in a much smoother and more enjoyable gameplay experience. Beyond mere fixes, "Legacy of Solaris" also expands the base game with new missions, levels, and even playable story segments for characters who had limited screen time in the original (such as Blaze, Omega, Knuckles, and Rouge), offering a more comprehensive perspective on the universe and events of "Sonic 06." Furthermore, the mod reintroduces beta elements and concepts that were cut from the final release, providing fans with a glimpse into what the game could have been. While a fan-made endeavor, it also strives to optimize the game for more stable performance, reducing frame drops and, in some cases, delivering visual enhancements. In essence, "Sonic the Hedgehog: Legacy of Solaris" takes the foundational story of "Sonic 06" – involving time travel, Princess Elise, the villain Mephiles, and the entity Solaris – and meticulously refines it into something genuinely complete and fun.

name: Soul Slasher
summary: Soul Slasher is a top down, 1v1 PvP focused close combat game. The arena's randomized obstacles, buffs, and traps make every match different. Slash your opponent's soul and claim your freedom.

name: Something Dark Beyond The Light
summary: you have awakened into a strange dream

name: Soulforge: Lost Path
summary: In Soulforge: Lost Path (Survivors-like), become a legendary hunter slaughtering endless Corrupted Souls. Scavenge Sacred Remains to forge Exorcist Artefacts, manage limited inventory strategically, and uncover the world's festering corruption truth.

name: Solitile
summary: Solitile is a game of solitaire, played with "tiles". The goal of the game is to remove pairs of matched tiles until all of the tiles have been removed. The game derives from several similar games, such as "Shanghai", "Gunshy", and "Mahjongg", which are played with Mah-Jong tiles. Solitile plays the same game, but adds new starting layouts and the ability for the player to create new layouts and/or modify the layouts provided. Its default tile set uses "westernized" pictures on the faces of the tiles, but can also use alternate tile sets including a "mahjongg" style set. The licensed version of the game includes over 285 tile sets and 560 layouts.

name: Soul Land: Hunting World
summary:
Soul Land: Hunting World is the first 3D open-world MMORPG set in the Soul Land universe - a true Soul Land MMO. Step into a faithfully reimagined world where a new generation of players can forge unforgettable memories. Explore a vast world and enjoy unparalleled freedom through your own eyes on a first-person journey. Whether wandering tranquil forests or discovering hidden lakes, encountering mythical Soul Beasts or wielding powerful Martial Souls, every element of this land comes alive in stunning detail. Legendary characters like The Seven Monsters and the elders of the Spirit Hall return, their stories waiting to unfold. But the most important story is yours - your name, your choices, your legacy, woven into the very fabric of this world.

Welcome to a Soul Land that's more intense, immersive, and alive than ever before.

name: Soccer Challenge
summary: Soccer Challenge is a series of mini-games designed to 'hone your skills' in some of the key disciplines of the sport (tackling, passing and penalties) before taking on a stamina building assault course.

name: Solis
summary:
Solis is a hand-drawn adventure about technology and deception in a city at night.
During a company trip you explore the city of Solis from dusk till dawn, talking with its inhabitants and meeting colleagues. This night you learn the painful truth about the company you work for. Will you remain loyal?
In the game you explore an atmospheric and compact open world. Decisions within the game carry weight, influencing subsequent events, while the in-game text adjusts to reflect your choices.

In Solis you explore the city, investigate your surroundings and talk with the inhabitants and colleagues you meet. Decisions within the game carry weight, influencing subsequent events, while the in-game text dynamically adjusts to reflect your choices. Interactions are streamlined to utilize a single button, aided by context-sensitive interaction icons. The GUI is a sparse as possible. Solis offers multiple endings and is crafted to be concise and compact. The complete game is estimated to run for approximately 2,5 hours.

name: Solitaire Home Story
summary: Renovate and decorate your home in this stylish single-player adventure.

name: Sohee
summary: Please help Sohee find her happiness.

name: Sor.Op: Dark Shades
summary: SOR.OP: Dark Shades is a realistic first-person shooter from SNRC Studios with beautiful graphics, precise controls, and over 40 maps. Play in 7 modes, including Team Deathmatch, Free For All, Domination, and Zombie Mode. Tactics, skill, and teamwork are the key to victory.

name: Sonak
summary: Sharpen your blade and unleash devastating elemental magic in Sonak, a third-person fantasy action RPG. Charge into adventure against relentless monsters, customize your build, craft the ultimate gear, and defeat continuously evolving bosses.

name: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Digital Deluxe Edition
summary:
This bundle includes:
• Base game
• Season Pass:
- Sonic Prime Character Pack - Rusty Rose, Tails Nine, Knuckles the Dread (Available at launch)
- 6 Content Packs, which include guest characters, vehicles, tracks, emotes, and more from some of your favorite pop culture franchises.
* Additional content will be released sequentially after the game is released.
* Please check the official website for product details and release schedule.

name: Solitaire: Classic Card Games
summary: Enjoy the classic Solitaire card game at any time and place! It's time to relax, relieve stress, train your brain, challenge yourself and be a Patience master.

name: Someone Creepy
summary: Someone Creepy is a horror game about a women who is being stalked by someone and that stalker is going to take big steps to disrupt her life.

name: Socks & Pants
summary: Sort the wash before the time runs out. Strange occurrences have been causing odd socks.

name: Sonic Pacman
summary: An unofficial Pac-Man clone where Pac-Man is replaced by Sonic the Hedgehog.

name: Solkatt_
summary: The ShuffleComp is a musical interactive fiction competition where you make games based on songs, which are submitted by other entrants.

name: Sound of Horses
summary: Sound of Horses – Episode 1: The beginning of an unexpected journey that takes you from the peaceful Homeland into a world of hidden truths and distant echoes of something greater. Create your own rider and horse, explore an open world on horseback, and take your first steps into the adventure.

name: Soba's Gunpaw
summary: Soba’s Gunpaw is a Short Incremental - Bullet Heaven game. Destroy everything, collect resources, then choose upgrades from a massive skill tree!

name: Soukh
summary: Discover Soukh - a Middle Eastern-inspired fantasy shopkeeping and strategy game. Run a chaotic bazaar with demanding customers, dispatch caravans and conquer challenges to gather exotic loot. Guide an exiled merchant’s rise. Will the sands lift him to glory… or bury him in stories left untold?

name: Soccer Superstar
summary:
Play the brand new football game Soccer Super Star and enjoy real run-time and kick physics for an immersive and legendary football experience!

Love action arcade soccer but lack the time to practice? The new Soccer Super Star’s very easy to learn game controls allows you to jump-start the fun. Just flick your finger across the screen to kick the ball and score a goal!

name: Soup Raiders
summary: Soup Raiders is an action-tactical RPG with a real time battle system, lovingly hand-drawn character in 3d environment, a lively story in an even livelier world and it is all contained in a single soup.

name: Soul Apocalypto
summary: 《Soul Apocalypto》 is a role-playing game that also emphasizes the selection of team strategies. You can summon different roles to form your own team, and realize team characteristics by deploying role skills. To defeat different enemies and pass bosses in this way!

name: Socially Awkward
summary:
Socially Awkward is an 18+ semi-linear furry visual novel using emotional cues to portray the story of each individual character on certain topics and reactions.

You are Jayce (Name can be replaced). An insecure half-breed cat who just started his college life. Follow his day-to-day to uncover each character's past to get to know them as well as figure out the world around him.

name: Soviet Tide Arising!
summary: Take to the skies over the western front in this fantasy alternate timeline WW1 casual run and gun style sim-shooter. Fly as a heroic pilot of the Allied Empires as you take on nefarious Soviet forces.

name: Sosnova
summary: Explore an endless, procedurally generated world in Sosnova. Evade monsters and military forces, drive 50's-90's style cars, and gather supplies to survive. With total freedom and retro aesthetics, every adventure is unique. How far will you go to endure in this ultimate 90's inspired adventure?

name: Sonic.Exe The Destiny
summary: The game follows Tails, Knuckles, Dr. Eggman and Metal Sonic as they are terrorized by a bloodthirsty monster who's out to kill them for unspecified reasons. However, these motives, and the paths these four take, will define their future and have an impact on their lives forever.

name: Song of Nanzhao
summary: Song of Nanzhao is a music-driven puzzle adventure set in ancient China. As a voiceless court musician, use pentatonic melodies drawn from nature to solve puzzles, uncover hidden stories, and connect with villagers, seeking peace through the power of sound.

name: Sonic 1 on Bird Hill Island
summary: Sonic 1 on Bird Hill Island is a ROM hack of the original Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Genesis. The hack features extensive level redesigns, including reimagined zones like Bird Hill (Green Hill), Mysterious Marble, and Bird Park (Spring Yard).

name: Sound of Summer Thunder
summary: Kody, a modern gym rat gets zapped by strange lightning and time-travels to 1898. A BARA, choices matter, alternate history, Visual Novel Musical set in the East Coast of USA. LGBTQ+ with romance options.

name: Soap
summary: Built on old-school FPS roots, Soap is a brutal movement platformer where only the sharpest runs survive.

name: Solitary in the Library
summary: A haunting psychological horror set between school life and a cursed library. Relive the same days. Search for answers. Try to wake up.

name: Some Jello and a Hard Place
summary: Worlds hardest game? You'll just have to find out yourself.

name: SOS Incident
summary: SOS Incident is a narrative-driven psychological horror adventure inspired by a true crime unsolved mystery brought to life by Nexpo’s original viral video.

name: Soccer Challenge
summary: Soccer Challenge (AKA Football Challenge) is a sports game released in 2006, and re-released ~2008 for the V.Smile Motion with added motion controls.

name: Sokmeal Time
summary: Sokmeal Time is a cozy sokoban game where you guide a hungry corgi through handcrafted puzzles. Move empty bowls into place, solve satisfying logic challenges, and watch kibble appear as your reward. With a relaxing flow, playful charm, this is a game that makes every solved puzzle feel like a warm treat.

name: Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed: Yogscast DLC
summary: Yogscast, the UK’s most watched YouTube channel, run an annual charity drive for the month of December. This year, they are teaming up with Sega and taking the drive to the next level in a race against the fastest Hedgehog in the world. The Yogscast’s very own Simon Lane, aka Honeydew, is now available as a brand new DLC character in Sonic & All-Stars Racing Transformed with 100% of all Sega and Yogscast proceeds being donated to the SpecialEffect charity.

name: Sonic 1 Co-op
summary: Sonic 1 Co-op is a ROM hack of the original 1991 game for the Sega Genesis. This modification completely overhauls the base engine to support local, split-screen cooperative gameplay, allowing a second player to join as either Tails or a duplicate Sonic.

name: Sonic CD's Scrapped Rounds
summary: This mod returns the scrapped levels of the Sonic CD: Dubious Depths, Baneful Badland (reimagined Desert Dazzle) and Final Fever. Levels become part of the main game, not additional levels. They are made according to existing information and concepts about them, but at the same time, the mod does not try to authentically and accurately recreate the levels, but is a free interpretation of the author. All level's assets and objects are custom. The mod has a little customization of names and level music; some of the music was written specifically for the levels, while others were borrowed from other authors, most of whom are part of the team.

name: Sonic: Project Revenge
summary: Sonic and Tails are defeating Eggman because he took the emeralds or something, maybe the Revenge Pizza.

name: Sonic and the Duel of Fates
summary: Sonic and the Duel of Fates is a fan-made project that blends high-speed Sonic the Hedgehog platforming with the cinematic, epic atmosphere of Star Wars.

name: Sonic 3 Ultimate
summary: Sonic 3 Ultimate is a hack of Sonic 3 & Knuckles that aims to give an upgrade to the game. Graphics have been updated and multiple bugs have been fixed.

name: Sonic Vania
summary: Sonic Vania blends the fast-paced platforming of Sonic the Hedgehog with the interconnected world exploration and backtracking mechanics of the Metroidvania genre.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog: A New Adventure
Sonic: Christmas Trouble
summary: Sonic: Christmas Trouble is a festive, high-quality ROM hack of the original Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Genesis. First released for the Sonic Hacking Contest 2017, the project is a complete seasonal overhaul that replaces the standard levels with winter-themed environments.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog in Giant Jungle
Sonic 2: Westside Renovation
summary: The project reimagines the original West Side Island adventure with a narrative focused on Dr. Robotnik’s "terraformation scheme," which has transformed classic zones into surreal, expanded environments filled with new secrets and branching paths.

name: Sonic 2 Addendum
summary: Sonic 2 Addendum it aims to create an enhanced, definitive version of the original game by restoring and reimagining content from unused beta versions and prototypes, alongside adding modern quality-of-life improvements.

name: Sonic 1 Proto-Mix
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog: Proto-Mix is a ROM modification for the 2013 mobile/RSDK version of Sonic the Hedgehog. The hack is defined by its objective to "mix" the high-speed gameplay of the final 1991 release with rare, scrapped elements found in early prototype builds and magazine scans.

name: Sonic 1: The Super Challenges
summary: Sonic 1: The Super Challenges is a ROM hack of the original Sonic the Hedgehog for the Sega Genesis. Unlike traditional hacks that focus on level redesigns, this project is built as a mission-based experience similar to the "Mission Mode" found in modern Sonic titles.

name: Soul Scar
summary: Evil waits behind a random mask. Choose your party of four and travel to Ashfall- a cursed town doomed to relive its suffering. Uncover its secrets, hunt the hidden boss, and forge your legacy through blood and ash.

name: Son of Thanjai
summary: Son of Thanjai is a cinematic action-adventure epic set in the culturally rich 11th-century South India. As a Chola king burdened by legacy, you must embark on a personal journey that blurs the line between duty and destiny. Will you rise as a legend–or be forgotten?

name: Soup-of-War
summary: You are a clumsy one-armed pirate cook desperately trying to prepare meals for your crew by grabbing, cutting, and throwing ingredients into pots while your ship heaves violently on stormy seas, turning every simple cooking task into a chaotic physics-based struggle against time and your own limitations.

name: Sound Shooting!! Rhythm Shooter
summary:
Rhythm game plus 2D shooter!
Great for rhythm action and shooting game fans!
So, is it a rhythm game or a shooting game? Play and check it out for yourself!

With Monica, the clever and Liz, the wild, and to the cheerful music, beat the 8 bosses!
Get ready to enjoy both the rhythm and shooting elements of the game!

name: Sorceress Services
summary: Starting anew as a rookie Sorceress, complete magical transactions and requests to build your clientele and grow your business! In this narrative-driven fantasy vendor simulator, follow unique quest lines, use persuasive techniques, and cast enchantments on your goods with gestures.

name: So You Wanna Be A Redneck
summary: This expansion for Redneck Rampage comprises 75 levels and 15 multiplayer levels and maps, which were chosen from a contest conducted for the game.

name: Soul Breach
summary: Soul Breach is a F2P turn-based combat RPG that challenges you to collect, upgrade, and command a collection of legendary creatures in tactical battles. Every creature is shaped by ancient forces, evolving with each battle and ensuring no two are ever the same. Master the battlefield by unleashing powerful hero abilities, using sacred relics to enhance your creatures or weaken your enemies. Develop your strategy, refine your synergy, and prove your dominance in a world shaped by power and destiny.

name: Sonic and the Moon Faucility
summary:
Sonic and The Moon Facility is a 2D Sonic fangame that follows Sonic and Tails on an adventure to discover the secrets of a mysteriously reactivated research facility.

This build includes all the levels in the game, however only SONIC can complete the main campaign of the game. Debug tools will unlock once you beat the game, or if you know how to access them already.

This game was CANCELLED and this is a release of an unfinished development build of the game. It is released to honor all the hard work from the people who helped me work on it.

name: Solo Leveling: Arise Overdrive - Deluxe Edition
summary:
Deluxe Edition and Preorder Reward
[Deluxe Edition Special Benefits]
1) Game Edition
- Solo Leveling:ARISE OVERDRIVE
2) Deluxe Edition-exclusive Sung Jinwoo costume
- Sung Jinwoo: Overdrive
3) 1 Face Accessory for Sung Jinwoo
4) 2 New Hairstyles for Sung Jinwoo
5) Cha Hae-In Emoji Set (8 total)
- "Hello!", "Let's go!", "You're the best!", "I'm sorry!", "Thanks!", "Help!", "Run!", "Over here!"
6) Yaruru 'Predator Tank'
*A Yaruru is a cute ally character that helps hunters by picking up items and gathering resources for them.
7) 1 New Profile Card
8) 1 New Profile Frame
9) 1 New Icon
10) 1 New Profile Background
[Preorder Reward]
- Enjoy a 3-day head-start with Advanced Access!

name: Sort Hexa Tiles
summary: Sort the hexa tiles. Collect them in stacks of the same color. Use bonuses to help.

name: Sort Tiles
summary: Sort a colored tiles. Collect them in stacks of the same color. Use bonuses to help.

name: Sort Items
summary: Sort different objects. Put all the objects on the shelves. Clear all the shelves from things.

name: Sokker
summary: Sokker is a fast-paced soccer game for 1-4 players! Kick by flicking the control stick! Play your friends in Versus mode, or try co-op in the World Cup!

name: Solbrand
summary: 2409. As the new Spook on HMS Solbrand you dive deep into a past steeped in grand norse myth and quiet local legend. Command your submersible, survey sunken ruins, uncover puzzling fragments, commune with the dead, and untangle a pseudo-historical knot of cosmic proportions: Why is the sun so loud?

name: SongRunner
summary: Complete platforming levels by playing music using your keyboard, then move and jump across your notes to reach the flag.

name: Solitaire Zero 21
summary: Card game fit for all the family! The aim of the game is to clear the playing area of all cards whilst keeping your deck score between 0 and 21. If you hit 0 or below, or hit 21 or above, it is game over.

name: Solaris: Arcade Edition
summary: You take control from a spaceship called DV-01 to towards on stages until reach the "Special Stage" that is endless! Shoot on enemies to earn more points this is the focus. Enjoy! This is the Arcade Version from "Solaris The Second Law" my another project.

name: Sonic Rush Rerun
summary:
Sonic Rush Rerun is a full fan reimagining of the Nintendo DS game “SONIC RUSH”. The idea behind this remake is to take the greatest strengths of the Sonic Rush trilogy (Rush, Rush Adventure, and Colors DS), crank them up to 11, and combine those strengths into the ultimate remake of Sonic Rush!

Boost through familiar zones with refined, low-poly, 2.5D visuals with newly implemented moves and tricks to really kick things into high gear! With the retuning Advance 2 launcher system and the Stomp and Air Boost from Colors DS, Sonic and Blaze can rush through these revamped stages faster than ever before!

name: Sova
summary: Descend into a surreal sci-fantasy world in this narrative-driven action roguelite, where every run reshapes your story. Sova’s expressive combat meets deeply branching dialogue and world-shifting decisions. Compose your violence, rewrite your past, and bend a crumbling realm to your will.

name: Sorry! I surrounded beauty!
summary: "Sorry! I Surrounded By Beauty" is a full-motion live-action interactive video dating simulation game. As the protagonist, Chen Mo, you are a young and promising individual in the early stages of your career. However, you face unexpected professional setbacks and the emotional entanglements that follow. You will encounter beauties with distinct personalities, joining them to uncover the hidden truths behind the story.

name: Sous Raccoon
summary: Play as a raccoon sous chef managing restaurants while defending customers from monsters in this action-packed roguelike that blends cooking with combat!

name: Soul Catcher: The Moon Coliseum
summary: Soul Catcher: The Moon Coliseum is a fast-paced Roguelite FPS. Where survival is just the start. Thrown into a brutal Arena of escalating enemy waves, you’ll need more than reflexes to survive, you’ll need strategy, adaptability, and the power of Magic Crystals.

name: Soul Essence
summary: A frantic, race-against-time survival horror game with Roguelite and Metroidvania elements. Traverse a decrepit, cultist-infested estate and collect awakened souls to conquer an ancient god looking to feast on your essence. Before midnight strikes—can you defeat the god or prevent its return?

name: Souls Alive: Origins
summary: Souls Alive: Origins is a Lovecraftian survival horror game set in a dark sci-fi future. Explore a world where reality bends, ancient cults return, and Cthulhu stirs once more. With a strong focus on story, atmosphere, and visual detail.

name: Songs of Conquest: Roots
summary: Songs of Conquest's second new faction is The Roots, who have spread from deep within the Wyldwoods of the Bleak East. Take command of flora, fungus, and the bones of the repurposed dead to spread the Roots across Aerbor!

name: SoulGatherer
summary: One world. One soul. Countless fragments.

name: So I bought a little chainsaw
summary: So I bought a little chainsaw is an Interactive Fiction game featuring reviews for a little, cursed chainsaw. Will the small decisions you make change the fate of the world?

name: Soldiers of Heaven VR
summary: Armed with a virtual camera you will film your own 360 VR version of the story as it unfolds in an immersive 3D world. A virtual reality short.

name: Solar Knight
summary: Join forces with Sir Lionel Lancelot De L’Arc — a knight of the Bourbon Roundtable, falsely branded a murderer of the King and Queen. Despised and pursued by the land he once served, Lionel fights to uncover the truth, expose the real killers, and reclaim his shattered honor.

name: Sokomine
summary: Grab your helmet and pickaxe, because Sokomine just got explosive! Every puzzle is a mix of brains and blasts. Push mining carts stuffed with dynamite straight into meteors, blow them to pieces, and collect the shiny crystals hiding inside

name: Sonic Islands
summary: Sonic Islands is an open zone fan-game inspired by the Sonic Frontiers game. Sonic and his friends need to help the Guardian of the Aurora Islands defeat a greater evil being that has been taking over the now destroyed civilization of Aurora for years.

name: Soluna's Mood
summary: "Soluna's Mood" - a cute weather widget with personality! Sol & Luna react to weather and your clicks. Collect accessories and enjoy their emotions. Lightweight with transparency controls.

name: Soul Academy
summary: "Soul Academy" is an academy simulator with automatic battle MOBA. You will manage a shabby soul academy, recruiting and training students. Your ultimate goal is to challenge various academies across the continent and reach the top.

name: Some Nights at Joe's
summary: It's your first day working at the newest pizzeria in the city, after the closing of Fredbear's Family Dinner the rights of the mascots were bought by Fazbear entertainment, changing the theme of the new restaurant with new characters.

name: Some Nights at Joe's Remake
summary: The remake of the hit videogame Some Nights at Joe's.

name: Soul Calibur: Swords of Destiny
summary: The gameplay attempts to resemble that of the traditional Soul Calibur games, but in 2D.

name: Sora no Ao to Shiro to
Sore ha Maichiru Sakura no You ni: Re:birth
summary: This is the 20th Anniversary edition of the game.

name: Soccerlypse
summary: Soccerlypse is a First Person Shooter + soccer game where the main objective is to get the ball in the goal more than the opposition and win the game. Play Soccerlypse against real players across the world as you kick, shoot, or explode the ball over the line.

name: Soul Redemption
summary: "Soul Redemption" is a card-based role-playing game. In a decaying kingdom, play as a merciful priest and guide the lost sheep back to the light.

name: Sonic.exe: Dark Souls Remake
summary:
While on vacation, Sonic The Hedgehog, making a discovery on Angel Island, calls his friend Miles “Tails” Prower so they could investigate it together, not realizing that he has gotten himself possessed.

The self proclaimed demon, Exezar, using Sonic’s body, goes on a mission alongside his only demon friend, Oxiel, to revive the physical body of himself and his ally, Avares… but, do the both of them have the same goal in mind?

Waking up from the commotion caused by Exezar on Angel Island, Knuckles The Echidna rushes to the rescue of the Master Emerald.

His badniks have made the same discovery as Sonic, and with Metal Sonic sent away to collect the Chaos Emeralds, Dr. Ivo “Eggman” Robotnik, travels to Angel Island to confirm his badniks’ discovery with his own eyes, only to find himself tangling with the Heroes on the way and, later, Exezar's companion, Oxiel.

name: Sonic.exe: Dark Souls
summary:
Sonic.exe : Dark Souls
is a game based on sonic.exe creepypasta
The story is told in a kinda different way, My way

name: Sonic Riders Plus
summary:
"Sonic Riders Plus" is a mod of the original Sonic Riders for the Gamecube that focuses on enhancing the competitive potential of the game while still remaining true to the game's nature.
Changing, Adding and Removing multiple aspects of the game like Characters, Gears, Stage elements, Visuals and a lot more.

name: Sonic Riders Tournament Edition 2.4.6
summary: Sonic Riders Tournament Edition (SRTE) is a mod that gears towards competitive play while pushing the limits of what's possible.This mod is being built on the belief that Sonic Riders was a sorely misunderstood game, and that it's in-depth mechanics and skill ceiling actually have competitive potential as an esport.

name: Soap Slide
summary: Soap Slide is a chaotic and fun party game set in a pastel world where soaps race and slide. Play solo or co-op with friends and dive into slippery chaos across mini-games like golf, football, and more!

name: Solar Dreamer Nikko
summary: BOOST YOUR DREAMS ! Play as Nikko, a young squirrel girl on a journey through visions of her future ! Explore levels at brisk speed using you BOOST! and collect every sun in this retro-styled adventure paying hommage to the greatest late-90's classics !

name: Something Left
summary:
After years of isolation caused by a haunting past, a reclusive girl receives an unexpected message—her mother appears in a dream and urges her to seek out the ex-boyfriend she left behind long ago.

Driven by curiosity, unresolved feelings, and a flicker of hope, she sets out from her remote home into the vast city, facing unfamiliar streets, fading memories, and the weight of her own emotions.

Will she find closure... or uncover something she never expected?

name: Sonic Mushroom Blast Legacy
summary: An enhanced recreation of the 2023 beta of Sonic Mushroom Blast (back when it was just the vanilla SM64 levels). 117 stars should be collectable.

name: Souls of White Star
summary: Souls of White Star is a sci-fi turn-based card wargame Roguelike strategy game. The different design of [double-sided technology moving cards] and [bandwidth draw cost] will test your judgment and decision more!

name: Sokoku
summary: A block-pushing game where you not only push blocks, you are one. Plan your movements so that the right number ends up on top, while you interact with other cubes and mechanics. Can you roll your way to the solution?

name: SoulCalibur III
summary:
Experience SoulCalibur III originally released on the PlayStation 2 console, enhanced with up-rendering, rewind, quick save, and custom video filters.

SoulCalibur III features the Chronicles of the Sword mode that fuses real-time simulation with versus fighting-style action.
Additionally, in Tales of Souls mode, enjoy deep, character-specific narratives alongside immersive cutscenes.
In Soul Arena, choose between Quick Play for relentless battles against CPU opponents and Mission mode for fights set under special conditions.
The game also features Custom Character Creation (Create-A-Soul) to freely edit over twenty elements to create your own original character.
Take on the challenge with a total of 42 characters: 18 default characters and 24 hidden characters.

name: Sonic Advance: Unnamed
summary: Unnamed Sonic Advance game tries to bring mechanics from Advance games for a new-ish adventure

name: Someone Cloned The President
summary: The President has been cloned (along with some other world leaders)! The clones are running amok and threatening to prevent the President getting to his golf game with Vlad. They must be stopped before they can wall-in the President and escape in his helicopter!

name: Sound of Survival
summary: Sound of Survival is a rhythm ego shooter where you have to shoot on the beat. Fight in a cyberpunk City against hordes of robots while you groove to the music. Shoot and hit on the beat to get stronger!

name: Sonic Adventure Advanced
summary: Sonic Adventure Advanced is a 2D recreation of Sonic Adventure, aimed to translate the original game into 2D, while also including custom touches to bring it closer to modern day.

name: Soft(A)ware
summary: Soft(A)ware is a surreal puzzle-platformer set inside a vast, hostile system. You awaken in a virtual world that functions as a prison — a place designed to limit, to control, to erase any trace of freedom.

name: Solvimus
summary: A two-player co-op puzzle game with 30 challenging levels. Work together, solve puzzles, and practice deep breathing as your partner "figures it out."

name: Sokoteddy
summary: Sokoteddy is a sokoban game. In this game you have to help a cute bear pass the levels. Such a game is relaxing.

name: Sonic Astral Generations
summary: Sonic Astral Generations is a fangame that seeks to give the opportunity to new levels that were absent in the 3 versions of Sonic Generation, with brand new Friends to save.

name: Sonic Breaking Point
summary: A 2D single-player focused fighting game inspired by Flash animations such as Super Mario Bros. Z.

name: Sonic Daybreak
summary: Explore all-new, original levels with the help of Sonic's core physics-based gameplay, with moves such as the Trick, Spindash, Dropdash, Rail Surge, Wall-Run, and so much more!

name: Sonic Definitive
summary:
This is a 2D Sonic fangame based on the Boost formula, using the Modern Sonic Worlds engine, created in Click Team Fusion .
A platformer with exciting additions: quick-time events and animated in-level cinematics to immerse you in this adventure.

name: Sonic Escape
summary: An expressive 2D Sonic Game inspired by the Sonic Advance Trilogy and Sonic Rush.

name: Sonic Forces Untold: Darkest of Days
summary: Three years have passed since Sonic vanished. Eggman rules the world, and the Resistance is on the brink of collapse.

name: Sonic Minus
summary: The game takes place on Eastshore island, Eggman discovered that the center of the island holds a ton of Negative Energy so he wants to use that to make the Chaos Emeralds into Negative Emeralds.

name: Sonic Mystic Land
summary: Sonic The Hedgehog comes back to a new exciting and somewhat strange adventure in Sonic Mystic Land! What will he find on this foreign land that he finds himself on?

name: Sonic of the Ring Tutorials Room
summary:
This game is about virtual training game which you can explore with Running and Fighting segments like Sonic Unleashed.
Sonic of the Ring will return to the era of 2006 to 2010 because this game tells the story of a blue ring that can awaken past memories.

name: Sonic Can Go Only Up
summary:
This is a 2D Sonic platformer, where your goal indeed is to go up. The game is one single huge level for you to clear, with areas of said level split into different zones. Rings are sparce (you can hold only a single ring), there are no checkpoints, and you will most likely fall down a good few times. Oh, but don't worry, the game autosaves.

If you're familiar with Getting Over It, Jump King, Only Up, Get to Work, all those sorta games, you know what to expect. If not; expect to get frustrated and annoyed.

name: Sonic Paradigm
summary: The Ultimate 2D Sonic Adventure!

name: Sonic Quickshot
summary: A 2D Sonic fan game with an emphasis on quick and focused level design.

name: Sonic Recharged
summary: Join Sonic on a solo mission to defeat Doctor Robotnik as he tries to exploit the resources and populace of Jade Island in his bid for world domination! Stop Robotnik and find the chaos emeralds.

name: Sonic Saga: The Mystery of South Island
summary: A reimagination of Sonic 1 into a game boy color RPG

name: Sonic After the Sequel DX
summary: Sonic After the Sequel DX is an enhanced re-release of Sonic After the Sequel developed by LakeFeperd that ports the Game from Multimedia Fusion Developer 2 to Clickteam Fusion 2.5, Tweaks the Game's Physics, Adds the Drop Dash from Sonic Mania, Hardware Render Support, and a third act to Dream Dance Zone. It also features a title screen that was redrawn from scratch as Lakefeperd had learned more about pixel art from his indie game project Spark the Electric Jester.

name: Sonic Seasons
summary: Stop Eggman's Control over the seasons on Eastside Island in Sonic Seasons!

name: Solaris
summary: Solaris FPS is a first-person shooter with fast-paced movement and unique character abilities.

name: Solitaire Match 3
summary:
Welcome to Solitaire Match 3, a classic match 3 puzzle game with a unique Solitaire twist brought to you by the original creators of Solitaire!

Swap and match three or more Solitaire themed gems while crushing through challenging obstacles across thousands of exciting levels. Strategically blast your way through exciting puzzles to collect stars and progress through the saga map.

Crave a challenge? Test your skills in special challenge levels with unique objectives and more exciting obstacles to overcome.

Need some help? Earn helpful boosters and unlock special power ups by making matches of 4 or more. You can even swap and match while boosters and specials explode around the puzzle.

Become a match 3 puzzle master and experience endless intrinsic joy in a reliable way with Mobilityware’s Solitaire Match 3. Download and start your swap and match journey today!

name: Solid Flight
summary: You are a licensed pilot and contract employee at Goldal Town Airport. You earn money delivering mail to remote homesteads in a mountainous area. You can rent a plane and fly wherever you want, explore the area and hunt animals. You can buy all the planes, and when you have saved enough money you can buy a stunt plane.

name: Sonic Racing CrossWorlds: Season Pass
summary:
The Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds Season Pass includes:

• Minecraft Pack – Steve, Alex, & the Creeper playable characters, the minecart vehicle, Minecraft World track, remixed Minecraft music, 6 Emotes per character, and additional sounds (Releasing Q4 2025)
• SpongeBob SquarePants Pack - SpongeBob SquarePants and Patrick Star playable characters, the Patty Wagon vehicle, Bikini Bottom track, new original music, 6 Emotes per character, and additional sounds (Releasing Q4 2025)
• PAC-MAN Pack - PAC-MAN and Team Ghost playable characters, the PAC-MAN Mobile vehicle, PAC-Village & Maze track, 6 Emotes per character, and additional sounds (Releasing Q1 2026)
• Mega Man Pack - Mega Man and Proto Man playable characters, the Rush Roadstar vehicle, Wily Castle track, 6 Emotes per character, and additional sounds (Releasing Q1 2026)
• Content Pack 5 - 4 Playable Characters, 1 Vehicle, 1 Track, 6 Emotes per character, and 8 Sounds (Releasing Q3 2026)
• Content Pack 6 - 2 Playable Characters, 1 Vehicle, 1 Track, 6 Emotes per character, and 8 Sounds (Releasing Q3 2026)
• Sonic Prime Character Pack - Playable Characters Rusty Rose, Tails Nine, Knuckles the Dread (Available on Launch)

*Content contained in this Bundle will also be sold separately and released throughout the following 12 months after Launch.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: Past, Present, & Future
summary: Sonic the Hedgehog RPG: Past, Present & Future is the fifth episode of the Sonic the Hedgehog RPG (e.g. SatAM RPG) series.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog XA
summary:
Sonic the Hedgehog XA is an open-source fan-game inspired by classic Sonic games from the Sega Genesis. It was built from scratch by a single person using the C language and PSn00bSDK and a lot of tools and scripts created for the sole purpose of building this game.

Sonic XA is a game that runs on the PlayStation 1, so to play it, you will need to use an emulator or burn the game to a proper CD-ROM so you can play it on your home console.

name: Sonic The Hedgehog: EVO
summary: The game aims to combine multiple mechanics from various Sonic games to offer a fresh and unique gameplay experience!

name: Sonic Unleashed 3DS
summary:
Here a new way to enjoy Sonic Unleashed !
On Playstation ? Xbox ? No !
On Nintendo 3DS ? Yes

name: Sonic Before the Sequel '26
summary: Sonic Before the Sequel '26 is a remake of the original Sonic Before the Sequel (2011), with improved physics, visuals and controls!

name: Soulmask: Shifting Sands
summary:
The Scorching Land: A New World Born from Ancient Egypt

This was once a land blessed by the Solar Deity, a pearl in the desert, but now, all its glory has scattered to the winds...

name: Sokonashi No Me
summary: Sokonashi No Me is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Sounds Terrifying
summary: Explore the cryptic Strüvat Laboratories in this blind accessible, audio-focused horror experience. Uncover what dark secrets lay in its endless hallways as you search for your missing partner.

name: Solitaire Battle Online
summary: "Solitaire" and "Spider" are created in intense competitions. Compete not with a deck, but with players from all over the world. Your goal is not just to collect solitaire, but to do it more faster and more efficiently than everyone else.

name: Soulfused
summary: Soulfused is a modern take on the classic text adventures from the early days of computer gaming. Dive into a dystopian future ruled by an empire focused on conquest and control. Take on the role of a newly converted Soulfused; a part human/part robot soldier in service to the Empire.

name: Soul Demon Hunters
summary: Soul Demon Hunters is a 2D side-scrolling action game with pixel graphics, where you resolve supernatural phenomena across the world through combat.

name: Soilborn: Ant Empire
summary: Ever wondered what it’s like to rule an empire beneath your feet? Build it. Command it. Survive.

name: Soul Gather
summary: "Soul Gather is an intense Challenging indie horror game where survival is key. collect 10 souls in each chilling level while evading relentless pursuers, including demons, ghosts, vampires, clowns, spiders, minotaur's, and more. Can you escape their grasp and gather all 10 of the Souls Per level ?

name: Soy Supremacy
summary: Run a vegan cafe by day, sell illegal meat & fast food by night! Romance rebellious girls while dodging the law in the world of Soy Supremacy, romantic and sweet visual novel. Can you make profit, make your girls happy and stay out of jail?

name: Sorcery and Survival
summary: Sorcery and Survival is an exciting arena shooter where you play as a powerful wizard who controls his destiny in a world of magic and danger. Your task is to repel waves of enemies, learn ancient spells and master new magical abilities.

name: Sombie
