summary: Sombie offers action packed PvP, and PvE in an always online MMO. loot, kill, die, repeat. Explore an endless randomly generated world with your friends. Offering a unique spin on the Zombie survival genre, built from the ground up.

name: Sorrow: Rise of Divinity
summary: An open-world action survival game combining fast-paced battle royale, competitive deathmatches, trophy hunting, and intense missions—where strategy and skill determine your fate.

name: Solnest
summary:
Solnest is a relaxing cat-finding adventure set in peaceful, sunlit, solarpunk-themed rooms. Explore all cozy levels to discover hidden cats in a beautifully drawn world.
500+ hidden cats to find across detailed scenes. 11 cozy rooms to explore, each bursting with solarpunk personality.

name: SoulTrigger
summary: An urban fantasy turn-based RPG where you analyze monsters' patterns and weaknesses to progress through battles.

name: SortCraft
summary: Design clever conveyor belt networks to sort colorful items into their correct destinations. What starts simple quickly becomes a brain-teasing challenge as you manage multiple colors, crossing paths, and tricky layouts.

name: Sortlandia
summary: An isometric action puzzle game, where you sort precious gems and relics, in colorful factory levels. Control spinners, springs, and teleports, avoid hazards, fill containers, and maximize your score.

name: Solo Chess
summary: The chess roguelike deckbuilder. Solo Chess is a cozy strategy game where you play chess-themed cards on a 3×3 grid, trigger piece effects, and earn points through clever combos. Build your deck with pets and food to conquer waves of unique battles.

name: SOS: Save Our Ship
summary: SOS is a 4-player online co-op horror-action game. Operate your ship, explore dangerous islands, loot valuable treasures, and escape deadly enemies to repay your soul’s debt. Strategy and teamwork are key to survival!

name: Somewhere, a Cat Sleeps
summary: Between the veil of night and dawn, a cat once loved still wanders on. A meditative walking simulator about cats, patience, love, and loss.

name: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Minecraft Pack
summary:
The Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Minecraft Pack includes:

• Steve, Alex, & the Creeper playable characters
• Minecart vehicle
• Minecraft World track
• Remixed Minecraft music
• 6 Emotes per character
• Additional sounds

name: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - "Blue Star" Extreme Gear
summary: Take control of the skies with the "Blue Star" Extreme Gear, inspired by Sonic's Extreme Gear in Sonic Riders.

name: Soulscape 2: Fragments of the Present
summary: Soulscape 2 is a Turn-based RPG set in the dystopian near future. Featuring an isometric exploration, party-based combat, and a branching dialogue that is shaped by your choices in the game.

name: Someone's Inside Me
summary: Your teacher Ms. Morbid has trapped you and your classmates on a deadly multiplayer field trip inside a human body! With proximity chat, two teams must scavenge, sabotage, and outwit each other to see who escapes first.

name: Sonic Riders Future
summary: The main direction of Sonic Riders Future is to create a lore-friendly Sonic Riders mod. This means the additional content would be created to fit seamlessly into the Sonic Riders universe by using the existing themes and designs that the franchise offers. We want to strike the balance between Sonic Riders' original gameplay while implementing innovative tweaks and QOL changes without adding them solely for the sake of innovation.

name: Solo Tactics
summary: Solo Tactics is a 1 V 1 MOBA where you'll need to rapidly switch between three champions. Play as the defender or attacker in a thrilling showdown-play for free !

name: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - SpongeBob SquarePants Pack
summary:
The Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - SpongeBob SquarePants Pack includes:

• SpongeBob SquarePants and Patrick Star playable characters
• Patty Wagon vehicle
• Bikini Bottom track
• New original music
• 6 Emotes per character
• Additional sounds

name: Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds - Pac-Man Pack
summary:
The Sonic Racing: CrossWorlds Pac-Man Pack includes:

• Pac-Man and Team Ghost playable characters
• Pac-Man Mobile vehicle
• Pac-Village & Maze track
• 6 Emotes per character
• Additional sounds

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 3
summary:
Sonic the Hedgehog 3 is a special promotional cartridge created for the Sega Genesis by Paramount Pictures to promote the then-upcoming Sonic the Hedgehog 3 film.
The cartridge was distributed to content creators on 21 November 2024, to promote the film and celebrate the release of advance tickets on 25 November 2024. Along with being a fully functional Sega Genesis game, the cartridge also includes a cheat code that, when entered, reveals the release date for the final trailer. As a result, this marked the first time since Sonic 3D Blast (1996) that an official Sonic entry for the system was released.

name: Solis
summary: Solis is an exciting cooperative platformer and puzzle-solving game designed for two players. The story follows Nina and Ram, along with their inseparable companion Dilúvio, on a journey full of challenges and discoveries. After a major climatic event strikes the island, Ram's battery is damaged by water, leaving him incapacitated. Now, the friends must join forces to find a spare part and face puzzles and obstacles that test their skills and bonds of friendship. Explore vibrant environments and overcome challenges together in an adventure for all ages.

name: Sonic Forces: Sanic T-Shirt
summary: Sometimes, you've gotta go fast. These exclusive "Sanic" T-shirts for your custom character features beautifully rendered art, and virtual threads organically grown on the snowing peaks of Mt. Fuji many years ago.

name: Sol and the Endless Orbit
summary: A story-rich, not-quite-turn-based hybrid of RPG strategy and real-time platforming. Secure the future of the galaxy's vibrant settings and whimsical inhabitants... or uncover the secrets at the center of everything, and draw a different path.

name: Soulstone Survivors: Supporter Pack
summary: The Corrupted Supporter Pack unlocks twisted new skins for all 22 Void Hunters, revealing what they would become if they succumbed. By purchasing this DLC, you support the continued development of Soulstone Survivors. Thank you!

name: Solaria
summary: Collect various androids known as "Pvas" on the futuristic colony planet named "Solaria", deploy them for battles, construction, farming, crafting; pilot your own mobile base to explore the vast world. This is a brand-new, single player open-world survival and crafting game.

name: Solace
summary: Solace is a psychological thriller that blurs the line between reality and delusion. Explore a world of mystery and suspense, solve cryptic puzzles, and uncover haunting secrets that lead to the next chapters of Solace.

name: Solomon's Keep: Dreadful Retro Edition
summary: Ascend the dark tower and destroy the blackest necromancer the land has ever seen in your epic quest to graduate college.

name: SoulUp
summary: If you can climb, you can fight. Every step is survival, every fall a lesson a hardcore action adventure.

name: Soul Reflex
summary: Master 50 fast-paced levels and train your Soul Reflex in a high-speed, Rhythm-Action 3D Runner centered on a journey toward Spiritual Awakening. Speed up or speed down, let your Soul Reflex decide.

name: Soulscape
summary: Possess slain foes in the ultimate sandbox RPG adventure Soulscape. It combines crafting, building, survival, fighting, looting, dungeon exploration and army building!

name: Songboy
summary: songboy is an instrument you play with a controller. tap, hold, move the sticks to make tracks. real music, made fast.

name: Soulflame
summary: Fight, explore, and uncover the secrets of a world bound by nature and spirit — all to save the one person you have left.

name: Soldier Adventure
summary: This is a 2D platform adventure game that supports both single player and online multiplayer gameplay. ASDW for move, space bar for jumping, left Shift for sprinting, left mouse buton for attacking, right mouse button for striking.

name: Sokofox
summary: A short sokoban game where you play as a fox. There are a variety of outfits and customizations.

name: Solid Void Art Nonograms
summary:
A great collection of nonograms!
Uncover art hidden within puzzles!
Have fun and exercise your brain!

name: SokoTerm
summary: An ASCII-based Sokoban game with unique gameplay mechanics. Test your puzzle solving skills on more than 200 completely new levels.

name: Sorcerer's Fortitude
summary: Sorcerer's Fortitude is a dynamic 3D TPS game where you take on the role of a powerful wizard defending your fortress from relentless waves of enemies. Explore a magical world, learn new spells, and gather resources to unlock unique characters and enhance your abilities.

name: Soup Rooms
summary: A SOUP-like room tourism experience directly inspired by SOUP, an obscure Japanese minimalist art-game from 2007 where you walk around a series of small abstract rooms and generally soak in the atmosphere. Think of it as a sort of digital art gallery.

name: Sons of Poseidon
summary: First-person naval strategy and colony building game set in ancient Greece. Found a colony, gather resources, and build your fleet. Embark on missions to pilot your ship and command your fleet. Sink enemy vessels from the helm of your ship, or board them and deal the killing blow.

name: Somnium: Awaken
summary: Somnium: Awaken Is a first-person horror adventure. Solve puzzles, find clues, and unlock the horrors behind the danger lurking in the shadows of the facility. Discover the inner truths and the fears that were left behind.

name: Soul Descent: Invade of Ether
summary: Command the Time Authority and rewrite destiny in Soul Descent! You must recruit and lead a team of beautiful spirit-vessel maidens, while uncovering forbidden truths, and fighting in dazzling 3D battles. Your decisions stir old wars, ignite romance, and shape the world’s future.

name: Softly Placed
summary: Unleash the childlike wonder and find the magic in everyday life! Place, fit, fill, cook, connect, and train your brain in the cutest possible way.

name: Soulblade: Dawnbreaker
summary: "Soulblade: Dawnbreaker" is a sidescrolling action-adventure that packs satisfying combat with immersive story exploration! Every run offers a fresh journey—are you ready to rise to the challenge? If your edge remains undrawn, can youth truly be called youth?

name: Solitaire Flowerscapes
summary: Unleash your inner gardener and embark on a captivating solitaire adventure!

name: Sol: Shogunate
summary: Paint the stars with the blood of your enemies in this Space-Samurai Action RPG set in an alt-future solar system ruled by the sword. A pulse-pounding soundtrack drives your gravity-defying, blood-soaked path of revenge as Yuzuki the “Shattered Heir” to a massacred clan who becomes an outlaw ronin.

name: Sol Protocol
summary: Sol Protocol is a VR coop Action Roguelike that allows you to physically pilot and manage a spaceship through dangerous stellar systems.

name: Sophia’s Animal Clinic: Mission Wildlife Park
summary: Your veterinary adventure begins at the wildlife park! Help injured and sick animals such as horses, deer, ducks, donkeys, goats, rabbits, and many more.

name: Soundgrass
summary: You find yourself on a planet where plants emit sound. Sound and music are also your main gameplay mechanic. Experience the world of sound as never done before.

name: Solstride
summary: Solstride is a casual story-rich roguelike where you journey through seasonal biomes with your animal companions. Together, rebuild a cozy sanctuary, uncover hidden truths, and find humanity in shared connections. Every bond tells a story; what will yours say?

name: South Star River
summary:
Build a community and develop ecological agroforestry techniques in this cozy game set in the Amazon! Animals and local people are all part of an ecosystem where each has a role!

Join Lu as she returns from the big city, seeking a peaceful life in the place where she was born and raised!

name: Something Meaningful
summary: An open-world RPG where you decide how to live after your death. Work, study, train, explore the city, customize your appearance, meet cartoonish characters and unlock interesting locations as you try to do something meaningful with this new opportunity.

name: Social Clicker: Persona
summary: You are a young person who starts working as a social media manager with a young woman to grow her online presence. In the clicker game, you manage her account, attract likes, and face challenges while developing a romance with her. As you progress, you unlock content with nudity and deep interac...

name: Sound Voltex Nabla
summary: The seventh game in the rhythm game Sound Voltex, part of Konami's BEMANI franchise.

name: Solid Link: Dungeon Side
summary:
Solid Link Dungeon Side is a classic first person RPG in which the player is a hero (male or female one) that arrives to the city of Grikodol. There he can recruit other 3 members to join his party and after that he can go explore the dungeon where the evil creatures live.

The game features 8 different main characters for the player to choose his hero.

The gameplay is in first person perspective and the player have to walk around the dungeon in the search of treasure and other passages to advance through there, during the battles the player can choose the attack that each of his characters will use (attack, magic, defend, etc) and which enemy he will attack. The battles appears really often and are really hard to survive the dangers. During the dungeon exploration the player can camp and refill his characters energy.

During the battles the player gain money that he can use in the town to buy items, improve weapons (or buy new ones), armours, etc.

name: Solid Link: Tower Side
summary:
Solid Link Tower Side is a classic first person RPG in which the player is a hero (male or female one) that arrives to the city of Grikodol. There he can recruit other 3 members to join his party and after that he can go explore the tower where the evil creatures live.

The game features 8 different main characters for the player to choose his hero.

The gameplay is in first person perspective and the player have to walk around the dungeon in the search of treasure and other passages to advance through there, during the battles the player can choose the attack that each of his characters will use (attack, magic, defend, etc) and which enemy he will attack. The battles appears really often and are really hard to survive the dangers. During the dungeon exploration the player can camp and refill his characters energy.

During the battles the player gain money that he can use in the town to buy items, improve weapons (or buy new ones), armours, etc.

name: So Stoked
summary: A chill and cozy surf game about timing, flow, and discovery. Travel between islands, ride clean waves, and enjoy a calm, skill-driven ride with light RPG-style tasks and progression.

name: Soli-tair-ror
summary:
A game where you play Solitaire before your sanity runs out, and avoid the demon that lurks.

This game takes a spin on the classic single player card game Solitaire, and turns it into a horror experience for the player.

The game features multiple ways to die within the solitaire match, as well as other challenges to distract you from completing your decks. Keep the creature at bay, and skillfully complete the game of solitaire.

name: Songs of Silence: Celestial Church Expansion
summary: Decades after the Crusade's defeat, rumors of a Witch leading a new order spark an age of Inquisition... Wield the full powers of the Celestial Church in both Campaign and Skirmish, with this Songs of Silence expansion!

name: SongPop Live
summary:
SongPop Live combines the core gameplay of SongPop’s music trivia with host-lead player interaction and real-world cash prizes, where players come together to show off their musical knowledge and compete for a share of the game’s prize. Twice daily at 5PM and 8PM Eastern, players compete against thousands of others through five rounds of five songs, organized by genre, artist, and more.

SongPop Live launched on November 7, 2019 on the App Store, and the game is playable with cross platform support, meaning your pop-loving pals on iOS can play together with their alternative rock Android device brethren and everyone in-between on those two platforms.

For the music trivia challenged, there are boosts, earned to help them correctly name artists or songs. ‘Friends Boost’ shows what your friends are picking, the ‘Remove 2’ boost removes two incorrect answers while the ‘Revive’ boost will bring players back into the game.

Additionally, music in-game can be added to the player’s Apple Music account, thus turning the game into a music discovery platform, even on Android devices.

name: Some of You May Die
summary: A clever multiplayer roguelike autobattler where you build a team of heroes with the best synergies to outwit your enemies!

name: Soul Hunter
summary: A team of young paranormal researchers ventures into the cursed corners of Japan to prove the existence of the spirit world. Ghosts feed on fear and the sanity of the living, luring you into traps of illusion. Your only defense is a special camera, capable of banishing spirits and unveiling secrets.

name: Soglia
summary: "Like all psychic life, creativity also comes from the unconscious. If you identify with the creative process, you end up believing that you are the creator." Soglia is a game based entirely on sound. A dreamlike journey into our unconscious to discover where ideas are born.

name: Sonata
summary: Sonata is a Tower-Defense RPG set in a post-apocalyptic world where sound attracts the monstrous "Echoes". A girl begins her journey to find her brother and discover the truth about her family's abilities. Join her and the Virtuosos of The Institute as she searches for the truth of the world.

name: Sorekara: End of a Journey
summary:
Threading through the universe are railways that deliver the dead to the Great Beyond, and traveling those rails is a cursed individual with no place to go. Caught between life and death, the man resigns himself to the tendrils of dark that wrap around his body like cocoon. Days and night are all the same. One day, it'll all disappear.

At the edge of a shore-- in a place that that time forgot-- with the illusionary sunrise painting the rubble gold-- A wayward soul watches the sky, and the journey begins with a gift.

name: Solitaire Associations Journey
summary: Solitaire Associations Journey is a unique blend of classic solitaire card game mechanics and modern word puzzles.

name: Song of Twilight
summary: A horror adventure where you control two sisters trapped in a twisted otherworld, fleeing from the insane ruler known as "Father". Explore the realm of madness and find your escape. Your choices shape the story in this multi-ending experience.

name: Soup Adventure
summary: A retro action-adventure game in which a little boy runs errands for his grandma and embarks on an epic quest full of dungeons, monsters and imagination.

name: Sound System
summary: Sound System is a next-generation rhythm game that brings guitar gaming back, while introducing an entirely new platform built around free music and community-driven gameplay. Shred guitar, sing vocals, and build your own note charts for any tune anytime, unlocking a new era of music gaming.

name: Sovereign Tower
summary: Play as the Sovereign of a magical tower in this story-rich, Round Table management RPG. Recruit eccentric Knights, assign quests and balance egos whilst carving out your kingdom's destiny. If destiny doesn’t go your way, keep turning back time, uncover secrets and rewrite fate again and again.

name: Solomon Islander Dominatrixes Are the Best
summary: Experience a session with Goddess Kelly, the hyper-sadistic, cruel, psycho, big-breasted, and tanned Solomon Islander dominatrix.

name: Sorrow's Serenade
summary: A brief emotional experience lasting a few minutes, centered on the quiet weight of a kept promise. A narrative-driven tale with minimal mechanics.

name: Solheart: The Hollow Sun
summary: A dying world. A sun built on stolen souls. Master its fragments, to unleash devastating powers, battle corrupted foes, and uncover the secrets of a civilization gone too far. Hack, slash, and uncover an epic, story-rich world.

name: Solitaire Crime Stories
summary: Put your detective skills to the test in a thrilling solitaire mystery!

name: Sonic Lost World: Deadly Six Edition
summary: The Deadly Six Edition comes with the 'Nightmare' DLC.

name: Social Caterpillar
summary: The only hands-on puzzle adventure guaranteed to accurately and humanely teach Socialization to Introverts, heh heh!

name: Sonic Labyrinth
summary: Port of the Game Gear title to the Sega Master System, honestly not the best way to play the game, the extra screen is actually garbage data, making it a bit confusing to play, unless you wanna play this on real hardware or using a Master System only emulator I recommend playing the GG version instead as this version does not give you any extra viewpoint.

name: Solar.Cross
summary:
Expose political corruption in this narrative Solarpunk Picross Game where you complete nonogram puzzles in order to facilitate restoration projects undertaken by the Environmental Renewal Agency (ERA).

Play as Mateo, a naive 25 year old new hire at ERA who quickly finds himself in the midst of a secret ploy to uncover records of political corruption within ERA.

(Developed in 10 days for the Day Zero Games: Solarpunk Jam)

name: Something to Drink?
summary: I'm Tom and I just got a job as a bartender. Now I have to wipe down the same sticky counters where I used to leave my own marks. In this dive, even the rats look like they're hungover. Alright, the boozers won't pour their own drinks - time to get back to work.

name: Sonic Terror
summary:
Sonic Terror is a turn-based tactical RPG where music is brutal magic and the only weapon against a space alien parasite that has turned silence into a new law.

Set in an alternative 1984, Sonic Terror puts you in control of an outlaw rock band on tour through a totalitarian Republic invaded by body-snatching aliens. The only thing they’re afraid of is music—and you’re the last ones to play it.

name: SolitaireX
summary:
SolitaireX is a modern web-based platform for playing classic solitaire card games online. It features multiple solitaire variants with smooth animations, responsive design, and optimized performance across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.

The platform focuses on accessibility and long-session gameplay, offering large, easy-to-read cards, intuitive controls, and optional gameplay assists such as undo, hints, and autoplay. Players can track detailed statistics, compete on leaderboards, and improve their skills over time through repeat play.

SolitaireX is designed for both casual players and long-term enthusiasts, combining traditional solitaire mechanics with modern UX improvements and performance-focused web technology.

name: Sora: Winds of the Jungle
summary: Soar as a spirited parrot through lush jungles and tropical islands. Follow your flock, hit speed boosts, and glide through sky markers in a peaceful flying adventure.
